about_the_game: for thousands of cycles remnants of humanity have dwelt peacefully within the subterranean village of telluria a young spelunkers world is turned upside down when a routine mining expedition is ambushed by a crazed horde of fera leaving him the only survivor join strato in an actionpacked adventure rpg through the voxel wilderness of the tellurian sector and uncover the truth about his world explore winding labyrinths and colossal caverns powered by our inhouse numinous engine  engage large groups of enemies with a realtime combat system where weapons have their own personality level up and find rare treasure to aid in your journey or follow legendary recipes and fight with the tools of your ancestors game features  dive into the tellurian wilderness with strato and check out a variety of different mechanics all the while avoiding hazards and battling fera current major features include current features explore  trek through an endless cavernous system with unique geographical land marks combat  battle hordes of enemies each with their own personality and fighting tactics loot  plunder buried treasure for more than 80 equippable items including 7 armor sets tools  select from a range of tools including mining picks grapples torches and beacons harvest  mine and collect several types of ores or harvest plants for recipe ingredients craft  discover over 100 unlockable crafting recipes with multiple rarity types and qualities upcoming features dungeons  conquer mystic dungeons with layouts that change upon each visit quests  complete quests to progress the storyline or spend time on side quests towns  one population center with npcs and stores to interact with per sector skill upgrades  spend skill points powering up and unlocking particlebased skills cutscenes  ingame cinematic sequences accompanying quest progression engine hallmarks  caverns lost sky runs on our custombuilt numinous engine  early access allows us to refine not only the game but the core engine too here are some of its advanced capabilities tetravoxelization  produces angled terrain shapes making it easy to walk and run over membronic linkaging  creates endless organiclooking tunnels and cavernous systems voxelscript  custombuilt scripting language used to easily define enemy ai behaviors ingame debugging  press f keys to visualize hit boxes toggle free camera and more volumetric particles  define particle systems for resources enemies items and skills destructible terrain  fast terrain modification in real time
short_description: caverns lost sky is a single player actionadventure rpg set in a fully destructible voxelized subterranean realm join strato in the tellurian sector as he battles hordes of fera in his quest to find the sky level up and increase your stats or ascend the caverns searching for buried treasure

about_the_game: you are an idea your driving motivation is to spread your idea to everyone you must cajole you must browbeat you must insinuate and you must influence grow your flock of ids and guide them to victory in this casual realtime strategy game influence other ids by flocking with them and outnumbering them create dramatic soundscapes as each id you influence adds its voice to your song play against computer controlled opponents or online against other humans influence is easy to learn but difficult to master each game only takes about five minutes but you will find yourself playing again and again to learn advanced strategies and techniques as your skills grow you can customize your ids to match your preferred style and maximize your victory potential choose between speed agility and resistance or a balance of all three music in influence is dynamically generated during play each game has its own unique song which can be saved and replayed later or shared with your friends you can hear the game unfold as you listen to its song as each influenced id adds a note according to its new color
short_description: you are an idea you are ephemeral infectious and rapacious it is your mission to occupy the thoughts of every mind go spread convince influence play against computer controlled opponents or online against other humans in this casual realtime strategy game

about_the_game: when the cutthroat worlds of piracy and goblins clash the result is an underhanded race of skullduggery to be crowned the goblin pirate king hire buccaneers  amass bounty  and build cannons to boom your opponents out of the water build up your goblin cities to harvest the rare bounties of the pirate islands deck out your ships with the most underhanded goblin crew stack your cities and ships with cannons and armour to blast your enemies from the seas who can reap the most treasures from the bountiful pirate islands who can mount the most cannons on their fearsome ships and cities who can seek out the most scurvy sea goblins to join their crew who will be named the one and only goblin pirate king game features buccaneers bounty amp boom is a turnbased strategy board game from the developer of the infamous neptune’s pride take your treachery and backstabbing aboard a goblin pirate ship and set sail on the high seas earn pirate points for having the most buccaneers goblin crew bounty largest harvest and boom cannons each turn the first player to reach 30 pirate points is crowned the goblin pirate king choose how many turns to play and set the turn deadlines for your games 2 mins to 48 hours play a fast game with your friends in one sitting or play a carefully considered strategy over days or weeks hire some of the most despicable and underhanded goblins to join your crew choose from 15 different crew members to customise your ships the grappler will hold enemy ships in place while you attack the bouncer will ricochet cannonballs to attack multiple hexes at once the slaver will smuggle crew members from defeated ships build up the biggest ships and cities on the seas stack your ships and cities with unlimited levels of cannons health and armour upgrade your cities to improve your harvest cities can harvest food wood and metal from surrounding land hexes food can also be harvested from sea tiles with fish the best bounty comes from rare treasures of the sea such as mystic mermaids precious pearls and terrible tusks use these treasures to drive your economy and to hire goblin crew for your ships parle with the other pirate leaders to negotiate trades and make alliances but remember pirates are untrustworthy sods and everyone is vying to be the goblin pirate king now it’s time to raise the black flag and set sail
short_description: a strategic board game set in the treacherous world of goblin pirates from the developers of neptunes pride

about_the_game: introduction matrix brain twister is a puzzle game where you have to solve matrices by filling all blocks with the same color if a block is clicked the block itself and its horizontal and vertical neighbours will change their color instead of a rotation like the rubics cube the matrix is solved if all blocks are filled with the same color except white this is a very simple game mechanic but can lead to very difficult riddles true to the motto easy to learn hard to master features 2d 3d and 4d matrices several matrix formats like 2d hourglass skull star etc 3d octahedron pyramid sphere etc 4d hypercube pentachoron octaplex etc over 600 handcrafted levels which varies from easy to hard difficulty random levels can be generated for your own fun and you can change them in dimension format size and colors solve all handcrafted riddles to not only get achievements but also to be at the top of the leaderboard create your own feelgood atmosphere by choosing between different backgrounds effects light moods block styles music and atmosphere sounds free outdated versions you can test the demo on steam or other free outdated versions of this game this gives you an opportunity to see if you like this type of game google play store matrix brain twister 2d itch matrix brain twister 3d wallpaper engine matrix brain twister 3d feedback feel free to visit the steam forum to tell us about your feedback occurring bugs feature requests or any idea you have in mind we try to add every useful requested feature by the community and definitely fix all reported bugs epilog may the puzzle fun be with you
short_description: a brain twisting puzzle game where you have to fill the whole matrix with the same color to solve the riddle only recommended for clever people and those who like to suffer from difficult riddles

about_the_game: the castle of your cow king is under assault by fairy tale creatures and vicious garden gnomes so dust off that chain mail pimp out your castle and bust out your bow and get ready to go medieval in full vr can you survive another reigny day take up your trusty bow and siege weapons to repel a fairy tale assault in fully immersive vr did the enemies smash down your gate with their battering ram quickthrow your hip axes to keep them from mounting the stairs spend your gold wisely and you can even dual wield magic staffs spend your gold on upgrades in between every wave arm yourself with chicken arrows to bait your enemies place defensive sentry towers around your keep and set up devastating siege defenses take some goblin shrapnel to the face down a shot of the magic potion to heal your wounds and keep the arrows flying nothing is more satisfying than nailing an enemy from a mile away show off your archery skills with longrange headshots and dropping speedy enemies from the sky defend the castle of a tiny yet royal cow his pretentious orders and contemptuous moos will aggravate or inspire you to fight on for one more wave think we stopped with just orcs fight mythical hordes of skeletons dragons necromantic garden gnomes goblin bombers fire giants and hulking cyclopses watch out for the projectile poop of flying monkeys fight off the horde in 360 degree action enemies will come on land the sky and even from behind the castle walls amass wealth with every wave of enemies through medieval loot and currency customize your defenses with upgradeable weapons and stations like the trusty bow and arrow throwing axes cannons slingshots boiling oil and powerful magic staff unleash your inner robin hood and nail some satisfying skill shots compete to be the champion of the leaderboards dive in any way you like  another reigny day is compatible with the htc vive and the oculus rift cut through over 15 types of enemies from necromancers and firebreathing dragons to flying monkeys that throw low poly poo bend the knee to an asinine but bovine cow king
short_description: take up your trusty bow and siege weapons to repel a fairy tale assault in fully immersive vr did the enemies smash down your gate with their battering ram quickthrow your hip axes to keep them from mounting the stairs spend your gold wisely and you can even dual wield magic staffs

about_the_game: table tennis toon is a fastpaced table tennis game the peculiarity is that unlike other ping pong games you can aim precisely thanks to the movable viewfinder on the table the quality of your shots depends completely on your positioning and timing  use five different types of shot or a combination of these yes you read right you can make a shot combining topspin and rightspin effects for example the five shots are accuracy shot topspin backspin sidespin right sidespin left try different characters everyone with his unique set of stats there are four stats speed power control effects will you choose a balanced character or will you go with a specialized one play in splitscreen with your friends for the best experience there is nothing more satisfying than smashing the ball against your friend or hitting the edge of the table at the set point or play online with your steam friends using steam remote play together
short_description: table tennis toon is a fastpaced table tennis game aim with complete freedom and fire the ball with five different types of shot choose your character and play solo or against your friends in thrilling and adrenalinefuelled matches prevail and conquer the title of ping pong master
supported_languages: english french italian simplified chinese traditional chinese japanese

about_the_game: turn your virtual reality headset into a multimonitor system breakroom lets you use windows inside vr you can surround yourself with applications work on photoshop while watching a youtube tutorial or just watch your favorite movie while playing online poker and browsing reddit while sitting on the beach or in a japanese garden you can finally use your headset for other things than gaming and free yourself from the limitations of the physical monitor in breakroom you can choose between a range of soothing environments you can use all your regular windows 10 applications move them around your virtual space and create the ultimate personalized work space you start your experience with your mouse where you right click anywhere to see a menu use the menu to bring your open applications into breakroom open windows explorer or the start menu to open new applications you can change backgrounds and skyboxes rearrange your applications within breakroom or open the tutorial

about_the_game: atlas ablaze is a visual novel that follows a girl named andi as she discovers how it feels to yearn to know someone the way you know yourself its a story about a coming of age sonder feelings the acceptance of change and simply owning up to being human shes a 16 year old who finds herself falling in love with a young sex worker as shes simultaneously dealing with a sharp decline in her mental health her lack of experience in relationships not only affects her love life but her friendships as well as she begins to understand how it feels to care for people so much that love becomes your crutch she also realizes just how many people care for themselves more than anyone else acting as somewhat of a subconscious or an imaginary friend you can help andi make choices in her day to day life influencing the way she interacts with the people around her there are many different characters you can meet some of which have secrets to be discovered if your humor is warped to a point where you cant explain why any of it is funny anymore living inside andis mind might be exactly what you need features this game can be beaten in around 4 and a half hours there are seven different endings though the same ending may look slightly different depending on less impactful choices the player has made the player can occasionally snoop through andis phone finding extra artwork reading text messages etc all of the visuals are pixel art with chiptune inspired music to match the atmosphere a large amount of the game has a light pastel color pallet disclaimer none of the characters including the sex workers are meant to be sexualized
short_description: when 16 year old andi falls for the last person her parents would approve of she seems to have trouble processing the severity of her girlfriends situation cute visuals and crude humor helps to mask dark topics in the way that puts you in the headspace of a teenage girl trying to shut it all out

about_the_game: in this turnbase strategy rpg you can fight demons and faye make friends give gifts and save the world story shadow looms over the land causing the faye to rampage the priestess calls upon her knights to resolve the problem peter a skilled traveler with nothing better to do joins the knights led by kaine to stop the shadow key features more than 15 chapters and many optional battles help peter befriend allies and even faye maybe hell even find love use your items or give them as gifts levels and experience points are used by some abilities as an expendable resource a charming classic visual style
short_description: in this classically styled turnbased strategy rpg shadow looms over the land causing the faye to rampage help peter save the world make friends and maybe even find love fight against shadow choose to use items or gift them have conversations and maybe find a few secrets

about_the_game: the greatest battle ever to be fought by napoleon is about to begin the date is the 2nd of december 1805 a few miles east of brunn in the province of moldavia ranged across the barren pratzen heights are the forces of the austrorussian army using a unique system developed by dr peter turcan you are able to relive the battle as you take command of either napoleons grand armee or czar alexanders joint austrorussian forces with the difficulties and complexities of napoleonic warfare faithfully reproduced austerlitz gives you the opportunity to rewrite the history books features play as either napoleon or czar alexander unique battle system that relies on line of sight and chain of command a detailed battle orders system that takes into account morale and unit experience hot seat multiplayer for up to two players
short_description: get ready relive the dos classic and to experience the horror and glory that was the battle of austerlitz

about_the_game: spit into the microphonekill the zombies in this exciting and dynamic game you have to protect your harvest from pumpkineating zombies who got into the habit to visit your garden to do this you have a magic spitting stick you have to protect your pumpkins for 3 minutes from the hungry but funny zombies the game is available in two levels of farm and city to start the level  shoot the screen where it is displayed on the easy level of difficulty you need to protect 6 pumpkins from pumpkineating zombies on the average  4 and on the difficult  2 pumpkins respectively youll get more points at the higher levels of difficulty also do not forget the birds  they bring more points than the zombies you will receive your points only if you win the round  at a loss the points are not charged tactics is everything for us sometimes it is more profitable to give a pumpkin to one zombie for shooting then all the zombies that will pass by you use a few seconds at the beginning of each round when the time had already started but the zombies have not appeared yet to shoot as many birds as possible because during the attack of zombies it is much more difficult to do it try to shoot zombies in the head  so you can kill them faster
short_description: in this exciting and dynamic game you have to protect your harvest from pumpkineating zombies who got into the habit to visit your garden to do this you have a magic spitting stick spit into the microphonekill the zombies

about_the_game: xp racing is a love letter to the classic racing games from the nes era we wanted to use pixelart in a way that is faithful to the 90s console limitations only breaking those rules sparsely to enhance the players experience and customization play modes  tournament win 4 gold trophies in a row  time trial beat all the time records features  4 tracks  simple controls  4 free cars and paint jobs  6 premium cars and paint jobs
short_description: xp racing is a love letter to the classic racing games from the nes era

about_the_game: scholar is a spelling game with rpg elements level up your hero as you spell words and unlock new skills fight powerful bosses at the end of each level and get that loot flow in scholar flow is your both energy and health casting a word as well as taking damage reduces your flow use your skills equipment and upgrades to reduce flow costs or completely neglect them in some cases even regenerate and fill your entire flow with one special word three skill trees to explore choose your way between path of flow experience and guardian will you focus solely on your exp gains or will you maximize your damage output mix them to your liking to enjoy your journey reset them any time and try out new strategies loot after you complete every run enjoy your new loot try harder difficulty runs to obtain better quality ones common rarelegendary and set items all await you use multiple items of the same set to unlock special abilities finishing higher difficulty runs will also give you better rolled items look out for glitched items which roll with extra stats even a common item can be an exciting addition to your armory if you can find a glitched one augments as you spell words youll start to run into augmented letters these letters can give you various bonuses such as xp flow damage or free shuffling sometimes they might carry harmful effects yet even those can come in handy with the right skills runes spelling words using augmented letters defeating guardians will all earn you different kinds of runes use these runes to upgrade your board size xp and gain advantages against the guardians in addition to your skills and equipment upgrades will also aid you in your journey difficulty curated to your enjoyment its upto you to decide whether you want a purely relaxing experience or a hardcore spelling journey when you are in the mood crank the difficulty to gain extra xp and loot apart from the general difficulty setting your runs also scale from 1 to level 200 you can decide to farm lower levels in a fast manner or go higher for the better rewards skills and items on full display any item that provides you a unique ability or a skill that boosts your xp  damage or flow will always be shown in the corresponding section of your info box simply mouse over them to remind yourself of their names anytime a legendary or a set item triggers its effect a short animation will be shown allowing you to decide if they are useful enough for you or perhaps its time to change up your gear
short_description: scholar is a spelling game with rpg elements level up your hero as you spell words and unlock new skills fight powerful bosses at the end of each level and get that loot

about_the_game: this is an adventure and platforming game where you play as a roly poly you know one of those bugs you sometimes see outside often when lifting up a rock they might be regional or found all over the world basically theyre these insects that roll into a ball its literally all theyre known for game features roll into a ball explore a forest from a tiny perspective climb on sticks and leaves talk with other rollies some might even offer you a quest eat different foods discover the multiple mindblowing endings from maneuvering down ribbits water slide to mastering the bouncy mushroom forest to enduring the terrible cave which houses unspeakable evil or maybe even collecting the rare gems to become the chosen one of the great roly poly prophecy that will bring you to a new plane of existence as told by the ancients push around small rocks you will also learn interesting facts about these lovable lil guys did you know that they eat heavy metals removing them from damaging the environment but they just release the metals back into the environment after some time they temporarily help so thats good give the environment a little breather birds and stuff eat them so theyre a food supply but its not like theres other bugs that cant be eaten they also damage crops which isnt a good thing but seriously youd think that these bugs would have some kind of unique history or lore there isnt a ton of information about them compare them to ladybugs who have several sections and cool facts about their history with norse mythology and nursery rhymes imagine being a roly poly finding out youre only known for rolling into balls and people cant even agree what to call you roly polies pillbugs potato bugs and you wonder why they roll into those balls theyre probably depressed
short_description: play as a roly poly and roll into adventure

about_the_game: fast platforming people hiding others seeking if you are the last one to be found you win this is hideandseek tag brought back in a digital world instead of playing at your usual areas like a playground or at your house you can get swept away in high icy mountain vistas or a small cave with glowing crystals i have fun with your friends as you explore and hide from them game mechanics hosting lobbies classic 3d platforming hiding a cool digital world seeking your friends as they hide from you controls wasd for movement spacebar for jump lshift for dash and air dive 1amp2 assign roles some controller support in the gameplay itself not in the menu sadly
short_description: fast platforming people hiding others seeking if you are the last one to be found you win

about_the_game: asteroidtd is a game in a redesigned tower defense style now there is no fixed field or one path the whole endless space is at your disposal to build it up with your buildings there are only 4 types of buildings available to you to capture an asteroid to protect it to mine gold and to conduct research but their strategic use expands significantly when the research tree comes into play with 161 subitems and 18 types of asteroids that affect the buildings created on them strengthen your defense or boost your economy expand your influence as far as possible or create a compact but impregnable fortress  the decisions are yours alone you will fight against various enemies attacking from all sides unlike many games of the genre you will not defend a static base but a small spaceship flying independently on the battlefield building new buildings or providing support and here you can lose your towers first of all the enemies will pay attention to them and then to the builder spinning nearby so do not forget to equip asteroids with a decent number of turrets you can chase records and competing with friends or you can just relax to the calm ambient background music everyone will find something of their own create your own colony in this cold space
short_description: try to survive in infinite asteroid cloud as long as possible in reworked tower defence style find your own playstyle and beat your own records or chillout with original ambient soundtracks build explore think  everything to create your own colony in this cold space

about_the_game: let’s continue to be amazed by the natural and man made wonders of the world… from the glaciers of alaska to the vast and magnificent sahara desert from the classic sydney opera house to the artistically granite carvings of mount rushmore weve combined all wonders together in 34 locations providing you with an experience of awe and fascination let the facts from each location enlighten and guide you through the journey as the game unfolds you are presented with 7 mini puzzles with lots of levels which will add to the fun and give you a little break from factfinding  60 amazing facts to find  explore 34 locations of the world  collect 15 unique items for your treasure  5 modes  word silhouette scrambled word missing vowels finding pairs
short_description: if you are a virtual bird but love adventure too this game is just for you

about_the_game: the dead walk the aliens have arrived its the end of the world as we know it explore a world where everything you thought you knew is wrong zombien is a 275000 word interactive novel by leon naylor where your choices control the story its entirely textbasedwithout graphics or sound effectsand fueled by the vast unstoppable power of your imagination can you navigate the harsh new realities of life do you have what it takes to survive will you be the savior of humanity or its damnation develop your character to face whatever comes battle forces from beyond the stars duel with the undead explore a terrifying new world where everything you thought you knew is wrong play as male or female gay straight or bi will you be the savior or humanity or its damnation
short_description: the dead walk the aliens have arrived its the end of the world as we know it explore a world where everything you thought you knew is wrong

about_the_game: you have just retrieved the ancient star relic from the hands of the swarm now you have to survive until you escape from their reach will you be able to succeed against betrayers and a relentless ancient force form your crew play with 46 players eight different characters to choose from each with their unique strengths weaknesses and special cards play cards and abilities to survive and betray specialized skill decks to complement your role try to get away by playing cards with ambiguous effects play negative effects anonymously use all tools at hand to succeed rule as the joker and tap into the wild deck to control the fate of your mates as you see fit perform specialized actions through the ship facilities call for new elections imprison players control ships team up to overcome challenges play your cards as either buffs or debuffs use your skill cards to influence and control results defend against the endless swarm forces manage your resources to stay alive measure risks and diminish your losses maintain and repair your ships to keep fire from spreading pilot ships and take down the swarm forces with the help of your combat cards choose your escape route be the admiral and choose the jump destinations to lead the crew to victory or not overthrow suspicious players and take their title win and lose together no player removal mechanics players can be constrained but not put out of a match unique mechanics to revealed betrayers who do you trust how will you triumph
short_description: a deduction game unlike any other experience a unique mix of card game crisis management and backstabbing

about_the_game: james peris the rookie secret agent 005 is back he will have to solve no more and no less than two missions yes two missions in one game hence the 2 in the title this time peris will have to deal with a mafia boss and get the lost necklace of sant angelo one of the jewels created by leonardo da vinci at the same time he will have to find the mythical holy great beer a legendary artifact forgotten for centuries why leave such important missions to someone so incompetent we have no such answer this sequel will solve some of the unknowns raised in the first part and features two new quests that can be solved at the same time a great handdrawn nonlinear cartoonstyle adventure with adult and coarse humor key features  pointandclick adventure like leisure suit larry monkey island or the first james peris  adult and slapstick humor with a sarcastic narrator  fully openended gameplay and nonlinear puzzles  60 scenarios to play in or more we havent counted  money system earn and spend money become rich or become the poorest bastard  lots of girls to talk to and interact with we dont guarantee you can flirt them all up  about 15 hours of gameplay 52 for those who dont know how to play  comments and curiosities of the creators  absurd achievements to get  intelligent system that gives you an opinion about the state of your game
short_description: the long awaited new adventure by james peris after no license no control much more of everything a pointandclick adventure with adult humor and a touch of hooliganism totally open gameplay and nonlinear puzzles

about_the_game: unlock the world of chess with chess remix  a new era of chess gaming experience the thrill of playing chess like never before with chess remix your ultimate destination for a diverse range of chess games from around the world explore ancient versions of chess and shogi trace the evolution of these games from chaturanga and get ready to play the vikings chess game hnefatafl with hundreds of games to choose from including european japanese korean chinese thai and mongolian chess youll never run out of options but wait theres more chess remix lets you customize the rules of your game and play how you want from crazyhouse atomic 960 king of the hill absorption losing forced capture and beyond the possibilities are endless create the next big board game with the most advanced chess variant creator  assign special powers to pieces add unique behaviours to board squares and share your creations with friends and other players whether youre a seasoned chess player or a beginner chess remix has something for everyone play with ai challenge friends watch ai vs ai battles or invent your own game with customisable styles dark and light themes and no signup or login required the app is designed for a seamless and enjoyable experience
short_description: experience the thrill of playing chess like never before with chess remix try out different versions of chess from around the world historic board games modern variations or even create your own original games
supported_languages: english german spanish  spain japanese korean swedish french arabic portuguese  portugal russian simplified chinese traditional chinese turkish

about_the_game: zoologist erwin founder of the serengeti  for a better life initiative and his team of rangers need your help only if you manage to place all stones correctly in this colourful africanthemed match 3 game youll be able to master all the challenges of safari venture and save the animals of the serengeti from an evil gang of poachers puzzle your way through 8 exciting chapters and solve over 100 challenging match 3 levels spectacular powerups and african rhythms create lots of excitement and real safari atmosphere 105 challenging match 3 levels exciting story spanning 8 chapters bonus mini games spectacular powerups several levels of difficulty free the animals from captivity
short_description: help zoologist erwin to track down evil poachers and save the animals of the serengeti national park

about_the_game: friendly fox invites you on the newest mystical adventure in the living legends series your brother’s invited you to sunshine island for neptune day the festivities will celebrate the treaty between the islanders and the people of the sea but instead of a heartfelt reunion with your brother you’re met with a curse that turns people into salt statues and monsters someone’s angered the lord of the sea and his daughters putting the lives of everyone on the island at stake can you repair the rift between the two peoples to save your brother and the rest of the island in time find out in this breathtaking hiddenobject puzzle adventure this is a hidden object puzzle adventure game meaning a specific genre of storydriven point amp click adventures throughout the game players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene and to occasionally complete various minigamespuzzles  dive into an ocean faring adventure  remove an island curse before it’s too late  fantastic hidden object puzzles  beautifully illustrated environments
short_description: the dark seas are calling can you undo neptune’s deadly curse in time

about_the_game: a visual novel series about a young woman curious about bdsm in this episode she meets her master for the first time game description katy a gorgeous woman in her early twenties had always been curious about the world of bdsm the idea of surrendering control and exploring her deepest desires had captivated her mind for months finally after much contemplation she had made her decision to attend her first session as she walked into the dungeon her heart raced with excitement and nervousness immerse yourself in her fantasy and follow her kinky journey as a submissive we promise a story with arousing dialogues realisticlooking characters and highdefinition graphics features  hd renders and animations  video and image gallery
short_description: a visual novel series about a young woman curious about bdsm in this episode she meets her master for the first time

about_the_game: deflemask the best crossplatform chiptune tracker produce video game music for old school gameconsoles and computers in a tracker sound is produced by adding notes in a grid divided by channels in which special effects can be added for each channel individually for example you can make a vibrato portamento and arpeggios with simple commands this is a brand new version of the tracker rethought for modern hardware and 64 bits support there are different systems to choose from 16bits to 8bits or even arcade board chips check the full list below supported systems genesis master system  fm sound unit gb pce nes vrc7 fds c64 arcade neo geo you can export your song in vgm wav and rom formats and get the best quality for your amazing tunes  features modular ui with an intuitive design realtime emulation of the hardware built in instrument editor for fm wavetables and more switch between systems on the fly port a nes tune to genesis share projects between mobile and pc versions 16 different global effects and dedicated effects for every chip midi device support basic view that allows reading your song in a simple way ui modes select between desktop and touch mode export to wav vgm or rom 40 beautiful skins and more things waiting you to explore do you need some help starting making chiptune music the manual is your friend also check our community on discord to discover other artist and feel free to ask anything you need except the meaning of life which is clearly 42 also youtube have a tons of artist sharing creations every week
short_description: deflemask the best chiptune tracker it is a crossplatform and multi system chiptune music tracker the first of its kind in history available for mobile and desktop platforms with deflemask you can produce video game music for many old school gameconsoles and computers

about_the_game: isle of the dead is a timeless journey starting from an everyday apartment towards our final destination guided by charon ferryman of the underworld this vr experience is a loose recreation of the eponymous work painted in 1883 by the swiss symbolist painter arnold böcklin the famous masterpiece also inspired a symphonic poem by rachmaninov which makes a perfect soundtrack to accompany the experience isle of the dead is part of the collection  arte trips  a series of immersive vr experiences that take you into masterpieces from 16th to 20th century by wellknown painters  best story in vr at venice film festival 2018  audience award at entrevues belfort 2018  special jury vr award at filmgate miami 2018  best virtual reality short film at china international new media short film festival a vr experience directed by benjamin nuel written by benjamin nuel et clémence madeleineperdrillat a coproduction les produits frais arte france with the participation of cnc  new media fund length 8 minutes
short_description: step into böcklin’s masterpiece in an awardwinning vr experience isle of the dead is a timeless fascinating journey towards our final destination guided by charon ferryman of the underworld

about_the_game: a scifi turn based resource management game mine craft and ship resources across the galaxy production build mines derricks and centers to increase productive output build dyson spheres to farm energy easier research technologies unlock technologies with science to gain a better understanding of the universe unlocks new crafts and increased production efficiency spy networks spy on other corporations and see how far they are in certain production sabotage npc production counter intelligence to find moles victory conditions win by research research the science molecule tech win by domination 75 map control win by conquest eliminating rival corporations

about_the_game: howdy folks yall would nahwt believe what have we done found lately  some strange goggles with ayy screen inside’em ayy kind piece ov electronik device maand my wawds so we done decided ta hit our friends in duality ayn ask them about this here thing seems like its some kaand ov gaming binoculaars in witch yall be able ta see us as alive okay so uncle billy had discovered vr that’s right then we had no other choice than to obey him and it was not because of him standing over our shoulders with an openend wrench and do barn finders in vr so here we go let’s have a fun ride with our beloved uncle and his wicked team now you can truly feel the whole barn finders atmosphere and dive into it with all of your senses well maybe except smell but that’s a good thing disclaimer don’t let him got you into the moonshine business it does not work well with vr features hundreds of items to find and sell improve the quality of goods for sale by cleaning and repairing damaged ones as needed find parts of exclusive cars motorbikes rebuild them and then sell for a big payout discover crazy stories of the locations you visit and items you collect

about_the_game: solve all the labyrinths get the hyper speed fight against starships and get the best score you can achieve in golden gears this is an arcade game with turn based combat there are a total of 29 stages with 100 areas plus the bonus ones the difficulty is progressive duration  more than 7 hours of gameplay depends on how good you are at using the speed bonus key features phase shields  it gives you advantages over battles like earning the twice amount of techgears or stopping the random encounters you will need ebits to activate them audio signals you can search for secret musical tracks that are in the game you will need audio receptors medals depending on your performance after finish the area or a main zone you get a golden or silver medal those are exchanged later for golden gears at the end of each stage type of speed depending on how fast you finish an area or main zone you could get different types of speed manage your style of play and beat the game will you raise your level to fight better the enemies will you collect ebits to avoid battles will you focus on complete the bonus areas to get shields upgrades will you be a speed runner and see how fast can you finish the game the final answer is with you for the second run you can try to get all the golden medals it will raise the difficulty of the game
short_description: a game about solving labyrinths with puzzles and battles in order to test your skills

about_the_game: immaterialai iai is a selfhelp and growth app that works in a completely new way it takes you through the depths of your own mind to help you uncover and dissolve pain confusion worries and any other distorted or limiting perspective at a fundamental level emergent uses direct mindfulness experience ultimate reality beyond any concept from your first session metaphysical therapy easily overcome any negative inner states with our ontological and epistemic tools complex research notetaking plus only map data in more than infinitycubed dimensions under your own semantics better understand reality find undogmatic god truth partial truths falsehoods through aiassisted henosis dream journaling world building connect pieces contrast them and uncover the real story dissect any system map all the moving parts of a system easily calculate if the systems fundamentally hold true all data and functionality is stored and runs only locally data never leaves your device how it all works 4 user paths tailored to your immediate need create is plus only overcome beyond breakthrough and create data structure similar to the brain internet universe all input in immaterialai is described in either nodes or links between them like neurons and synapses your introspection copilot aidriven insights  our chat ais and ai functions crawl through your data to expose inconsistencies new possibilities circular references and more multiple ways to see your mind from above we have autogenerated ancestry trees automaticallydetected mentions sanity check plus only that calculates the validity of your entire library and shows you how your library is distributed under different semantics incl postai validity clusters plus only that shows your library as interconnected clusters with points of interest cluster generation rules adjustable the automatic graphing in check for link plus only and big picture views and more smartest filters in the game filter by item category focused state oldnew me data favorites tasks plus meta models plus ancestry state and more use separately or simultaneously unlimited data definitions plus only immaterialais meta layer lets you rewrite and add new definitions to the structure of your data in over infinity3 dimensions worldfirst functionality custom tools like is it real check for link big picture are only some of the many features you will not find anywhere else rich text formatting use markdown to format any node plus only use the new builtin buttons to quickly add headers tables images inline iai nodes and links code blocks lists bold breaks and more gamified selfhelp gain experience as you use different tools unlock more advanced tools each level welcome to the new you

about_the_game: cg

degradations campain that is the same at the start but will change depending on what the player does in each area a completely open research tree lets you decide what you want as long as you have the resourcesno need to research somthing rubbish to get to somthing good your tanks are only the sum of their parts no poweryou cant move no ammoyou cant shoot no scannerno locking onto targets for you no correction thrustersyou cant flip over or drive up walls yup enimies will call for help when needed and will actively group up and search for the player if they knew you were there irritate them too much and you may find an area near impossible to survive in with 92 component slots inside the tanks body 22 armour and 9 weapon slots you will kit you tank for each mission researching new components and getting upgrades to old ones as you go picking the correct components will be important alowing you to be equipped for the right situation and to not waste valuable resources join discord to chat and see upcoming features in development
short_description: coop modular tank combat with rougelike ai generation

about_the_game: the storyteller is an online game that takes traditional ttrpg elements into a digital environment as a storyteller you can create your own world with interactive elements you can design dungeons build towns place npcs create battles and tell epic stories as a hero player you can customize your character learn skills from multiple classes gear yourself with weapons and armor and fight mighty foes in turnbased combat in traditional ttrgp it is a must to have someone who holds a session and tells the story in the storyteller it is just an option with the interactive elements everyone can create a campaign where the story tells itself
short_description: the storyteller is an online game that takes traditional ttrpg elements into a digital environment you can build your own world play online with your friends engage in roleplaying and guide them through your story
genres: adventure indie rpg strategy free to play early access

about_the_game: melody wanted a break from her stressful med classes so when spring break came around she dragged her best friend shion with her to the beach however things dont go quite so smoothly when they meet brennan a local fisherman and crylis a mermaid memories on the shoreline is an otome dating sim featuring melody a med student on her vacation of a lifetime where she meets two bachelors while at the beach brennan the cheeky ladys man whos a bit overprotective and crylis the fugitive merman whos hides behind a lot of snark how exactly is she going to get herself out of this trouble full version features 45000 words choices that alter the story amp endings two dateable bachelors brennan and crylis 5 endings cg gallery dressup extra mini game accessible outside the main game steam achievements
short_description: melody wanted a break from her stressful med classes so when spring break came around she dragged her best friend with her to the beach however things dont go quite so smoothly when they meet a local fisherman and a mermaid

about_the_game: songs of skydale is an adventure game with hackandslash combat and rpg elements the game starts with a classic adventure game opening when a player arrives at the kingdom of skydale with the hope of a new beginning for his life straight away the player gets involved in various events and quests in the kingdom of skydale as the game progress the player faces different characters items enemies dungeons and even some puzzles songs of skydale is a game by a player for players the idea of the game is to give players a sense of adventure without too much handholding so be prepared when adventuring through the lands of skydale players must navigate using paper maps and information provided by the quest givers if players enter uninhabited areas they must be ready to fight against various enemies and survive until they can reach the next safe area the game offers fastpaced hackandslash style combat which is strongly based on player skill correctly timed attacks blocks and dodges are the keys to success combat is supported by skills and items designed to have very little restrictions there are no classes in the gameplayers can choose skills freely from 19 different options players can choose to be a warrior tank mage assassin or any mix of these the skill system combined with various items that can be found or purchased gives players numerous options to shape the character stats to their liking key features  game time 615 hours  adventure rpg  open world  hackandslash style combat  25 different quests  12 different dungeons  61 different items  14 passive skills  5 spells  paper maps  quick saveload  remappable controls
short_description: songs of skydale is an adventure rpg game with charming pixel art graphics explore the kingdom of skydale make quests level up your character and fight against various enemies
genres: action adventure indie rpg early access

about_the_game: the forest prison is a fps action puzzle that gets the player to engage in an immersive singleplayer campaign across 18 levels based on a completely fictional story and characters the forest prison tells the gripping story of a detainee who tries to pass the tests imposed by the management of a prison from which no one has ever escaped alive the prison is located in a heavy wooded mountain area and has 18 sections you can escape from a section using only 3 tools  a weapon that opens portals between predefined places  a capsule that opens portals between any two points  boulders that can be used to open doors there are several methods by which you can complete a level and it is up to you to find the optimal path even if the rules are simple you must always be careful how you use the tools you have because it is very easy to get stuck in a certain area if you do not follow the right steps it took us many months of hard work and dedication to create the forest prison we had an exciting time developing the forest prison and hope you will have the same fun playing it
short_description: in 2160 political dissidents were not sentenced directly to death but were sent for cognitive and orientation tests to a prison from which no one had ever escaped alive this is the story of james webb who was sentenced to life in prison

about_the_game: aspen uncanny home is a firstperson horror game that features a heavy focus on story and exploration the player can only move and zoom in the game is designed to be difficult and does not make big changes like most games do the players actions will make small changes the story is about deserted residential streets explore with phycological fears the secrets of the tragedy will gradually become clear through your exploration and imagination this story proceeds in fragments like wandering back and forth between times and dredge a river at the same time memories are recalled the process itself is depicted while gaining a foothold create a foothold at the same time eventually an absurd story will be completed the fundamental absurdity of this world appears as a chasm reality exists only in that part of the world the curse will never abandon you
short_description: aspen uncanny home puts the player in a state of psychological terror players will find themselves in puzzling situations and search to find the hidden story

about_the_game: do you know what would make every sport better playing it in a tank battle your friends in volleyball soccer football and basketball to see who can be the best this game can be played locally with a shared screen over the internet or any combination of the two with up to three friends 4 players total if you just want to get some practice in you can play by yourself against the cpu for the best experience plug in an xbox controller if you dont have one the game will revert to keyboard controls the game is played with a variable game length of 1 to 5 minutes set by the hosting player players shoot or bump the ball onto the other teams side and score a point when the ball hits the ground in a scoring area players can jump or launch each other with missiles to their hearts content if the other team is doing a good job of keeping the ball up try sitting on it theres nothing to stop you from invading their half of the court jump aim shoot and slow fall your way to victory
short_description: volleyball in a tank

about_the_game: in the exciting game pirate fishing you play as a fisherman and your task is to catch as many fish as possible to earn a lot of money not satisfied with the pace of production spend money on pumping your fishing rod  controllability  the higher the easier it is to control the direction of movement of the fishing hook  the length of the reel affects the depth from which you can catch fish  speed  affects how fast you can get the prey out of the water  fishing time  increase the duration of fishing  dexterity  increase your level the higher the easier it will be to catch a fish  bait  raise the bait level in order to attract more fish species pump up your fishing rod and try to set a record for catching fish every time
short_description: in the exciting game pirate fishing you play as a fisherman and your task is to catch as many fish as possible to earn a lot of money pump up your fishing rod and try to set a record for catching fish every time

about_the_game: a firstperson platformer for beginners and experienced speed demons alike before you lie 60 rooms each with their own challenges and time limits and you must reach the end of each in time solving each room is a simple enough task but to achieve true mastery will require outside the box thinking to find the fastest way to complete each one and the tenacity to practice enough to perform it flawlessly 60 devious rooms filled with puzzles and parkour challenges unlockable challenges for completionists online leaderboard to track your progress against the world controller support if you like that sort of thing what are you waiting for prove yourself as the fastest
short_description: a firstperson platformer for beginners and experienced speed demons alike solving each room is a simple enough task but to reach the top of the leaderboard you will need to prove your wit and tenacity

about_the_game: if you are a fan of model trains especially of the old steam locomotives then our train game will give you hours of fun and enjoyment the game offers all steps of building model railroad in wild west style with incredible realism  you can form the landscape crate mountains hills plains and ponds and paint with different terrain textures  you can design the railway lines with the desired length and complexity and compose any number of trains from wild west style steam locos and wagons  you can control the trains manually from the control board or create fully automated control system for the switches and signals to send the trains in the desired directions  finally you can place different buildings people animals trees and bushes to finish the nice look our special feature is the night view where you can switch off the daylight and the little model lamp posts will light up the table in a magical way now with enhanced edit options detailed steam guides lot of different engines wagons buildings and with animated people and animals automated bridge and tunnel building and many more enjoy this amazing model railway game now in a gorgeous wild west style
short_description: fully functional model railway building game in wild west style create and paint the landscape place the tracks steam engines and wagons start the trains and create control sequences to direct them to the right tracks

about_the_game: you control a space station in the form of a cube that protects the planet from invaders the cube consists of towers of different colors the ships of the invaders are also of different colors you must turn the sides of the cube so that the color of the tower matches the color of the invaders ship until you do this the ship will attack the cube and take life from it as soon as life is over you will lose after the color matches the tower will fire and destroy the ship hold out for as long as possible and get points for it become the leader of the game on the leaderboard if you make all sides of the same color you will automatically win with 9999 points
short_description: you control a space station in the form of a cube that protects the planet from invaders
supported_languages: english french italian german spanish  spain bulgarian czech danish dutch finnish greek hungarian japanese korean norwegian polish portuguese  portugal portuguese  brazil romanian russian simplified chinese spanish  latin america swedish thai traditional chinese turkish ukrainian vietnamese

about_the_game: you are the gunnvr controlling a united dynamics prototype remote upgradable turret on an earth defence force shuttle intelligence has sent you to check out a large field of asteroids that has mysteriously appeared in earths orbit can you break up the rocks in time to save the civilians do you have the resolve to track down why this happened will you get rich destroying hostile enemy ships are you going to fly something better than a defence force shuttle if you have the courage you will find the answers in this spaceship turret control game for the htc vive note all settings and progress you make in the free demo will be saved to your steam cloud and automatically loaded into purchased early access and final retail versions
short_description: you are the gunnvr controlling a new upgradable turret on an earth defence force ship take on hostile enemy fighters and uncover a stellar mystery in this spaceship turret control game for the htc vive
genres: action adventure indie rpg simulation early access

about_the_game: do you like tanks if the answer is yes hop in your trusty rusty and blast your way through all 120 levels of this low stakes high action tank adventure if the answer is no feel free to pretend that theyre just fat cars with guns are you up to the task start off with training wheels in world one before the real tanks show up to crash your party fight  observe and strategize your way through challenging new tanks as you work your way through each world to defeat the boss make your own levels use the intuitive level design system to make your own unique levels or recreate specific parts of challenging levels to help you strategize  once you defeat a new type of enemy tank in the campaign it will be unlocked in the sandbox mode for use in your custom levels defeat bosses to unlock up to five custom level slots key features 19 unique enemy types 7 different playable tanks 5 worlds 5 bosses 120 levels intuitive sandbox mode 5 hidden minigames
short_description: yut yut is a game about tanks containing tanks in which many tanks die fight through this tanky tank game to face your mortal tank enemy and reclaim your tank villages lost cabbage god tanks

about_the_game: virtual reality check rooms with puzzles check a homicidal sentient robot that entices you to continue with the promise of fictional desserts … no actually we don’t have that escape the gray is a vr exclusive roomescape game each room’s puzzle is unique the number of rooms and their order is randomized with each play through get to the end play again and find something new stuck in a room play drop the candle our free minigame when you get frustrated or just throw stuff and make a mess that might help did you find all the rooms no problem new ones will be coming soon along with achievements drop the candle minigame is just dropping a candle on the floor or table its not a real minigame its not related to any puzzles it will not help you or will it
short_description: escape the gray is a vr exclusive roomescape game each room’s puzzle is unique the number of rooms and their order is randomized with each play through

about_the_game: about firekrackers firekrackers is an arcadepuzzle game in which your goal is to destroy all the blocks in the level in shortest time possible adjacent blocks of the same kind can be chained to chain distant blocks player can use chainer item there are few kinds of obstacles present to make gameplay a little bit harder d you can earn up to 3 stars for completing a level for stars you unlock new levels and weapons  there isnt too much to say about fk you just have to play it d fk is a solo project of mine i really hope you enjoy it  music created by serge quadrado
short_description: grab a firecracker and try to clean up the board as quick as possible you can chaindestroy similar blocks together use different kinds of firecrackers and rockets

about_the_game: conqueror of time is a traditional dungeon crawl rogue game with a time travel theme choose a character from different time periods and fight your way through dungeons using various items from different times and spaces battle against enemies such as pirates dinosaurs aliens robots and vikings level up your character and gain new time abilities use time travel abilities to fight alongside your past or future self features unique characters enemies weapons and items random maps each time travel through time and fight along side your self unlock new characters turnbased strategy fight in the past present and future
short_description: conqueror of time is a traditional dungeon crawl rogue game with a time travel theme choose a character from different time periods and fight your way through dungeons using various items from different times and spaces use time travel abilities to fight alongside your past or future self

about_the_game: arena above the skyline boots on the ground while firing above the cloud highrise guardian is a fastpaced online area retro fps gear up with weapons of your choice form the fighting flow with a selection of abilities and perks and dominate your enemies with map resource control make your battle style like arts to fulfill your anime gunslinger fantasies build a hero of your own in highrise guardian you can select freely select 3 weapons 2 active abilites and 2 passive perks from the area to create your own anime gunslinger weapons conveniently assassinate select from rowdy smgs ruthless longrange laser rifles rampant rocket launchers and shotguns that blow holes in your face whether you want to be a longrange sharpshooter or a closequarter gunkata master you will find your fancy way to dominate your enemies in style weapon list phased plasma 40w bolt action heavy hit energy beam weapon slow fire rate sheriff 800 lever action rifle loaded with 12g buck shot damage scaled by the number of fragments collided with enemies denzel10 fullauto high fire rate nail projectile shooting weapon projectiles take travel time to land on enemies tubescreamer10 classic rocket launcher with mid level fire rate rockets may knock back players and enemies to force position displacement wick’s sidekick semiauto magic pistol that has infinite ammo low damage output active abilities be the first to strike extra agilities stealty infiltration intel scouting and control distortion select the active abilities to put yourself on the high ground in the fight you initiated ability list wind rush quick dashing to the front for a small distant optic phase shift into full invisible for 3 seconds thermal sight detect nearby enemies in any condition magnetic intervention reverse enemies camera control input passive perks born with talents under pressure pinned down no stress the perks provides you with a passive bonus to help you overcome disadvantaged situations and outplay your enemies perk list stalker strafing speed increase to 150 under the battle berserk receiving bonus of output damage scaled by losing hp favor of battle regenerate 50 of total hp after elimination hesitation is death deal 130 to enemies by default dealing 10 less damage to enemy after receiving damage map design higher than the rooftop and wider than the canal in highrise guardian you will be assigned to one of the two fractions operators and heisters to create your class of a hero and intensely fight each other over the rooftop of the bright city downtown and overcast canal ports the maps are designed for creative interaction and dynamic combat and emphasizes vertical engagement shifting gunsight aligning and fast position change the maps also provide portals and jump pads for flanking and quick engagement most importantly be creative and get yourself on the move resources hotspot to contend securing high value pickables with map control and vantage point hold crush your enemies not only with your gun skills but also the resource dominiation
short_description: boots on the ground while firing above the cloud highrise guardian is an arena fps gear up with weapons of your choice form the fighting flow with a selection of abilities and perks dominate your enemies with map control and make an artlike battle style to become the anime gunslinger

about_the_game: mend arcade battle is a turnbased rpg inspired by fighting game core mechanics players must tackle the fighting game staple challenge known as arcade mode with a turnbased rpg twist choose your character and follow their path to defeating the final boss awaiting them at the end depending on the selected character a different final boss will be encountered mend arcade battle offers  eight unique fighters to choose from each with their own fighting styles and personalities  eight different arcade ladders with unique final bosses  customizable movesets through the assist system  a quick simple and nonintrusive tutorial that can be revisited at anytime  unlockables that will enhance future playthroughs  short quips before fights that offer an abridged version of the mend storyline  a bonus game mode that provides a glance at a future mend project gameplay  simple to learn yet hard to master  every turn the player decides on a type of guard to use an assist to call in and also an attack to unleash devastate your foes with ex and super moves  guarding and assists are optional and both use up their own resource gauges  at the end of every turn your character comments on how they perceive their foe’s stance the player must interpret this information and adapt their strategies accordingly  no long animations cut scenes or loading screens simple and direct user interface story mend arcade battle is a video game take of my story mend  read the nonabridged version for free on the online writing website wattpad i go by enntropy on that platform and the story title is mend  ingame the quips between characters before fights offer a small look into the world of mend  try your best to unlock the ingame bonus mode for a glimpse into mend’s story mode in video game form difficulty and game length all selectable characters are unlocked from the beginning so no needless grinding for the basics veteran fighting game and turnbased rpg fans alike can look forward to seeing if they have what it takes to predict their opponent’s every move the ai opponents all have their own strengths and weaknesses and will put a player’s skill and adaptability to the test every route is about forty minutes long so expect at least four hours of gameplay from the arcade game mode
short_description: mend arcade battle is a turnbased rpg inspired by fighting game core mechanics players must tackle the fighting game staple challenge known as arcade mode with a turnbased rpg twist choose your character and follow their path to defeating the final boss awaiting them at the end

about_the_game: an erotic visual novel featuring hd graphics steamy animations and realisticlooking characters cody’s journey as a gay college student continues with an intense menage at the gym as jax recruits a senior student to help them train for the football team game description episode 3 determined to secure spots on the college football team jax recruits a senior student to help him and cody regain their fitness levels reluctant at first cody quickly changes his mind when he discovers that the trainer is none other than matt sparks the notorious player who was expelled from the team due to indecent behavior in the locker room the evidence of matt’s scandalous affair caused quite a commotion across campus and cody couldn’t shake the image of that juicy ass out of his mind he needs to have him and sees jaxs offer as the perfect opportunity to pursue his longing for matt will our college boys get what they want from the trainer follow the story and find out features  hd renders and animations  video and image gallery
short_description: an erotic visual novel featuring hd graphics steamy animations and realisticlooking characters cody’s journey as a gay college student continues with an intense menage at the gym as jax recruits a senior student to help them train for the football team

about_the_game: dank tunes dank memes and everything inbetween a game about striving for your own personal standard of perfection no hand holding no fake ai to make you feel better than you are just a game about progressing your own skills for no other sake than getting good play a stupid game win stupid rewards its that simple since i am required to fill with more details lets start with the prologue you play as carlise aka lil c lil c is a retired video game action star returned back to star in one last job he is tasked with being the lead in a new game mind over melee radio in which his role is to continue to force people to get arbitrary numbers up only by getting the scores higher and higher can players unlock new game modes and continue to quell the insatiable greed of the board of directors at the end of the call you are digitized and thrust into the mom dimension this is where you make contact with snowball your liaison between lil c and the board before he even speaks to you you must sign away your life in a nda and a contract after the welcoming party you are now playing the tutorial you will learn to pick up items you will learn how to attack but most of all you will learn to raise those numbers it is imperative that every day the numbers from yesterday are larger than todays once all of the important concepts are visualized to the player you will be thrust into phase 1 the infinite grind the player is expected to grind daily weekly and monthly missions to increase the play through and click through rates to satiate the board of directors players will be compensated based on their contribution at the end of every month with the reset of the ranked ladder  you will play on a procedural generated levels contest against other players in score and time attacks to increase player engagement at the end of each month the ladder will be reset and a portion of the prize pool will be distributed to the top players on the leader board more content is purchasable in the shop but the meat and potatoes is the time trials
short_description: dank tunes dank memes and everything inbetween play a stupid game win stupid rewards fill the void in your life with some simple numerical validation for the glorious cause of the infinite grind

about_the_game: technorunner is an indie arcade game mixing rythm game and endless runner set in procedurally generated levels compete on a global leaderboard or against your friends for the highest score the music sets the pace move in the rythm and take as many risks as possible to unlock combo chains the walls are procedurally generated using a complex apm tuning algorithm can you reach the end of a song the game was carefully crafted by a solo indie developer and he hopes you like it
short_description: an indie arcade game mixing rythm game and endless runner based on techno music with procedural generation how fast can you go how high can you score find out now

about_the_game: welcome to pyramid game maybe you are wondering why you need to play this game because pyramids are everywhere in the real world pyramidal architecture has been found all over the world in the long and bright history of human civilization when you enter the game you will be given a corresponding bank account that will immediately arrive with a sum of money which will be your initial funds the bank account will be determined by the level of bank you purchase with the game itself plus the 5 dlcs totaling 6 different levels of bank accounts and the initial amount of money arriving being the minimum daily closing balance for that level of bank account please note that purchasing the dlc does not add wealth to your existing assets the 6 bank levels generate 6 separate game archives because we are not looking for players to increase their wealth in the game by purchasing the dlc but rather these 6 initial funds symbolize 6 different classes of birth we want players to experience if the different classes of birth will affect where they end up some of our dlc is very expensive even though we know that players are fully capable of buying it but we do not want players to buy it but as a contrast our original intention is to let players understand that even if they are born with a low starting point they can still through their own hard work and wisdom finally arrive at a position that belongs to them maybe in the end this position is very high maybe not so high but both are the most suitable for them the most admirable similarly even if you were born with a high starting point its not easy to maintain your position all the time please remember that you will only have this initial amount of money and we will not add any microtransactions to increase your wealth as the original purpose of this game was to ensure absolute fairness for all players you can earn salary through different jobs the current job is some completely randomly generated math calculations and english words you can choose different number of questions or words and difficulty range to earn the corresponding salary regularly do these jobs believe that you will be able to get a great enhancement of your personal ability in reality when you have enough money you can go to the casino to grow your wealth why only the casino we have considered making a savings and investment system but no matter what we did we eventually realized that more money will always have an advantage over less money and its not completely fair our casino system is also limited to dice and roulette or other games controlled by a physics engine that we can think of in the future our casino system is absolutely fair to anyone of any wealth through multiple completely random factors and is controlled entirely through mechanics with no algorithms behind the scenes interfering with the results our purpose is to create the new world of pyramid game that is completely fair why is it called pyramid game because your personal asset value in the game will be ranked in real time with players all over the world in the pyramid game global leaderboard and your wealth changes will be uploaded every minute and you can see your global ranking changes synchronously after accumulating a certain number of players the system automatically weights the total wealth of all players and the percentage of players in each segment and divides all players into a to z levels according to their rankings and wealth theoretically pyramid game supports an unlimited number of players online all around the world at the same time and uploads data every minute and refreshes the global leaderboard every 10 seconds without any delay we are sure that there will be extremely computer talented players who will play this game and maybe you want to change the value of the total assets by modifying the game data but if you look carefully at the trailer and the screenshots you should have noticed that every transaction and even every result in our casino is recorded precisely to the second even though up to 500 to 1500 history records are displayed in the game but only for different computer configurations and smooth running of the game every record of this game from the first time it was run to the last is kept intact our wealth value is through these data for multidimensional calculation and verification wealth value does not exist in any of the values in the game and even each record has a set of hash value generated by a random hash algorithm we welcome players can crack the modified data to change the wealth to affect the ranking because it is a reflection of personal ability but we do not recommend doing so even though there is currently no program added that will clear the data if it detects that it has been modified it is very probable that the modification error causing the data is incomplete resulting in you have to restart the game by the way as a reminder you can check your bank balance while working or vacationing at the casino you can even check your bank transaction details while playing at the casino then work in your free time to make the most of every minute you have pyramid game inspires you to comprehend the real world in the game hope you find your position in the pyramid early
short_description: pyramid game inspires you to comprehend the real world in the game hope you find your position in the pyramid early

about_the_game: spirit slider features five sliding puzzle games each puzzle game consist of 27 game pieces that have the ability to slide anywhere within a 3x3x3 grid at the start the puzzle game will mixed leaving the inner most space vacant the player must slide the game pieces starting with a center piece and return the puzzle to its original configuration each puzzle game can be played using a timer the last timed game and the fastest time will be saved with each puzzle game during play the player may choose to toggle the eye button when activated it will allow the player to see through the game pieces during a timed game the player may pause the game at any time by toggling the pause button next to the clock when active it will stop the clock and display a pause screen until toggled back off the player has options to select from three different pause screens and set the volume of the sounds
short_description: a single player 3d puzzle game

about_the_game: it takes a long road to become as agile as a ninja so you must complete your training in this simulated world only then you can become a ninja master speed your way through 30 stages as you try become the master of each stage being rewarded with the top prize in in stage as you grow stronger the challenges ahead grow to
