about_the_game: experience a unique escape room adventure as you play mystery box the journey  where you will encounter a perfect blend of tactile exploration challenging puzzles and astonishing environments take on the challenge of exploring mysterious locations and solving peculiar riddles you wont forget the hours spent playing this puzzle adventure and thats not all challenges and fun dont stop after unlocking all the 10 boxes and escaping the location youre trapped in because you can also play an extra minigame called the jackbox which resembles the classic hangman game and requires you to guess a variety of words to obtain aigenerated wallpapers for your device making your experience even more satisfying and enjoyable embark on an escape room journey through a collection of cunningly complicated boxes filled with enticing enigmas and brainteasers to solve each level is full of intricacy and has a portal to a new stunning environment unlock all the achievements and show the community how far you have gone this will spice up your game experience its simple user interface makes it easy to dive in but tricky to walk away from a special blend of captivating escape room puzzles awaits you ensuring an immersive experience that skillfully balances challenge and entertainment to keep you engaged for hours how many words can you guess in this extra challenge insert a token in the jackbox and find a hidden word within 5 attempts to win an aigenerated wallpaper that you can either save in your device interact with buttons levers and particular mechanisms to unlock several parts of the boxes the games audio is a product of a compelling soundtrack and dynamic sound effects in order to make your escape room experience the most realistic ever available in english french italian german spanish japanese and russian the game language will change automatically based on the language settings of your device xsgames is a solo indie game developer from italy i selfpublished the first mystery box chapter on the app stores in 2021 and got amazed by the awesome success it had with mobile game players such results changed my life so i hope youll enjoy playing the mystery box escape room adventures as much as i love making them
short_description: welcome to the 4th chapter of the popular mystery box escape room puzzle game series 10 new boxes full of enigmas to crack are waiting for you on this journey through lost worlds
supported_languages: english french italian german spanish  spain japanese russian

about_the_game: fight your way through the city play as angel a former soldier who has lost her memories and her purpose as she navigates turbulence in the manchesterliverpool district unfortunately trouble is coming her way confront the rebellion which seeks to take down the mainframe and investigate a virus turning homunculi violent unlock new memories uncover angel’s mysterious past to unlock new powers utilize forgotten memories in battle against fearsome enemies and deadly threats each memory provides new information allowing angel to piece together her past and discover the hidden truths of the conflict raging around her meet new friends or enemies expand angel’s party along the way with new allies each with their own complicated past and unique abilities however as support grows so shall resistance and everything may not be as it seems dive into the mysteries surrounding the past and future of angel through rust we are returned overview a turn based strategy game with a unique memory map system that will reveal key narrative points and new combat abilities as angel remembers her past to investigate what is happening in the manchesterliverpool district angel combats enemies in a grid based system facing new threats and gaining new party members as she progresses visually the game delivers a victoriancyberpunk style with gothic architecture play with keyboard and mouse on windows created by chaos crew productions a senior student team graduating may 2021 thanks for playing
short_description: explore the manchesterliverpool district as angel a former soldier with missing memories about her shrouded past battle homunculi gone mad during the chaos of a rising rebellion to uncover the secrets hidden deep within the mainframe

about_the_game: do you have what it takes to outrace them all outracer is a high speed futuristic racing game where you must race against aggressive opponents on massive race tracks suspended high in the air you must master your machine to get through these races drive with care and precision while boosting with reckless abandon if the enemy racers don’t defeat you the unpredictable turns of the courses will certainly try features race antigravity vehicles across massive roller coasterlike race tracks over 20 high speed tracks to test your skills over 8 unique vehicles to choose from race against up to 30 formidable ai opponents race with your friends in four player splitscreen create your own race tracks using the powerful builtin track editor play hyperspeed mode and reach speeds never before seen if you can survive long enough race to your own music using custom soundtracks
short_description: pilot your antigravity racer through massive race tracks beyond the speed of sound do you have what it takes to outrace them all

about_the_game: echo nine is intended to be reminiscent of the old arcade classic space shooters like galaga or gaplus pickups enhance the ship and its capabilities enemies ships evolve and become more difficult additional obstacles will be added as the game progresses levels will also add new and exciting events and game mechanics the currently available game mode is called survival you get one life and your goal is to survive the round and score the most points possible can you set the high score the current build is windows only there will be builds for mac and linux in the future the development will be done on windows and the alternate packages will come later future updates will include new game modes including arcade and campaign modes in arcade mode you will play stage after stage each getting tougher than the previous how far you can make it depends on your skill and luck your ship upgrades stay with you into the next round and you only reset when you die you will have a limited number of lives with the ability to earn more through in game pickups and score bonuses when your last ship is destroyed your game is over campaign mode offers you the ability to save your progress you will be able to acquire sell and buy ship upgrades before each round you can equip your ship with the upgrades you have available to you in your inventory you will unlock the ability to purchase an upgrade in the ship store when you collect that upgrade in a game roundlevel if you die you lose the equipped upgrades so be careful not to risk too much in this mode you will be able to retry each level until you complete it and there will be boss fights we hope you enjoy the game and we welcome your feedback
short_description: echo nine is intended to be reminiscent of the old arcade classic space shooters like galaga or gaplus
genres: action adventure casual indie early access

about_the_game: in this solitaire game you have to travel through 4 kingdoms and find stolen relics you have received a letter from the elven prince eldrin a huge troll has stolen the kingdom’s precious relics and broken them apart the pieces have been scattered all around the 4 kingdoms while the troll was being chased prince eldrin is asking for your help in finding his stolen relics please help to find them before the queen returns  play 150 challenging solitaire levels  find 14 missing relics  upgrade 4 kingdoms  play ho scenes to get the gold  reach highest rank by making combos and receive the badges
short_description: in this solitaire game you have to travel through 4 kingdoms and find stolen relics  play 150 solitaire and hidden object levels

about_the_game: this is a casual game in this mysterious vr game you will play a brave knight a vast desert road and a thrilling horse ride competition with a number of nuns the game adopts the first perspective mode players can feel the speed of the horses running and the beauty of the scenery making you seem to be in a real equestrian competition when the game starts you will experience the unique atmosphere of the desert and the heat of the sun you are galloping down the road on a noble horse the nuns are by your side and their horses are galloping fast you can feel the running speed of the horses and the whistling of the wind as if you are in the real world of course competitive games will definitely have other characters competing with players there will be a variety of horses competing with players in the arena in the game players can also choose different horses and each horse has its own features and abilities players can choose a partner that suits them according to their preferences in the game the player needs to control the moving direction and viewing angle of the horse through the joystick which makes you more flexible and comfortable in the game please pay attention to the timing of the start if you dont react fast enough you will be left behind by the large army in addition the track scene of the game is also very real it is an excellent casual competitive game whether you are an equestrian enthusiast or an ordinary player you can experience the excitement and fun of horse riding competitions through this game if you also want to feel the speed of horses running and the beauty of the scenery come and download this game and enjoy the fun of horse riding competitions together operation method move left handle updownleftright steering right joystick leftright reset position left handle grip key menu handle menu key

about_the_game: a cross between super mario kart and street fighter street racer takes place in a kooky cartoon world with 3d environments ranging from mount rushmore to transylvania in splitscreen mode four players can be viewed in different windows simultaneously for a behindthecar perspective in micro mode available for one to four players all players cars can be seen in an aerial view of whatever track is in play different viewing and playback options make it possible to experience every grueling twist turn and obstacle in your path from varied camera angles and positions with independent controls for each window in multiplayer modes advanced artificial intelligence gives the game s cars the ability to adapt to the player s performance the better you are the better they perform providing unlimited challenge even for the most seasoned racer street racer features 27 challenging game tracks three of them hidden four difficulty levels and eight cartoon opponents with names like frank instein green machine and surf sister each character wields special weapons ranging from towels to the ability to fly and each also has a special musical theme reflecting his or her personality for maximum variety and challenge the game offers multiple race options ranging from onelap sudden death races to endurance contests up to 80 laps plus a choice of four different gameplay modes these include a practice option where players can test their skills against any driver a basic headtohead mode for two players racing on one selected track a championship mode that allows players to design their own race mixing tracks and difficulty levels if desired and a rumble mode that lets you knock your opponents out of the ring speeds of up to 30 frames per second on the dx266 and up to 60 frames per second on pentium machines offer exceptional detail even in fourplayer mode there are also 10 different fast starts for players to explore and builtin fast laps on each track for drivers to beat the game is also packed with special surprises including hidden tracks and characters and bonus points that make it possible to win a race without finishing in first place players receive extra points for causing damage to other cars and for finishing a race damagefree cars that incur damage are penalized with slower performance repair kits available along the track can reverse the damage and turbo boosts that can be picked up along the way provide short bursts of superspeed
short_description: a cross between super mario kart and street fighter street racer takes place in a kooky cartoon world with 3d environments ranging from mount rushmore to transylvania

about_the_game: celestials amp dragons is a phases game that combines the side scrolling gameplay common in the beat em up genre with medieval features similar to some arcade games namely a hack and slash to bring back memories of the golden age  20th century approximately between the 70s and 99s of arcade games contents this game is a player mode single player does not have a mode for two players or more multiplayer after all here you are the protagonist klyght and you will need to live your story the game has only the story mode that does not alternate with player decisions it follows the original story created by the author contains 17 combat stages and 21 scenes that tell the story it is created to play until zero it does not include saving progress but if the player loses during one of the phases he will continue from there and can restart as many times as he wants until he can pass not having to worry about game over the characters combat is simple it has three different movements for attacks two for using spells one for defense one for running one for picking up items and has the directional keys here the enemies are diverse and will attack you whenever possible some with simpler melee combat mechanics and others with their different skills music and sound effects in the scenarios characters and enemies free movement through the scenarios with the screen unlocked a mechanic that is a little different from the usual one that is the locked screen but it brings greater freedom to run around the map and fight against enemies 2d game with anime and mangá appearance characters scenarios with several enemies that must be defeated to proceed to the next stage strong bosses with unique mechanics evolution of the protagonist klyght with each completed phase items to heal the players life points in some phases compatible with standard usb joystick controller for computer games incompatible with controllers from other platforms possibility to pause the game and restart stages on the keyboard and joystick controller exit the game only via the keyboard control on the keyboard visible after the games initial screen the keys with their functions control joystick right after passing the screen referring to the keyboard commands are shown commands are not modifiable within the game so it is necessary to adapt the gameplay of the game on keyboard and joystick
short_description: the new 2d hack and slash based on fantasy medieval times using mechanics inspired by old beat em ups phases games from the arcade era it has a lot of adventure action magic mystery sensational environments and diverse creatures try to beat the game and decipher this story
supported_languages: english portuguese  brazil spanish  spain japanese

about_the_game: malevolence is a 90s retro styled lowpoly first person horror adventure suddenly you wake up in an ancient castle with no recollection of how you got there you heard rumors about this place about dark rituals and the extraction of souls how it is ruled by ancient evil and that nobody who set foot on the island has ever returned as you contemplate your fate you refuse to abandon hope certain that a way out must exist you decide to explore the castle and do whatever necessary to find your way home retro 3d graphics like in the good old days explore the castle and find its secrets survive traps monster and the undead solve riddles and find hidden texts use the items within to help you find a way home the entire castle is one open world so there are no loading screens due to the engine used to develop this game being almost 20 years old some antivirus software will flag it as a false positive this game has been tested and does not include any malware if the problem persists please start the game with the engineexe in the bin folder instead i am sorry for the inconvenience and hope you will still find enjoyment within the halls of the castle sincerely ezekiel rage developer
short_description: malevolence is a 90s retro styled lowpoly first person horror adventure

about_the_game: welcome to new temperance known as the last frontier for the italianamerican mafia the two controlling la cosa nostra families are locked in a peaceful rivalry for the citys rackets you play as a young hood named vinny thats in a neighborhoodbased crew known as the beacon hill crew that was formed in his childhood years with the guidance of your uncle you learn how to make the right and wrong decisions in the underbelly of the citys underworld fraternity how to make that extra scharole there are a number of ways to make a living in the city of new temperance when a 9 to 5 doesn’t quite cut your lifestyle smash and grab truck hijacking chop shops drug dealing stickups home invasions features worth taking a pinch for… character customization  as they say look the part be the part customized vinny with a new look whatever the occasion indepth and realistic storydriven scenarios  get a real feel of what it’s like to be an upandcoming criminal within an organized crime family every mission has been created to give you a unique experience and take away that repetitive feeling empire panel  control and view information about your evergrowing empire through the empire panel money laundering  the game features a system where you will also require clean money to purchase legitimate assets in order to do this you will have to gain contacts that will turn that dirty money into clean money where to meet your goomba and where to take your goomah the city is made up of 8 different areas that all offer a unique experience just don’t go into some of the neighborhoods after 9 pm as you might lose your kidney and your wallet ferrers green  also known as little italy is the most historically riddled neighborhood of them all if youre a tourist we recommend you grab a bite to eat at carmines corner or old papas clay house harrowfield  this is an iconic situated area with cafes nightclubs and enough stores to shop until you drop terminal island  this is one of the busiest areas of the city it hosts a large terminal dock that can harbor up to 4 container ships at a single given time it’s also home to a crafty beer brewery becken garden  also known as china town or by the locals as wok city you will find some of the best cuisines and bathhouses asia has to offer fordham  irish  american neighborhood which traces back to the 1800s you want a pint of the finest ale fordham is the place to be whiteway beach  literally stuck between the old and the new in one direction you have a thriving casino in the other direction you have a onceprominent beachfront that now hosts flaxley  if you plan to drive through lock your doors if you plan to walk through there don’t one of the roughest drugriddled neighborhoods in the city where the police refuse to patrol due to the sociable residents city limits  the picturesque scenery really does put the area into perspective filled with beautiful mountains and farmland it really does create the perfect spot to hide a body gameplay features fully functioning ai for npc’s vehicle and pedestrian traffic l trainsubway system a big selection of weapons 24hour daynight cycle weather changes police ai system whats to come after early access customizable houses and hq additional mapping fully working empire panel where you will be able to control aspects of your faction business finances and bribes animals around the map ai upgrade boats carwashes more vehicles more vehicle customization options much more to follow
short_description: welcome to new temperance known as the last frontier for the italianamerican mafia the two controlling la cosa nostra families are locked in a peaceful rivalry for the citys rackets you play as a young hood named vinny thats in a neighborhoodbased crew known as the beacon hill crew
genres: action adventure casual indie early access

about_the_game: climb up on an epic adventure in the ultimate 2d platformer and rpg indie game tower of pandemonium newcomer lucius leblanc finds himself in the crimeinfested city thanatos when he stumbles upon an enigmatic priest exhausted from his long journey lucius decides to go to his apartment only to awaken in the chilling confines of a morgue after being declared deceased to his dismay his apartment documents have mysteriously disappeared without family or friends he has no choice but to serve todmann a rapacious businessman who tasked him with recovering artifacts from an accursed tower along his journey lucius also crosses paths with a charming lady who wont hesitate to use her every skill to accomplish her ambitions welcome to tower of pandemonium a groundbreaking game that will redefine your gaming experience choose your path specialize your skills and conquer the monstrous tower that stands before you this isnt just a game its a lifechanging journey that will transform your world and make your dreams come true imagine a game that not only entertains but also empowers you to become the hero of your own story in this alternate earth tower of pandemonium offers you the chance to explore a vast immersive world filled with endless possibilities as you progress through the game youll discover a whole new world of unforgettable characters and the choices you make will shape your destiny and determine the fate of your soul playing tower of pandemonium is that thrilling actionpacked adventure you never want to end the excitement of gathering materials crafting your own gear and elixirs battling fearsome monsters solving intricate puzzles and uncovering hidden secrets will keep you on the edge of your seat and youll feel a sense of accomplishment and satisfaction with each challenge you overcome the game features 6 guilds 6 classes and multiple endings but tower of pandemonium isnt just about the adrenaline rush its also a game that allows you to relax unwind and enjoy life its appealing pixel art gorgeous portraits captivating storyline and enchanting soundtrack create a magical atmosphere that will transport you to a world of wonder and delight whether youre a casual gamer or a hardcore fan tower of pandemonium offers endless hours of fun and enjoyment for everyone dont let this onceinalifetime opportunity pass you by tower of pandemonium is more than just a game its an experience that will stay with you long after youve put down the controller oh and did you know that if you die in this game youll die in real life well maybe not that much but in this game you can challenge yourself to the extreme because you only live once experience gaming to the fullest with our games difficulties including permanent death mode for those seeking a true test of skill are you ready to embrace your destiny and become the hero you were always meant to be the tower awaits seize the moment and embark on the adventure of a lifetime with tower of pandemonium today
short_description: tower of pandemonium is a topdown rpg and 2d platformer where your choices determine your fate featuring 6 guilds 6 classes action puzzles mystery and memorable characters

about_the_game: a hidden object game where you must find all the cats and wool to complete each level key features  15 unique artworks  1500 hidden objects total  750 cats  750 wool  ∞ unlimited hints if you get stuck  restore a small number of hidden objects to a painting so you can find them again  music for each artwork ⌨ use your keyboard to movezoom in if you have no scroll wheel  3x save slots  reset progress entirely and play again  timer included to show how long you took to complete each level context the brief was simple i commissioned artists to create a fantasy world and hide as many cats and wool as they can inside it now it’s your job to find them all with 15 art pieces to choose from you will have a lot of searching to do controls use your mouse to move around the image and zoom in  out when you find a cat or wool click it and it will disappear you can also use wasd to move and the arrow keys to zoom difficulty a full range of difficulty is included but all levels start unlocked your progress is saved as you play and you can use hints if you get stuck get immersed each painting has its own music to help you connect with the world as you search for everything replayable you can restore a small number of hidden objects back into a painting so you can find them again it’s much harder when there are only a few hidden objects left especially randomly you can also use up to 3 save slots so you can replay without progress loss alternatively you can reset your progress for the entire game if you’d like to start over
short_description: i paid artists to hide cats and wool in 15 pieces of artwork can you find them all warning relaxing

about_the_game: in coin chase players take on the role of a daring driver trying to evade relentless police or compete against friends in intense races the objective is to collect valuable coins while avoiding obstacles and leaving a trail of smoke to hinder opponents as the game progresses the difficulty and speed increase demanding quick reflexes and strategic thinking from players introducing coin chase  the thrilling actionpacked racing game that puts you in the drivers seat of an adrenalinefueled adventure experience the highstakes world of highspeed chases outmaneuvering opponents and collecting valuable coins as you race to the top of the leaderboards in coin chase youll have the choice to play in one or twoplayer mode go solo and test your skills against the relentless police or invite a friend to join the action as you compete for the highest score in both modes youll dodge obstacles collect coins and strive to stay ahead of the law all while leaving a trail of smoke to hinder your opponents the game features dynamic gameplay with increasing speed ensuring an exhilarating experience as you strive to evade capture and claim victory and with each coin collected youll power up and gain an edge over your competition the not so stunning visuals combined with a heartpumping soundtrack create an immersive environment that will transport you to the highoctane world of highspeed racing the easytolearn controls ensure a smooth and enjoyable gaming experience for players of all skill levels coin chase is the ultimate racing challenge that will test your reflexes strategy and determination can you outwit your opponent and become the ultimate driver buckle up hit the accelerator and find out get ready for the ride of your life  download coin chase now and leave your rivals in the dust trailer music is made by dreamprotocol from pixabay
short_description: coin chase is a thrilling actionpacked racing game where players evade the police or compete with friends in highspeed chases collect coins outmaneuver opponents and leave a trail of smoke in this captivating and addictive racing adventure

about_the_game: at the beginning of the design the game made clear its unique mechanism open content and system fragmented interaction and narrative and role growth in random at present it is preliminarily formed i look forward to communicating with you and sharing inspiration steam communitybabel climbers discordbabelclimbers hopeless ignorant and fearless the world is a closed tower the mission of the tower climbers is to keep up pass on information and history and explore a new world understand the changes of each layer of the world through interaction in the details explore the future of mankind its a world of new mechanism the floor is made of bricks click on the dice to move randomly and talk to the characters you meet there are plenty of possibilities in this simple way you can cut down trees to get wood or you can fertilize them to get more profits next time you pass you can give to beggars or do something bad random brick runes can affect your situation defeat the tower keeper in a limited time this is the world of relativity the combat adopts the design of time points and playing hand cards always spend relative time points always turn to low point characters create a hard straight to attack the opponent observe the state to determine the timing learn from the master the skills of different qualities and match all factions freely this is a world of rich products in adventure items will always affect you and npc characters drop and strengthen the equipment of random affixes create the artifact with unique destiny skills and match with your card school cook delicious food and eat everywhere it not only increases physical strength but also brings permanent attribute growth you will also use medicine musical instruments letters books defecation promote the cycle of history a tower climber has fallen and the next generation has already packed all kinds of life but never give up the game won only 23 hours but the world will advance under high difficulty and the content and ending will change the equipment can be permanently saved as a relic and can be collected with a specific recipe in the future game dont say much go and collect
short_description: a unique roguelike game refreshing interaction fragmented random encounter simple but interesting the whole world is a tower and the mission of the climber is to keep going up and write a epic with a bit hope however this is a strange world and this is a journey that cannot be turned back
genres: adventure casual indie rpg strategy early access

about_the_game: extreme seasonal change defines the cycle of life in the northernmost reaches of the globe in venture arctic the player controls the forces of earth sun wind and water to bring summer and winter to polar bears orcas and more venture arctic is an ecosystem simulator with a twist the player is rewarded for both life and death for every animal that passes on the player collects a spirit which they can then use to bring change to the environment players might spend this spirit to create winds blowing the smells of a beached whale to a starving wolverine or they might blanket the tundra in snow and ice to weed out the weak musk ox from the strong while the controls are simple the systems are complex players must understand the mating behaviors of the caribou the feeding patterns of arctic cod and the social structures of arctic wolves in order to succeed most of all players will learn that an ecosystem’s survival depends upon seasons of plenty and of hardship of life and of death
short_description: the second entry in the pocketwatch games backcatalog venture arctic is an interactive nature documentary caribou and wolves roam the tundra while polar bears and orcas patrol the icy seas the player must harness the forces of sun snow and wind to create balance in these fragile ecosystems

about_the_game: about this game climb the tower and return to man jumping frog uses only one mouse to play the game be careful not to fall you may need to start all over again controls control is very easy move the camera to the mouse jump with the right mouse click leftclick to move to the next floor the esc key allows you to pause the game
short_description: jumping frog is a game in which a prince turned into a frog climbs a tower to return to human life enjoy the rugged adventure of returning to human life right now

about_the_game: the story welcome to legenia the nicest land in the archipelago or at least it was the island was attacked monsters are running loose and the local hero has mysteriously disappeared you are the only hope we have left this world needs new heroes i hope youre one of them gameplay ultimate legends is a turnbased game reminiscent of the popular snes rpgs fight in turns and incorporate strategy into your battles guide your heroes across dungeons and lands where you will be presented with multiple puzzles to solve before proceeding solve the puzzles and you will have the chance to fight with the boss monsters every defeated boss monster unlocks more puzzles solve them all to win the game features customise your characters create your own heroes choose their role from 30 different classes make this adventure your adventure overcome difficult trials solve countless puzzles actually around 21 traverse 6 challenging dungeons to save legenia take strategy to battle every move must be planned choose poorly and suffer defeat choose wisely and become a legend battles are conducted with a popular turnbased system friendly to all ages you cant hurt yourself even if you try battle ancient evil fight back against the great monsters of the past battle familiar faces as well as new characters some may or may not be scary do not expect these creatures to go easy on you
short_description: the island of legenia is being attacked can you defend it this world needs new heroes will you be its ultimate legends lets find out

about_the_game: pathosis is an early access combatrpg game created by experienced players the game itself is taking place in an infected medieval world where a few selected knights that have survived the pathosis fight against the undead warriors that roam the world as you progress throughout the game not only will your character grow stronger and learn new skills but you as a player will develop new playstyles and gain knowledge that will greatly improve your chance of survival in this ever more difficult world explore the world of pathosis and save it from this great infection
short_description: pathosis is an early access combatrpg game that takes place in an infected medieval world a few selected knights have survived the pathosis and are now fighting against the undead warriors that roam the world you are one of the knights so go and explore the world of pathosis and save it from this great infection
genres: action adventure indie rpg early access

about_the_game: game features life or detah your choice you need to survive on the last day of earth with limited backpack space supplies are hidden at somewhere explore it be careful every decision you make may related to your life and death battle with a variety of zombies remember to always to be ready and prepared to face varieties zombies come from nowhere zombies who know the sound in addition zombies also have hearing ability to recognize the surroundings your running exploring shooting or attacking will attract the attention of zombies you can attack zombies by sneaking overall arrangement strategies night is the real battlefield the zombies are extremely powerful in the night you need to arrange and build your own defenses before dark cooperate with your friends exchange your supplies with other survivors and make friends with them when you meet them they could be your partners but remember that not all survivors are friendly maps diversity you will be reborn in different location face different map and new experience if you die
short_description: jungle z is a doomsday survival game

about_the_game: scarlet thread is a deck building game  you could build up your deck with your own card and fight with other players at rank game players could build up your deck with hero cards equipments  spells and followersin the action phase both sides will deploy cards simultaneously deploying them in different areas after the turn ends the cards of both sides will automatically fight players who win in different areas will receive more resources or cause damage to the enemy we also provide a pve mode based on the same battle structureyou could start up with a random deck or build your own deck for your own journey pve mode would generate dungeons randomly so you will always facing unknown dungeons onece you finish the pve fight  you could get more cards which you could build into your deck
short_description: scalet thread is a deck building game our core game is based on pvp ranked game more postion strategy more resource management fight at winning blocks and get more resource at junglepve mode provided is a roguelike deck building game you could pick up random cards during the pve sessions

about_the_game: slade is a young and outstanding thief who has grown up between the filthiest thugs and bandits of a famous illicit activities guild which since immemorial times has ravaged the eastern lands  however the king of these lands someone who was a respectable and fair person has dramatically changed he has become greedy sullen and excessively cruel magically he founded new elite of guardians who seemed to be possessed by a demon they managed to find all the hideouts of this huge guild and they murdered all their members… except slade who could barely escaped since then the kid has remain hidden planning his vengeance and a way to loot the eastern lands in order to reestablish a new and more powerful guild with him as king of thieves  world map you can move through it and choose multiple destinations from the map it can be distinguished levels  requiredaccess destinations in order to advance in the game blocked levels  in red  will not be available  in green  until the current level is finished  in gray  special zones  everything that is not levels  normally in the shape of a house or a tent  you can access to minigames so as to obtain more points or support items or you can perform additional missions minigames  they serve as a complement of the main game and the additional mission bosses  they are in certain levels and each one has their own mechanics beat all game levels in those which allow bonus the more you can unlock the better complete the additional mission if you have unlocked the entire possible bonus too you can enjoy an extra extension in the game discover all the achievements the game offers through steam
short_description: enter this arcaderpg adventure incarnating the young thief slade go through multiple places to loot in the eastern lands visit special zones face several bosses and discover various minigames and additional extras

about_the_game: take to the high seas as a swashbuckling buccaneer in cutlass you are a pirate grab the helm to sail your ship around an archipelago fighting off rival pirates with your cunning and broadside cannons try to beat your previous times in time trial mode racing your ship through checkpoints to reach the finish line an htc vive is required to play cutlass features ship control  you have full control over the direction and acceleration of your ship to captain it wherever you would like to explore naval artillery amp warfare  load the cannons adjust the pitch and yaw then fire at will you will need to be strategic with the timing and trajectory of your cannon fire to ensure that you sink your opponents before they sink you day and night  the lighting and mood changes depending on the time of day weather  the weather changes randomly a sunny afternoon can be interrupted by a thick fog or heavy rain just be careful to watch where youre going or you might scuttle your ship in shallow waters time trial  race through checkpoints to best your previous scores on a time trial course ship simulation  your ships buoyancy moves with the sea which provides a uniquely new experience
short_description: take to the high seas as a swashbuckling buccaneer in cutlass you are a pirate grab the helm to sail your ship around an archipelago fighting off rival pirates with your cunning and broadside cannons

about_the_game: wizard world fighting morvagor is an exciting adventure action game set in a fantastic world full of magic and danger in this world the evil morvagor a powerful demon from hell has taken possession of the dinosaurs using their powerful power to destroy the world and subdue it to themselves you play the role of a young wizard or witch who is the last hope for the world their task is to confront the powerful and dangerous dinosaurs who have been possessed by morvagora the player must acquire new skills develop their magic and command a team of heroes to defeat each of the dinosaurs and morvagora itself the game offers a variety of missions and tasks that lead the player through different regions of the wizarding world he must explore mysterious forests snow landscapes and many other locations looking for the clues and artifacts needed to defeat morvagor during the adventure the player will be able to perfect their magical skills acquire new spells and discover powerful artifacts that will help him in the battle he will also be able to recruit companions to his team such as other wizards warriors who possess unique skills and can provide support in difficult situations fights in the game are dynamic and exciting the player will have to use their tactical skills and strategies to successfully defeat the possessed dinosaurs he can use a combination of spells blocks escapes and special attacks to inflict as much damage as possible on his opponents as the game progresses the plot develops and players discover the secrets of morvagor and his plans they must face not only his army of dinosaurs but also other evil creatures from hell and the traps that await them on their way
short_description: world of wizards fighting the morvagore demon of hell offers rich graphics captivating plot and exciting gameplay that provides hours of adventure and entertainment will players be able to defeat morvagora and save the world from destruction it depends on their skills courage and determination

about_the_game: welcome to join the qq discussion group we will follow every game related information fan qq group 645822693 also welcome to follow the bilibili account and stay updated on the latest development progress bilibili account game background in china there is a peaceful and beautiful country inhabited by pandas of various races they are usually gentle and friendly but when faced with threats they will demonstrate strong combat effectiveness these races all have their own unique characteristics and skills the bamboo forest tribe pandas who live in dense bamboo forests they are famous for their expertise in using bamboo to make tools and weapons and their skills are very exquisite the ice and snow clan panda has a unique white fur and can survive in extremely cold environments it is skilled in ice and snow magic and can summon the power of ice and snow elements there are also flame clan pandas who live in tropical areas near volcanic craters their fur appears bright red and the pandas of the flame clan possess powerful flame abilities that can be used to attack enemies there are also more races such as the wisdom clan and diablo clan appearing one after another this country is facing a huge crisis with evil forces threatening its peace and security in order to protect their homeland pandas of various ethnic groups have decided to unite and fight against evil forces together game features each character can carry 6 automatic weapons 30 unique characters to experience the different levels of fun brought by different characters provide 25 basic and 6 advanced optional special weapons such as pulling monster leather straps bubble wrapped lucky koi vietnam war stronger bear claw fists more weapons can be discovered and explored on your own over 100 optional props 20 wave level breaking waves and infinite wave challenge waves are waiting for you pursue every battle to be cool peaceful and fast
short_description: in china there is a peaceful and beautiful country inhabited by pandas of various races they are usually gentle and friendly but when faced with threats they will demonstrate strong combat effectiveness

about_the_game: final m00n is a horizontal bidirectional 275d shooter like no other before a space shooter a million years ahead of our time get ready for an experience like youve never had before combine strategic thinking quick reaction and making decisions about life and death key elements influence time in different ways use your protective sphere try to combine everything that this bleak environment gives you to escape the aliens once more protect amp heal your three cubes amp your own ship amp if you can amp the price does not seem too high save a few survivors  this is not a simple shoot em up it is a strategic experience with countless ideas types of action amp decisions that you have to make survive the deadliest amp most unreal environments in an apocalyptic future scenario that has never been seen before save the last of your species and sacrifice precious resources or endure your moral conflicts by leaving them to their fate to save your own skin  more than 20 levels with hours over hours full of fun and thrilling gameplay filled with secrets awaiting to be discovered levels are never the same and opponents and surivors always have random behaviour patterns a detailed tutorial that gives you a step by step walkthrough of what has changed in over a million years and what you need to understand to find a way to survive choose between three different spaceships with different characteristics such as speed nimbleness turnspeed destructive capacity weapon energy storage protection timesc0pe and spheres that make your journey a different challenge every time use the different difficultysettings amp gamemodes like the hardcore mode that leaves the cubes and their protection up to you and your healing skills for the whole journey the arcade mode that takes you back to the good old days before 1980 there are no savegames here no holding hands and no easymode here you really need skill to achieve something  and if you reach it the final m00n one lastendless m00n a challenge that never ends  background what happens if in more than a million years the last humans have to fight for their survival uninhabitable planets and a far superiour alien race from which they hide on m00ns your only chance at survival is to protect the three devices that make your m00n inhabitable cube alpha gives energy cube beta gives food cube gamma gives oxygen if you lose one you lose your life… the last humans forced by the uninhabitable environments of the planets commute from m00n to m00n is it time for you to die too like all the other millions of humans their nameless bodies still aimlessly floating through space  where once upon a time was the earth  and now only a few rock chunks and what if what if you could slow down time itself what if you could nearly stop the time for the whole galaxy but not for you what if you could generate a sphere which stay in place for a short while and protects everything in it  and what if you could combine all these things can you be everywhere at the same time can two simultaneous points be protected at the same time can you overtake your own laser and by the way how relative is short if you can manipulate time in final m00n with the art of manipulating time this and much more becomes possible could you survive and reach final m00n in one way or another  one m00n will be your final m00n and never forget you are not alone the highest form of life is never far her technique her thinking and her entire civilization are a million years ahead of you and you will not be undetected for a long time even on the smallest of m00ns are you up to it can you reach the final m00n oh and if you meet a survivor think better of you and your survival believe me d ont try to be a hero
short_description: there is no room for heroes and survival is almost hopeless excessively inferior you will be hunted mercilessly more than a million years in the future there is no earth nor humanity  only a few survivors  who desperately protect what is keeping them alive on the m00ns 3 cubes

about_the_game: classical inheritance of tetris gameplay super casual and super decompression let you keep on eliminating layers another major feature is the addition of a combat mechanism by eliminating blocks to attack the opponent or defend see who can fight to the end brawl mode it can accommodate 8 players in the same arena and the chaos is free to choose to attack the opponent attack or defend only the one who survives to the end is the winner cartoon image the cute and funny alien baby turns into tetris and strikes you first version this is the first version we have launched we will continue to improve the content and launch subsequent versions please understand if the experience is incomplete
short_description: fighting block is a casual online game that eliminates cubes attacks opponents by eliminating cubes multiplayer online realtime battles cute realtime interactive feedback classic tetris gameplay combined with popular chaos chickeneating mode come together to eliminate layer by layer

about_the_game: control a group of special agents find a monster on the map and place the agents so that they can defeat the monster the game is a classic firstperson shooter where you control a character using the keyboard and mouse and your task is to shoot the enemy using a variety of weapons you control each agent in turn he can shoot and inflict damage on the monster but if the monster reaches the agent he will die the players task is to find where the monster is and carefully bring as many agents to it as possible then when all the agents are nearby they will start an automatic attack on the monster the players goal is to kill the monster having placed the special agents correctly in front of each character there are 3 boxes of weapons a rifle a shotgun and a sniper rifle you need to decide which weapon to choose which character your task is to bring all the characters to one point to where the monster is
short_description: control a group of special agents find a monster on the map and place the agents so that they can defeat the monster

about_the_game: build towers defeat bosses and play on various epic maps explore a vast number of different stages while protecting the sea use the gold acquired on the way to improve skills and get stronger fight against pirate ships the great white shark and several other opponents during your journey
short_description: a tower defense game that will bring challenge and many hours of fun get ready for battle in this amazing navalthemed game

about_the_game: identify which tiles have mines by the numbers displayed in neighboring tiles special features zooming and scrollingboth discrete and smooth so boards are only limited in size by your computers memory and not by your screens resolution multimine tiles up to seven mines can be on one tile hold down flag to add flags until the numbers match toroidal boards that wrap left to right and top to bottom endless survival mode quickly clear the board as it descends you take damage if the lowest row has unopened nonmine tiles when it falls off the board hot keys for quickly opening all 4 corners
short_description: a puzzle game of logic and probability identify mines and clear boards across eleven difficulties the dreaded survival mode and custom boards of sizes limited only by your computers memory good luck youll need it

about_the_game: experience the thrilling and immersive world of escape from voyna a highoctane gripping singleplayer shooter set during the tumultuous era of the cold war this actionpacked game unfolds on russian soil following numerous nuclear tests the country lies in ruins consumed by an apocalyptic catastrophe as a covert secret agent your mission is to navigate the treacherous terrain of an isolated island fighting to escape the clutches of enemy soldiers and elude capture prepare for an intense realistic and adrenalinepumping adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat survive in this unique world and experience a mysterious world in the midst of the cold war global superpowers vie for supremacy relentlessly pursuing the development of ever more powerful nuclear weapons these deadly creations are tested on remote islands far from prying eyes unfortunately fate intervenes and you find yourself stranded on one of these isolated islands as an undercover american secret agent your mission is to evade capture by the formidable russian special forces of the rsws your survival and the balance of power hang in the balance as you navigate this treacherous landscape in the midst of the cold war global superpowers vie for supremacy relentlessly pursuing the development of ever more powerful nuclear weapons these deadly creations are tested on remote islands far from prying eyes unfortunately fate intervenes and you find yourself stranded on one of these isolated islands as an undercover american secret agent your mission is to evade capture by the formidable russian special forces of the rsws your survival and the balance of power hang in the balance as you navigate this treacherous landscape you need to find food or medical supplies to heal yourself immerse yourself in a vast arsenal of meticulously modeled weapons within the game experience the realistic recoil that adds an extra layer of challenge emphasizing the importance of aiming precisely before taking your shots keep in mind that ammunition is limited adding a strategic element to your gameplay make every shot count and manage your resources wisely to overcome the hurdles you face prepare for formidable adversaries that will keep you on your toes the advanced ai is keenly aware of your every move detecting even the faintest sound of your footsteps and shots they will relentlessly hunt you down with precision accuracy beware as the ai is capable of coordinating with each other as a cohesive team utilizing cover effectively to outsmart them its advisable to adopt stealth tactics familiarize yourself with their patrol routes and potentially evade certain enemies altogether remember time is of the essence and the ai seldom misses its mark in many instances escape or avoidance may prove to be the wiser course of action atmospheric graphics based on unity dx11 with unity engine and dirextx 11 we created a beautiful living world you just want to immerse in enjoy the trees grasses and stunning light effects get the maximum out of your pc and experience aaa worlds realistic 71 surround sound experience realistic gun sounds of ak and friends in 71 surround sound quality let the ambience of the surroundings enchant
short_description: escape from voyna is an action packed realistic single player shooter set in the era of the cold war on russian soil after many nuclear tests the land is devastated and apocalypse spreading you a secret agent stranded on an island try to escape without getting caught by enemy soldiers

about_the_game: using translator this short game has fewer interactions and a longer textual storyline this is a 2d pixel style storyline game born in rpgmaker players need to obtain more scene information and advance the main plot through simple mobile clicks facing the truth that has been unraveled self rating 610  bilibili

about_the_game: all you wanted to do was go for a little jog but look at this someone dumped a bunch of trash in front of your house itll be quite a project to clean this all up start with the trash on your street corner upgrade your capacity and start exploring your town for other effective ways to keep it a pleasant and safe place to live and watch out for pollution from the factories originally started as a submission at eco jam for earth day 2022 now expanded and improved with more gameplay single player game for mouse and keyboard includes exploration of your town several methods of cleaning it up based on realworld solutions stats screen to show your progress and multiple ways to win drmfree
short_description: a 3d exploration game where your goal is to clean up your neighborhood but litter on the sidewalk isnt the only problem youll need to solve

about_the_game: futa on female try as you might you simply cannot please your wifeespecially in the bedroom one unfortunate day you end up with a flat tire and without the wherewithal to solve the problem your wife once again goes off on a tangent about how useless you are fortunately an unlikely candidate swoops in to save the day oh and cuck you  read through some pretty raunchyerotic dialogue accompanied by spicy nude depictions gameplay kinetic visual novel hscenes 4k words immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the firstperson perspective
short_description: just because you cant please your wife doesnt mean she cant be pleased

about_the_game: in a world of magic run by idiots there is the lawless sea a place where piracy rules where the omnipresent patriarchy has dominion in every country but a growing resistance is moving the upset the established order in this world a privateer named eric will upset his girlfriends mother be transformed against his will and made to join the resistance what will follow is a bizarre comedy of interesting circumstances and characters as chaos reigns will heshe embrace their new identity or oppose it the choice is up to you playing both sides is an rpgmaker game in the jrpg style it features artwork lovingly crafted by an unemployed mathematician and other much better artwork made by an actual artist the game features mechanics and a combat system built by aforementioned mathematician with a few nods to real life swordsmanship what this games lacks in visuals it makes up for in mechanics tactics will usually be the deciding factor in every fight other features include gender bending witches pirates title ix investigations trolls lessons on the safe use of explosives chosen ones lots and lots of cats math more witches pop culture references to things from before you were born and fetch quests
short_description: playing both sides is a jrpg with a unique battle system and 10 hours of play

about_the_game: escape the busy daily grind and become a baby again the ultimate game for recapturing the pure joy of babyhood that weve all forgotten by simply shaking a rattle you can unlock the infinite possibilities that lie dormant within you simplicity that anyone can enjoy this game is something that people of all ages can quickly enjoy whether you are a beginner or an expert you can experience the joy of freely shaking a rattle unexpected surprises and moments of smiles experience the unpredictable humor that lurks in each and every moment of daily life sentences are randomly generated based on the combination of when who and what making you break into a smile unexpectedly learn again grow again by shaking the rattle rediscover the fresh surprises and curiosity you felt as a baby by exploring new movements and rhythms the inner baby within you will grow once more a beautiful world from a babys perspective beautiful landscapes and graceful music will help you rediscover the world from a babys perspective by looking at the world from a new viewpoint a peaceful feeling and a tranquil atmosphere are born
short_description: escape the busy daily grind and become a baby again the ultimate game for recapturing the pure joy of babyhood that everyone has forgotten

about_the_game: spend and adventurous summer working as a park ranger in a stunning national park visit areas of outstanding natural beauty such as lakelands woodland trails mountain vistas outdoor activities rock climbing horse riding mountain biking and many more enjoy a beautiful collection of hidden object scenes and puzzles set in the great outdoors tidy up the park and do your bit for the environment by collecting all the bonus trash items to recycle earn extra bonuses for finding all the lost amp found items scattered around the park stunning scenes of natural beauty fabulous hidden object scenes find hundreds of extra bonus items interactive map for scene replay spend a summer vacation as a park ranger
short_description: enjoy a beautiful collection of hidden object scenes and puzzles set in the great outdoors tidy up the park and do your bit for the environment by collecting all the bonus trash items to recycle earn extra bonuses for finding all the lost amp found items scattered around the park

about_the_game: nautikins the nautikins have evolved from a species similar to dolphins to inherit the planet after untold eons masters of boat building they have set out to dominate the seas with exploration and shipping routes features boat building buoyancy physics plane building helicopter building airfoils  aero drag multiplayer vessel building system dynamic weather dynamic ocean simulation waves underwater simulation many islands to explore inventory system vessel damage system trade routes and shipping building there is an elaborate vessel building interface that allows you to build sea or air vessels in an open world drydock or runway respectively building vessels can be complicated so check out some of the community guides exploration a massive open world  ocean map filled with islands awaits you be warned though if you go to far out to sea currently 50km the sea monsters may think you are lunch multiplayer multiplayer supports every feature that is supported in single player you can build boats and deploy them and your friends will see them and be able to crew or captain them some functionality may be authorized only by the owner of the server depending on the effect chat the game includes a very basic low profile text based chat to allow for communication during multiplayer it is intended primarily as a quick message relay and to aid players in connecting on discord or steam chat weather physical weather systems rain storms fog wind etc move around the map and can be monitored for your vessels safety on a journey the further away from the protection of the islands the more intense the affect the weather will have on your vessel and the ocean waves around you be prepared for severe weather such as tidal force waves and whirlpools
short_description: you are the nautikins the dominant species on this ocean planet build boats planes and helicopters to explore a vast sea filled with islands and mysteries play in a sandbox with unlimited parts or a campaign where you strive to reach your goals embark with online multiplayer or singleplayer
genres: action adventure casual indie racing simulation early access

about_the_game: the water is rising run for high ground can you save the helpless little children its up to you to make your way through danger and survive the fury of the tsunami doctor tsunami is an evil scientist whose off shore drilling operation is causing massive tsunamis that plague the small popoy island nation play as barry shanebuchan and hunt down the mad scientist causing the tsunamis there are hundreds of levels you must navigate crumbling mazes run wild chases and save yourself while you rescue helpless victims along the way before the tsunami kills everyone beat levels by making it to high ground collect stars by rescuing lost children stars mark your progress in saving lives lowering tidal dangers to open up new levels and regions to explore full of many more lives to save there are over 180 levels 17 regions in a vast progressivelyopen world map full of villages cities beaches and all kinds of adventure the tide is surging the surf is up only you can stop doctor tsunami if you survive
short_description: doctor tsunami is a retro style action game featuring a compelling storyline full of various characters and surprising twists all artwork was created using exclusively ms paint huge waves are destroying the island nation of popoy you must survive and stop the evil scientist dr tsunami

about_the_game: cosmotic blast is an asteroid game in an immersive experience you have never seen before stand amongst a swirling cluster of asteroids in space as you pilot a ship blast and destroy wave after wave of asteroids and collect the powerful cosmotic energy embedded in the rocks the more energy collected the greater the upgrades to enhance your ship making it faster stronger and more resilient you’re going to need it as enemies and obstacles try to get in your way features deep into the asteroid unique procedurally constructed matrix of blocks with a slight gap enables you to see the upgrade blocks deep within the asteroid made for vr you stand and interact with the asteroids as though you were in space with them watch out dont break up the asteroids too much persistent profile tracking the energy you collect to unlock better and more powerful upgrades is saved from one game to another profiles for the family do you like to track your own progress claim a profile and start blasting leaderboards the whole house totals stack to keep up with the top tear players or friends cloud saving got two locations but want one high score say hello to cloud saving continue and comeback need a break save and exit and come back another day with the same core upgrades at the same wave of asteroids have a blast blastin’ this blast from the past
short_description: cosmotic blast is an asteroid game in an immersive experience stand amongst a swirling cluster of asteroids in space as you pilot a ship blast and destroy wave after wave of asteroids and collect the cosmotic energy to enhance your ship making it faster stronger and more resilient

about_the_game: shipwrecked on the mysterious shores of an uncharted island your determination for survival is put to the test embark on the journey alone or with allies as you unravel its secrets battle build structures refine your crafting and triumph over lurking foes in this intriguing land unveil the islands secrets explore the mysteries of the islands landscape venturing into unexplored areas step into the shoes of a pirate and engage in strategic battles against your foes construct craft and outlast as you navigate the islands mysterious terrain collect vital resources to craft weapons tools fortifications and defenses all while contending with hidden dangers cooperative endeavors face the trials of this uncharted island individually or in the company of allies share resources synergize efforts and collaboratively establish fortified bases to conquer the challenges that await

genres: action adventure indie massively multiplayer rpg strategy early access

about_the_game: a museum of self and space should be a reminder of not only the beauty we can bring into the world but how cruel that beauty can be a museum of self amp space is a series of interactions paired with visual elements that hope to elicit specific emotions from you amosas is not fun you cannot win it isnt polished or true or fake it is a collection of ideas being communicated to you by jack hart games you explore a museum created by jules a queer architect whose last work will be an exhibit focused on their failures moral romantic professional failures i wanted to make a game where we see a strong nonbinary person old enough to look back on their life and recognize the mistakes made along the way i dont know if theres a moral or a point in that way what i do know is that amosas is honest i think honest works are important if you any of that sounds interesting to you please support me by purchasing and playing my game
short_description: museum of self amp space is a narrative game about inner demons and how theyre reflected in the world around us

about_the_game: this immersive journey takes you deep into the heart of parliamenta canadian landmark and architectural masterpiece whose doors are now closed as you travel through the building the spaces around you surge to life with magic realism animals spring from stone walls empty rooms echo with voices of the past and figures who helped shape canada for over 100 years return to take their place in the halls of democracy blending photorealism with vivid sound colour and light parliament the virtual reality experience is an unforgettable glimpse into the centre of canadian decisionmaking the vr journey is brought to you by the library of parliament and the national film board of canada runtime 15 minutes
short_description: this immersive journey takes you deep into the heart of parliament where an iconic building surges to life with magic realism animals spring from stone walls empty rooms echo with voices of the past and figures who have helped shape canada return to take their place in the halls of democracy
genres: free to play indie simulation animation  modeling education photo editing

about_the_game: introduction pixel robot hunter is simplistic 2d shooter platformer with pixel graphics player is robot who want gold so kill enemies in different levels and find gold treasure levels contain different enemies  flying and running goblins enemy bats and spike bosses in end of every levels also different traps like firespikes which will kill player player can also collect different weapons like spacerifle and firebomb weapons which is powerful weapon against bosses also health pickups are available game contains also checkpoint system where player will respawn after death first version contains 9 levels and test level where player can check out different enemies pickups and features robot player and enemies can also shoot through walls features  9 levels  checkpoint system  doublejump  health system  player sliding feature  test level which show all important features of game  3 different weapons normal rifle laser rifle and firebomb weapon  ammo pickups  health pickups  4 different enemies flying goblin running goblin bats spike bosses with weapons  camera shakes  flying platformers  super jump barrels  controllergamepad support read manual file where is added gamepad and keyboard controllers
short_description: pixel platformer player robot mission is kill enemies and find gold treasure

about_the_game: alone is a first person time based survival game lost in the woods of orah something is hunting you gameplay you must keep your lamp lit by destroying enemies and casting your magic to keep them at bay should you survive the first night the next is just around the corner survive as long as possible until your light goes out features  single shot to rapid fire shooter mechanic  left mouse button  either can be pressed for a single shot or held down for rapid fire  projectile bouncing designed for trick shots and using the environment to your advantage to overcome obstacles  light mechanic acting as your source of progression throughout a given session this must be kept lit by slaying mobs throughout the level in order to progress to the next day  day to night mechanic throughout a level you must stay alive until the night turns to day going hand in hand with the light mechanic
short_description: alone is a first person time based survival game lost in the woods of orah something is hunting you

about_the_game: explore the empty russian streets filled with depressive athmosphere find all the interesting places feel the sharm of an lately abandoned postsoviet town walk through all the streets and avenues you can find gameplay walk through all the streets and avenues you can find in this city filled with panel buildings that are common fo russia all you can do is to explore and discover all the points of interest you can find map there are two maps with different settings  winter and early autumn soviet buildings concrete fences broken roads trees growing where they shouldnt be mud and rust literally everywhere thats the feeling of athmosphere graphics the graphics were meant to be the 11 copy of the real world all the modern features of postprocessing were used in the game

about_the_game: captain clive dfd is a topdown and first person shooter where you defeat waves of aliens while upgrading gear tear through progressively harder hordes of aliens get better guns and armor or build your way to victory can you balance your way to the top loads of enemies with over 50 enemies and 7 bosses theres never a dull moment different enemy types make you rethink your strategy constantly while also progressively getting more difficult pick your poison dual wield any weapon or work for a better gun overall with over 70 different guns youll get plenty of opportunities to try stuff out you can even pass off weapons to your robotic sidekick play to your strategy focus on upgrading guns sure getting hurt too much buy some armor want a more passive approach turrets traps and defensive walls can all help there are tons of choices you can make and your strategy is your own  how will you choose to play
short_description: a wavebased horde shooter where you kill aliens while upgrading gear

about_the_game: heartbeat girlfriend is the first multiending interactive video application of a lovethemed vr platform independently developed by zhongqingbao holding hands in parallel time and space in a hyperrealistic vr love experience the heartbeat girlfriend vr love app is set in a college campus and users enter the application scene with a firstperson 360° panoramic view where they meet a girl who is excited and lead users to immerse themselves in the sweet and wonderful moments of real love and dating with a super immersive immersive interactive experience product highlights 1 screen based on realistic style ultrahighdefinition real shooting of characters and scenes the picture is more realistic add edge effects to some screens to avoid visual fatigue for players 2 narrative cut in from the first perspective show the real love scene and increase the users sense of participation and immersion add auxiliary npcs to promote the plot and make the plot fuller 3 interaction low entry threshold simple operation and interactive links can be triggered through specific items or episodes trigger multiple plots according to user selection to stimulate users desire to explore interested players can join our qq exchange group 540344245 and if there are any suggestions you can exchange feedback inside
short_description: holding hands with her in parallel time and space a real vr love experience

about_the_game: this is a simulation management gamegame player will play as a street racer in the game only rely on their own ability and cleverness and a dilapidated secondhand car from nothing to fame and fortune 1story you are an unemployed youth in the game you are youngand you pursue your own dreams because you love racing since childhood so you disregard the objections of the family become a street racer and determined to use your superb drive skills to fan the living beings 2operation this game controls the way the car is different from other racing games this game uses the mouse to click the button way to operate the car and the player can make the lens follow own car also can control the lens movement freely 3opportunities in the game almost every day will encounter new opportunities through different players choose will get very different results and even some options will have farreaching impact  therefore this game is like your life only the correct grasp of opportunities will be successful 4upgrade your car as the game progresses player will encounter more and more powerful opponents so you need to do everything possible to upgrade your car however still want to remind everyone please choose wisely upgrade 5access toequipment and free modification in the game the player has a variety of access to equipment can be purchased but also through the game in the scavenging function to obtain each piece of equipment have different functions and functions players need to try how to apply them reasonably 6repair your car the players car needs regular maintenance many times to participate in the game without maintenance will lead to car trouble 7hidden items there are many hidden items in the gamethe player may need to play many times to discover
short_description: this is a simulation management gamelts not a racing game and the game has a large number of random factors such as random opponent strength random events random equipment and so on  and the player has only one life in the game each failure can only start a new game so every time the game players may have a different game

about_the_game: you can now travel the world in virtual reality myway vr aggregates 360° and vr videos into a single digital platform detecting a geographical location of where the content was filmed the app offers a virtual journey through different countries continents and cultures you can visit canada russia france south africa thailand japan and many more the videos are public and regularly updated and categorized there are around 50 selected high quality videos right now all the clips can be downloaded streamed paused rewind or added to a playlist contact us if you want to place a video360 from your region in myway vr

about_the_game: enter the world of the magis dream a reverse bullethell game where your one goal is to fight and to survive endless waves of enemies features over 100 billion possible unique loadouts 5 playable characters with diverse play styles variety of challenging maps relentless bosses multiple challenging enemy types rewarding levelling system to improve characters 10 distinct magi with favour system and questlines mana system with auto attacks and skill casting choose item upgrades and evolutions challenge modifiers endless gameplay endless possibilities gameplay as you survive the magi will sponsor you with powerful new spells weapons and armours which you can equip to aid you in your battle and help you become the ultimate fighter collect gold and upgrade your items at the merchant to get even stronger start off with nothing and choose loadouts which can either lead to your demise or take you to victory survive get sponsored slay the arena bosses and escape the dream or die trying each wave provides a new set of sponsorships choose one sponsor and accept an item they have offered you to build your loadout build and replace your loadout as you see fit catering to any style of play dreamers with five unique characters to choose from each with their own playstyle and perks the choice is yours as to how you fight level up your characters by gaining exp from surviving the endless hordes choose sponsorships from ten unique magi each with their own traits earn their favour by completing quests for them to help push yourself to victory a crumbling world immerse yourself in a rich world a dream run by powerful magi each with their own desires for the shape of the sleeping dimension learn more about the dream as you continue fighting through it and unravel the machinations of the ruthless beings in power
