about_the_game: travel through an ancient puzzlefilled pyramid as the ghost of aaru a man who has been denied entry into the egyptian afterlife for being neither good nor bad the gods of the afterlife anubis and osiris have charged you with the task of reflecting on the life you led when you were alive to balance your soul on the scales of justice and gain entrance into the field of reeds a place of eternal rest you must investigate your tomb while thinking about your human life and the choices you made when you were alive in the hope that this act of reflection will lead to eternal peace as a ghost you cannot physically touch objects and thus must possess specific items such as boxes and statues to move them around and solve the puzzles the fate of your soul hangs in the balance will you be able to earn your way into the afterlife explore an egyptian pyramid filled with ancient statues and walls decorated with hieroglyphs solve puzzles based on various stages of your life and discover artifacts that may have meant something to you when you were alive play as a ghost and possess things like rotating statues and boxes and manipulate them to solve puzzles in an immersive environment enjoy a touching and reflective story with fullyvoiced dialogue and multiple characters investigate your human life and ponder how the choices you made may have impacted the lives of others balance your soul on the scales of justice and earn entrance into the field of reeds where eternal peace and a restful afterlife await you
short_description: mausoleum of memories is a firstperson 3d puzzle adventure game based on egyptian mythology you play as the ghost of a man named aaru who has been denied entrance to the afterlife and now must reflect on his human existence and any lessons he may have learned so he can finally rest in peace
genres: adventure casual indie rpg strategy free to play

about_the_game: duelist a an online multiplayer fight gamecustomize your player and get your guns ready we will try our best to add new themesmapsguns and even new game modes to our game you can always follow our roadmap to see what we are working on now to add to game for this part of the early access we have the following content in our game 3 gamemodes freeforall saloon blackjackrussian roulette duel 3 themes western space medieval more coming soon guns western guns revolver mini shotgun flintlock rifle shotgun sniper rifle grenade launcher knife dynamite futuristic guns powersabers laser pistol hisniperrifle plasma rifle plasmashotgun flashbang stun grenade medieval guns throwing knife kunai shuriken musket handmortar crossbow bow 4 different sword mace battleaxe
short_description: duelist is a 2d multiplayer fastpaced shooter game there are certain themes in the game which player can select take a gun and use every skill you have to eliminate your enemies there is also saloon mod which you can play blackjack and more duel time

about_the_game: the lonely people is a game about a gifted hacker alan wells who is always looking for meaning in his life but never really seems to find any and along the way loses his mind because of all the people he killed in his way because of his pursuit to find meaning the story intends to show how a young sane man can easily break under pressure and become a killing menace we really tried making the story as realistic as possible and when the game comes out hopefully you could see the effort we put into writing this great character here is a quote from a key moment in the main story of the game  when i told the crew about the heist they were all aboard josh wanted money max wanted fame and i wanted revenge the three desires of man  we hope you enjoyed this quick peek behind the story of the lonely people now lets move on to the actual game the game is an action open world game where you can hack steal and kill you can move around the world with your weapons and kill npcs steal cars and drive around running people over catch a wanted level and shoot some cops complete the main storyline and so on thank you for reading and have a good day  realmad productions
short_description: the game is a thirdperson openworld shooter in which you can hack shoot steal and complete missions we took making this game very seriously and we hope you will enjoy it have a good dayps there is a control manual in the pause menu if you click on the controls button

about_the_game: knight king assassin is a minimal puzzle game inspired by rockpaperscissors and chess your objective is to clear the board from all the symbols by moving them while taking into account their place in the hierarchy knight defeats assassin but is defeated by king moves horizontally and vertically king defeats knight but is defeated by assassin moves horizontally vertically and diagonally assassin defeats king but is defeated by knight moves only diagonally death knight king and assassin symbols have their designated death symbols destroys itself and the designated symbol immovable  more symbols that are introduced later as the game goes on  minimalist style  30 levels
short_description: knight king assassin is a minimal puzzle game inspired by rockpaperscissors and chess your objective is to clear the board from all the symbols by moving them while taking into account their place in the hierarchy

about_the_game: immerse yourself in the enchanted world of medieval thieves an epic vr adventure that will take you to a thiefs battle with soldiers you will immerse yourself in a meticulously built medieval city where danger lurks around every corner with stunning virtual reality visuals the game offers an unparalleled level of immersion put on your vr headset and play as a master thief outsmarting clever guards as you make your way through intricately designed castles key features  thrilling vr rpg gameplay experience the thrill of being a warrior use bows and swords flexibly to take down enemies  complex level design fight in a straight line with minions with a building design of medieval style buildings and dense trees are you ready to embark on an unforgettable adventure as the medieval thief download now and unleash your inner rogue
short_description: medieval thief a thrilling singleplayer virtual reality game that takes you on a roleplaying adventure set in a medieval world of darkness and secrecy as a cunning thief you will be equiped swords bows and arrows to fend off soldiers trying to protect medieval treasures

about_the_game: cleithrophobia is a short but sweet 2d pixelart adventure game set in a huge cave spanning hundreds of miles descend deeper and deeper into the earth explore the dark depths of the earth and all the secrets that it holds from undiscovered almost alien lifeforms to long lost human civilizations this cave holds more secrets than you could ever imagine survive the dangers of an underground ecosystem though it may seem barren at first the cave is teeming with life around every corner some of them may be friendly but thanks to the extreme environment found within the caverns walls most of them arent looking to make friends explore ruins left by a long lost civilization you are not the first one to find this cave far from it a long lost civilization once called these hallow walls home yet now their all gone what could have happened to them how can you avoid ending up like them survive different weather conditions due to the huge size of the cave you are able to find different climates inside from the icy cold wasteland of the main cave to the sprawling lava tunnels deep underground you must adapt and overcome these challenges if you ever want to see the light of day again game features 6 different levels each housing their own set of challenges varied and difficult enemy encounters and bosses a whole bunch of different for you to utilise each with their own strength and weaknesses
short_description: exploring the forest quickly turns into a nightmare as you fall through the ground into an enourmous cave having no way but forward you continue through the massive cavern being met with hostility from the local wildlife and exploring a lost human civilization destroyed by an unknown force
supported_languages: english french italian german spanish  spain danish finnish norwegian polish portuguese  portugal russian swedish

about_the_game: a puzzle game about running not because one has somewhere to be but because one has somewhere they dont want to be in this game you have to run away different doors are blocking the way that need to be unlocked to proceed as fast as possible each door will give a different benefit and a combination of them is the key to succeed  or fail to open a door a puzzle is presented where pieces of a key have to be rotated and merged together to open the door the further you run the more difficult the key puzzles become there are three different modes normal mode score is increasing the more you survive it decreases the more you stay idle in a room without picking a door theres a set amount of rooms to complete before reaching the end endless mode score increases with each room that is completed there is no end to the amount of rooms presented random mode each door has a specific score as a reward when opened rooms and their rewards spawn at random the available benefits from the doors are green doors increase running speed purple doors increase lockpicking skills which makes opening new doors easier blue doors gives extra chances before losing brown doors provide no direct benefit apart from helping complete more rooms
short_description: a puzzle game about running not because one has somewhere to be but because one has somewhere they dont want to be different doors are blocking the way that need to be unlocked to proceed each door will give a different benefit and a combination of them is the key to succeed  or fail

about_the_game: good afternoon dear friends we present to your attention an exciting minigame in which not only the adventures of a gosling but also the love of a little girl are embodied all of the illustrations for goose ronnie were created by our 9 year old daughter in memory of her friend when our baby was 4 years old goslings appeared on our farm and then something happened that we could not have expected our daughter found a friend  one of the weakest goslings she fed and nursed him played with him in the yard over time the goose grew stronger and became completely inseparable from our baby he followed her everywhere drove other geese away from her and ran towards her as soon as she left the house but 5 years later ronnie passed away our daughter was broken she cried for many days until we invited her to perpetuate her love to her little friend to draw their happiest moments the places where they loved to walk together her dream is to become a great artist and we support her endeavor just like your support can help her the cost of the game is only 1  this is not a big amount for you but for us it is a huge step towards fulfilling a childhood dream of entering an art academy by purchasing the game and leaving a review you will give our daughter hope to make her dreams come true we believe that together we can make this world brighter and inspire little artists to great achievements buy goose ronnie right now and embark on an exciting adventure knowing youve contributed to supporting childrens dreams thank you for helping make dreams come true if you have any ideas or requests feel free to let us know so we can improve our game to make it even better the game features charming graphics and whimsical sound effects that bring the world of ronnie the goose to life with multiple levels and increasing difficulty goose ronnie offers a unique and engaging gaming experience that is sure to keep players entertained for hours whether youre a seasoned gamer or a newcomer this game is perfect for all ages and skill levels join ronnie on his exciting adventure and see how many points you can score as he becomes the ultimate champion
short_description: good afternoon dear friends we present to your attention an exciting minigame in which not only the adventures of a gosling but also the love of a little girl are embodied all of the illustrations for goose ronnie were created by our 9 year old daughter in memory of her friend

about_the_game: the player takes the role of aspiring rockstar who has retired as a gardener after an incident with a guitar he says he didn’t set on fire unfortunately for him the countryside turned out to be very boring plus he didn’t suspect his farm was surrounded by highrisk locations such as an old military cemetery an enchanted forest an abandoned power plant and an old mine this odd new lifestyle messed with the head of our hero who slowly transformed into the mad gardener out of nowhere a toxic spill from the power plant poisoned the grounds of the cemetery soon after that rumors spread about creatures wandering the graveyard after nightfall the rockstar felt there was danger ahead and mounted weapons on his old electric guitar he also put his cockerel apollo on a strict bodybuilding diet turning him into a mighty rooster after that apollo specialized in explosives and became the mad gardener’s right hand with mad gardener you get to enjoy  stylish 3d graphics with beautiful environment and creatures  a not so deep storyline sewn with humor  balanced gameplay that will keep both the beginner and the avid gamer entertained  1 big bad boss  3 mini but still bad bosses  3 deadly weapons mounted on an electric guitar  3 earthshaking explosives  9 ugly monsters to create massive massacres  10 stages to test your skills with easynormalhard modes
short_description: fast paced topdown shooterbullet storm where the player takes the role of aspiring rockstar who deals with ugly monsters using mighty weapons mounted on his electric guitar

about_the_game: enemies on camera enemies off camera at a performing arts school gerald doesnt stand out so he secretly envies the popular kid damian who gerald thinks is undeserving of his popularity due to his lack of talent his insecurity worsens when damian unintentionally mocks him in front of the entire class years after graduation gerald becomes a clist actor whos usually typecast to act in antagonist roles meanwhile damian becomes a popular heartthrob whos usually the protagonist in romance dramas gerald feels bitter that he has to work hard all these years to land auditions but damian gets roles automatically handed to him because of his popularity despite his acting being lackluster his rivals success constantly reminds gerald of his insecurities and makes him feel like a loser one day gerald gets the role of the antagonist in a romance drama by chance damian happens to be the male lead in that same drama and theyll both have to fight over the female lead because of his pentup jealousy and insecurities gerald swears to use various underhand tactics on set to embarrass his rival damian on the other hand is not going to sit back and let himself be provoked gerald is aromantic and asexual even though his smirk makes him seem like a flirty player he doesnt like being flirted with hes not interested in romance so hes never cared about acting in the romance genre but for once he decides to act in one as an antagonist in hopes of getting his name out there despite looking like a typical cute romantic protagonist damian is aloof he doesnt talk to people off camera unless its necessary he only wants to open up to someone whos genuine with him since damian has been the male lead in multiple romance dramas hed sometimes flirt and say cheesy lines without intent 30k words 23 hours playtime 2 endings neutral ending amp good ending 9 main cgs  2 minor cgs original sound tracks acting expression selection minigame
short_description: gerald isnt a known actor so he struggles to land roles but the guy who unintentionally made a mockery of him became a popular heartthrob who wouldnt feel resentful years later the two reunite as the antagonist and protagonist for a romance drama

about_the_game: far away theres a planet whose laws are governed by a mystical core deep within its heart life death time and the functionality of frozen dessert machines at fast food restaurants are all governed by this powerful artefact unfortunately it isnt exactly the most reliable piece of hardware and so it is protected by a mysterious shrouded people known as the bouncers whimsical curious quick and honestly kind of adorable they have laboriously maintained something resembling order for time immemorial a generation has passed since the core last experienced a serious malfunction and now the sun has stopped setting crops have stopped growing people have lost the ability to jump and worst of all video ads can no longer be skipped it was quickly decided that enough was enough the rallying cry was sounded for heroes to help set things right and so it was that eight brave volunteers set forth on a journey to enter the heart of the planet and reset the core of the world welcome to dashbounce a 2d speedrunning puzzleplatformer about going fast and intentionally abusing physics quirks seek the goal in each level before the clock hits zero  but watch out you cant jump youll have to use your surprising speed and bouncy body to turn every object and obstacle into an advantage select between eight characters and dash through over 50 levels in a lighthearted adventure mode about going fast and saving the world there are over 150 different challenges to complete bonus levels to unlock or you can make your very own with the included level editor custom levels are stored as tiny severalkilobyte text files for easy sharing three difficulty modes are included easy providing a more relaxed challenge for the less confident or those that dont enjoy the stress of a strict time limit normal which will require you to think quick on your feet to reach the goal in time hard for the absolute masochists who demand perfection of themselves and nothing less in addition you can choose to play with a left or righthanded keyboard control setup or using a pccompatible gamepad for the speedrunners out there the game includes a dedicated speedrunning mode which removes all loading times and story events so you can focus entirely on saving those frames every level in the main adventure mode also tracks your best time so if you prefer individual level records dashbounce has you covered
short_description: a 2d speedrunning puzzleplatformer about going fast and intentionally abusing physics quirks seek the goal in each level before the clock hits zero  but watch out you cant jump youll have to use your surprising speed and bouncy body to turn every object and obstacle into an advantage

about_the_game: this is a minimalist style roguelite strategy game that uses a fastpaced warchess system players can collect ships upgrade flagships and personally command every detail of the battle in detail expand your fleet in the interface between galaxies and the star systems players can encounter various events and battles to obtain trophies such as ships and equipment thus growing their fleet collecting ships this game contains three different factions each with dozens of unique regular ships collect them on your journey and make them your powerful allies strengthening the flagship each faction in this game includes several distinctive flagships and you can collect equipment during your journey and install it on the flagship to gain powerful combat power unique battle board system 1 movement in this games combat is divided into four types forward lateral backward and rotation master each ships movement pattern and freely change your formation at the right time 2 large ships usually have several weapons and you can select a target for each weapon individually or you can press the fire all weapon button to pour all firepower onto one target 3 your weapons can be roughly divided into three types energy kinetic and missiles each type has its own unique mechanism and using them properly can bring out their full potential
short_description: this is a roguelike game which is minimalist crossed it out which has no money for art the player needs to play as a fleet commander commanding the fleet to travel to a galaxy bathed in war purifying the dangerous enemies entrenched in it and saving your people from fire and water

about_the_game: so you like chipped teeth more than chip shots alley gangs more than alleyoops and in your most honest moments you gotta admit that football is just a little boring wake up and smell the blood spectrum holobyte proudly throws the first punch in the brutal sports series a new line of futuristic sports simulations created by millenium introducing beastball a rowdy ride through the football of tomorrow eight teams of manmade mutants each with their own skills duke it out for the league title and the beastball championship pit your favorite team against a human or computer opponent in the arena and when the door slams shut heads are gonna roll literally its 2089 and a strip of dirt in a pit is home to the game a fast sport guaranteed to churn the blood superb animations and sounds capture all the hits of slambang comedy and theyre really slambang stomp the other guy you catch a cannonball try to run out of bounds you suck wall leap high for a kick and you get skewered the object put the ball in the goal how you do it is up to you beastball football with a new set of rules no rules  one or two players  league or championship play  special weapons and skills for each team  combatant regenerator after each match  laughs blood
short_description: do you like action but reckon that chainsaw massacres are for grannies tea parties if you do then brutal sports football is for you league knockout or unfriendly tournaments

about_the_game: toddlers can be friends or food the humongous clowndemon toodles has escaped from his poorly constructed cage so foolish villagers summon the mighty player to protect them theyre gonna regret that gifted with the magical ability to throw stuff the player will use any resource available to defeat their bloated nemesis sacrifice villagers transform and consume cute wildlife do whatever it takes to survive until you have enough strength to bring down the clown balls will be your primary tools and can be used to craft allies to fight for you  you will need to build an army before taking on toodles for starters try different balls on the toddlers this puzzle has many pieces that can be put together in different combinations experiment with transformations and through curiosity you can discover multiple strategies for victory evolve toddlers into mutant followers to fight teddy bears protect your ugly baby army with layers of poop armor encourage extra growth by feeding them licorice allsorts twisters will randomly transform them for good or bad toddlers can also be converted into yummy food or milk mice can be converted into stuffed animals to reduce fear rubber ducks are raw material to make additional balls knock off villager heads then upgrade them into guards arm nowbraver villagers with powerful plasma swords capture flying unicorns and bats inside floating bubbles reshape gummy bear corpses into strange new friends hunt nightmares to upgrade your army into monsters
short_description: toodles amp toddlers is a survival horror strategy puzzle with physics transformation crafting and resource chains experiment to discover what is possible then use the tools you create to combat hostile creatures while coping with fear and hunger

about_the_game: welcome to bounders and cads a turnbased strategy game for players of all ages old aunt edna has died leaving a fortune to be claimed the money will go to the one rascal who can play the dirtiest tricks and earn the most money in business dealings buy up businesses sabotage your opponents deploy tricky strategies and swindle your way to an inheritance beware though aunt edna’s estranged husband the brigadier is lurking about and he’s very very angry bounders and cads features fun board game style gameplay for all ages play on your own or with up to three friends cunning ai opponents and unique characters voice acting and retro style music tracks explore brokeville village in full high definition colorful and cheeky humour supports many resolutions and screen sizes bursting with replay value each game is different
short_description: bounders and cads is a turnbased strategy game for players of all ages including singleplayer and local multiplayer modes aunt edna died leaving a fortune to be claimed the money will go to the player who can pull the dirtiest tricks and earn the most money

about_the_game: mutant slimes created to eat garbage waste in a mutant slime production laboratory called slamus got out of the control of scientists and began to eat people in the laboratory instead of garbage waste a few scientists who managed to survive in the laboratory produced a new slime to destroy these mutant slimes features you can carry 4 different weapons weapon types are pistol smg shotgun automatic rifle minigun destroy as many mutant slimes as you can while trying to survive waves lasting 20 to 90 seconds each collect chemicals to get items from the store to further survive and destroy waves of enemies
short_description: you were created by a few scientists for a suicide mission how long can you survive by clearing mutant slimes

about_the_game: in the distant days of the wild west cowboys were quick to jump the gun yet those who survived were not the fastest ones but the ones who took the time to aim carefully will you manage to keep your cool and shoot your way to the final boss through wave after wave of bandits get stronger and stronger as your enemies get bigger badder and funnier in this roguelike with a generous amount of powerups dynamic accessible game minimalistic and unique gameplay  experience shooting at its purest  the feeling of squeezing the trigger at the right time and the satisfaction of reaching your target no need to aim  a selfmoving crosshair makes the controls very simple and intuitive let your instinct guide you every fight is different  dynamic gameplay forcing you to adapt to the crosshair’s movements and teaching you to take advantage of every opportunity unbridled roguelike upgradesrich game  acquire new powers frequently and refine your playstyle to tailor your character to your liking many different powers  collect more than fifty different abilities to improve your aim your damage your defense etc eccentric special bullets  load special bullets in your sixshooter such as the oneshotkill golden bullet the gigantic mammoth bullet or the burstfire machine gun bullet good guys bad guys and ugly guys flamboyant characters  fight and impersonate a whole clique of cowboys bandits and the like straight from the greatest spaghetti westerns win new heroes to your cause  complete achievements to unlock new more powerful characters dreadful bosses  reach the end of the level alive to enter the saloon and face bosses using sneaky and surprising tactics but be mindful of the henchmen protecting them rich and diverse playthroughs everchanging tactics  choose your targets wisely and set your priorities right should you take care first of the gunslinger threatening you with two guns or pick up this tantalizing bag of dollars lots of interactive items  take advantage of opportunities offered by background objects gong that stuns your foes horseshoe making the bullets ricochet around… procedural environment  learn to adapt to a procedurally generated architecture watch out for foes taking cover behind a window or aiming at you from a balcony shoot laugh and be open to surprises pervading humour  be ready to laugh out loud when you see hats taking flight or cowboys dancing to a piano tune crazy cartoonish world  come and discover the many surprises that the wild west of bullet town has in store for you
short_description: fight waves of bandits in this crazy hybrid of shooter and roguelike keep your cool and shoot at the right time use the scenery to your advantage with surprising effects claim bounties to upgrade your characters and become bullet town’s greatest gunslinger

about_the_game: the little mermaid fiona has fallen in love with the statue of a warrior she wants to bring the warrior back to life but the only force capable of such a feat is very dangerous fiona must survive by navigating many obstacles to keep these dark forces from imposing on her the same fate as the warrior start an exciting match3 adventure and master many challenging underwater levels  match 3 excitement with many extras  fun and challenging underwater levels  fill up the treasury and help fiona  earn bonuses upgrades and extras  solve challenging minigames
short_description: start an exciting match3 adventure and master many challenging underwater levels

about_the_game: lost in 80s ii blends a arcade game style with the best of the eighties culture with different and challenging levels our character will have to be fast avoiding and defeating various kinds of enemies and to make it even better running from a wall full of spikes lost in 80s ii brings back all the characteristics and style that made it first version unforgettable and now coming with a better gameplay making the game even more fun another features  characters with characteristic clothes party globes juckeboxes and much more  sound effects and music inspired in 80s  30 levels of pure challenge and fun
short_description: feel all the nostalgia of the 80s in a special arcade game

about_the_game: welcome to viking chef feast frenzy a captivating 3d cooking adventure set in the heart of the old north assume the role of a viking chef and dive headfirst into the culinary chaos of a bustling norse kitchen your mission to serve the gods a feast of legendary proportions in viking chef feast frenzy youll find yourself in a culinary scramble cooking up divine meals from ingredients available in your viking larder as you navigate the chaotic kitchen youll need to be swift smart and innovative the gods are hungry and they wont wait forever each scenario brings a new challenge and a new taste of the excitement in viking culinary culture from preparing the ingredients to mastering the art of viking cuisine youre in for a thrilling ride prepare yourself for a heartpounding epicurean journey in a vibrant norseinspired world viking chef feast frenzy is not just a cooking game its an adventure that tests your strategic skills and speed under pressure so do you have what it takes to please the gods with your culinary prowess are you ready to stir up a storm in the viking kitchen then grab your chefs hat and let the feast frenzy begin
short_description: dive into viking chef feast frenzy a cozy coop cooking adventure set in the norse realm as a viking chef challenge yourself to create divine feasts across dynamic scenarios like a forest camp a boat or a classic viking village

about_the_game: avoid numerous dangers using the power of mystical gauntlets and make your way to the summit braving increasingly harder challenges as a young adventurer dives into the unknown cave in pursuit of mystical gauntlets he gets trapped and sent deep down into the magical caverns now he needs to get to the surface no matter what dangers await him along the way using the hidden powers of gauntlets entrusted to him discover colorful caves use the powers of mystical gauntlets find hidden gems unlock new skins parkour between walls and avoid many interesting obstacles in this exciting pixelart platformer
short_description: avoid numerous dangers using the power of mystical gauntlets and make your way to the summit braving increasingly harder challenges

about_the_game: welcome to fightcore forge for your entertainment our aipowered contestants will go headtohead in adrenalinepumping battles within the electrifying arena with each riveting encounter fightcore forge brings the future of combat sports to life promising heartstopping action that will leave you on the edge of your seat prepare to be amazed as the champions rise and a new era of robotic warfare is forged before your very eyes a new industry has recently emerged in the world multipurpose fighting robots that need to be trained for warfare how about creating new funds by turning this training into a show you as robots will have to fight against each other to achieve the best performances gameplay play in local multiplayer with two to six players on a single keyboard there is everything you need for a funfilled experience with friends  whether youre playing 1v1 with five keys each or in a group of two to six players with only two keys you can choose from a variety of arenas filled with teleporters powerups and moving objects simply hop in and enjoy play in online multiplayer with three game modes either with strangers or your friends  duel allows you to fight in 1 versus 1 to determine who is the best contest is a team versus team game mode with three players per team it requires more strategy and cooperation to achieve victory brawl is a freeforall with up to eight players in the arena where you will test your skills against constant hostility discover the future of fightcore forge in the singleplayer story mode  pilot a robot in third person and explore the postwar world as you interact with characters choose which path you want your story to follow differentiate between your allies and enemies and continue to evolve as you gain new equipment adding new mechanics to the arcade gameplay its a story adapted for every player and skills from casual to hardcore
short_description: confront opponents and friends as a training robot in a maze arena playable online or in local up to 6 player have some fun driving around and shooting everything you can with the help of powerups and strategy

about_the_game: it is a 2d sidescrolling platformer parkour game the game has a cartoon style and cute characters the difficulty of the game is high which may make people feel bad so this game is suitable for players with a good mentality the games levels are very rich and each level has different characteristics that you can explore on your own although the game is simple to operate it requires different operations from different types of traps in the level and there will be pits in some places so the difficulty is high players can develop their mindset in the face of failure after failure you can find yourself in each game and work hard to improve your operating abilitymore levels will be added in the future
short_description: a sidescrolling parkour game with a high level of difficulty

about_the_game: geometry world is a puzzle game where the player needs put the box on the correct position and get 100 of the game the games concept was created one without words just images the game has 50 levels with five worlds of different characteristics and achievement for each mission completed
short_description: put the box on the correct position and get 100 of the game

about_the_game: a murder mystery visual novel by sakevisual for the last few years kangai has been a wanderer but his return to his hometown has triggered a series of deaths linked to his past with a bit of less than gentle prodding he joins a group of psychic teenagers who solve mysteries under the watchful eye of the government the group goes undercover at a local university to investigate kangais history but the sudden death of a professor sets them on a new course racing an old enemy for valuable information take control of kangai as you explore the campus interrogate suspects and unearth together the secrets behind the lies can you catch the murderer or will the murderer catch you genre supernatural mystery anime gameplay visual novel adventure game content contains depictions of crime scenes and some blood art m beatriz garcia writing ayu sakata music marc conrad tabula voice cast mikolaj gurski chris niosi naoki mizutani micah solusod aki mizutani apphia yu li mei cherami leigh chance jackson kira buckland shawn tasse kevin m connolly aaron vanich edwyn tiong jupiter celedon erica mendez david sawicki clifford chapin nathan holm chris cason
short_description: a murder mystery visual novel dig into your history as you chase down a murderer

about_the_game: mob stadium holds the secret to escaping the end of all time traps challenges and a grand finale await your demise in this challenging shooter made for the htc vive as the brown dwarf wormwood returns the anunnaki have emerged from the aether to test humankind armed with a small pistol and trapped in a terrestrial anunnaki compound can you survive long enough to decipher the mysteries of mob stadium features smooth trackpad based locomotion fast action gunplay puzzle solving mazelike map progression smooth movement can cause vr motion sickness htc vive and steamvr required
short_description: mob stadium holds the secret to escaping the end of all time traps challenges and a grand finale await your demise in this challenging shooter made for the htc vive

about_the_game: most of the lands are overrun by goblins skeletons and other evil creatures travel to the royal lands are cut off leaving the remaining people to fend for themselves against the dark lord you’re the only one to make it out of the magical dungeon with the uncharged dungeon heart making you the last hope in defeating the dark lord freeing the lower lands from his control journey through what’s left of the lower lands in search of relics to help you enter the dark lords keep and destroy him discover new armor and weapons to help you in your journey learn some of the lands history by finding books that were stolen from the great library chose if you want to help those in need or stick to the main path  leveling system increasing health stamina and strength  armor sets with varying stat changes  equip one shield short sword amp two hand sword at a time  deal with most mini bosses in multiple ways  partake in side quests  continue playing after you defeat the dark lord
short_description: find all the relics destroy the magical barrier and slay the dark lord is your main quest discover new sets of armor and weapons along the way and locate stolen books to learn more about the world

about_the_game: alice shah doesn’t want to go on holiday to scotland and she most definitely doesn’t want to go to grey dreary skye alice has a love for elegant classy clothes and she spends hours on her appearance every morning alice considers herself a sophisticated elegant lady and she has no desire to go tramping through muddy fields to visit crumbling old castles unfortunately for alice however her dad is determined to spend their summer in skye so he can meet up with a former friend ian carter and his family his wife the haughty hilda and their ginger spawn the loud and boisterous piper alice hasn’t seen piper since they were small children and she has few memories of her she doubts that she’ll be able to get on with anybody who lives on a teenytiny island full of sheep but alice is pleasantly surprised piper isn’t as abrasive as her father or as stuckup as her mother piper is cheerful and laidback and she takes a liking to alice almost at once a friendship begins to blossom between the two girls  but what will happen when alice’s holiday ends and she has to go back to london 50k words of text around 34 hours of reading a kinetic storyline with no choicesbranches detailed backgrounds and cgs 1080p display lots of locations to visit taken from the real isle of skye a cute yuri love story suitable for all ages a heroine who wears a lot of pretty dresses
short_description: a cute wholesome yuri visual novel about a haughty young girl called alice who goes on holiday to the isle of skye once there she meets the plucky young piper and a romance between the two slowly unfolds

about_the_game: the mutrix is a vr sports music rhythm game designed by professional sports coaches music composers and experienced artists and motion designers it has gained recognition and popularity among numerous users including some celebrity artists as an essential game for their daily exercise and stress relief the three core elements of the mutrix are music sports and immersive visuals  music  the game features over 50 songs in various genres such as pop rock electronic rap and traditional chinese music each songs chart is professionally crafted by musicians to match the movements and rhythm requirements of the sports coaches aiming to provide players with a satisfying experience of moving to the beat of the music additionally the game supports the import of thirdparty song charts allowing players to enjoy their favorite songs in a simple way  sports  in terms of sports different difficulty levels and exercise intensities including light moderate advanced and professional are designed by sports coaches to meet the diverse exercise needs of users the mutrix has also developed a calorie consumption calculation system that calculates the number of calories burned during each exercise session based on the users movement trajectory and intensity extensive testing with various sports wearables has shown that the calculated values align closely with those displayed on the devices  visual  for visual immersion the game incorporates a levelbased gameplay where each level represents a distinctive and wellknown city such as xian hangzhou shanghai and ordos the mutrix team conducted onsite research and created songs and charts that align with the cultural and historical background of each level players can fully immerse themselves in a visual and auditory feast for example fans of the jiu bao band must try the ordos level and fans of hangzhou should not miss the song battle of west lake  to enhance the games replayability the mutrix introduced the extreme challenge for highlevel players which consists of consecutive songs with increasing difficulty levels testing who can persist until the end the theme challenge tournament provides a competitive stage for music enthusiasts to compete for rankings finally the team is developing a multiplayer social competitive mode where players can create their own avatars change outfits and immerse themselves in outer space scenery with a view of nebulae through windows they can chat listen to music and engage in exciting pk battles with other players on the same stage the mutrix team is committed to continuously updating the game with new activities combining gameplay sports and fitness with fun and popular events ensuring a balance between exercise and social interaction  contact  if you have any questions or suggestions or would like to meet other players please add the following contact information discord mutrix7uvr0890 wechatydwlyjh qq group 739527324
short_description: mutrix is a music movement vr game in which players need to use a lightsaber to slash flying notes the greater the movement the higher the score the game library is rich covering a variety of styles of music lets rhythm together

about_the_game: air strike is an action simulator of air combat where every man for himself the game has 3 modes namely classic modern and invasion in classic mode you fly a plane from the second world war and fight in the air with the same from weapons you have a machine gun which has a high rate of fire but with less damage and explosive shells which are slower in rate of fire but with high damage in modern mode you control a modern fighter and fight in the air with the same from weapons you have a machine gun and two types of missiles the first type of missiles has ammunition capacity limited to two pieces but they have high damage and high aiming accuracy the second type of missiles has a limited ammunition capacity of ten but they have less damage and low targeting accuracy you also have heat traps to trick the missiles flying at you in invasion mode you fight against space invaders in a modern fighter here you will not have to fight against the exterminators because you have one goal  to expel the invaders all modes are endless but how long you can hold out and how many points to score for destroying enemies depends only on you
short_description: air strike is an action simulator of air combat where every man for himself

about_the_game: take the gaming experience to a whole new level and bring your favorite pc games to vr simply connect your hmd to your pc and use your vr controllers to handle one of the virtual rigs to emulate racing wheels yokes and game specific controllers play your games without a need for game specific patches or mods and enhance immersion with appropriate rigs and virtual simulators enjoy the level of optimisation that allows for use of the app with low spec pcs discover and rediscover the latest titles and the classics under the light of vr in the current version the user can pick an environment a hand model a virtual gamepad or a virtual steering wheel rig with a number of options this already allows to enjoy a huge variety of pc games and car racing games but we arent planning to stop at that on a regular basis we are planning to unveil patches extra features game specific mappings fine tuning of gamepad settings and dlcs bringing immersive virtual rigs for cars motorbikes boats planes helicopters and everything in between on a quest to unlocking the most rewarding vr gameplay experiences disclaimer  footage of third party games has been used for compatibility demonstration and suggest no affiliation or collaboration nor are those games included in the product

about_the_game: dangerous coins is an exciting game that puts you in the shoes of a character who is obsessed with collecting coins your mission is to navigate through various levels and collect all the coins on the map without being caught by those who are trying to stop you the enemies in the game are constantly on the lookout for you so you must use your wits and skills to avoid being caught however you have a powerful magic ability that allows you to destroy brick surfaces and create traps for your enemies using your magic powers to create traps is a key gameplay mechanic in dangerous coins youll need to strategically place traps in order to lure enemies away from the coins or to trap them so that you can collect the coins safely overall dangerous coins is a fun and addictive game that will appeal to anyone who loves collecting coins and outsmarting their enemies with challenging gameplay unique mechanics and vibrant visuals its a mustplay for fans of action and strategy games game features   coins collector  creating traps  exploring map
short_description: dangerous coins is an exciting game that puts you in the shoes of a character who is obsessed with collecting coins

about_the_game: floomy  the adorable pink bunnylike hero embarks on a daunting quest to vanquish an ancient evil that threatens all existence as floomy youll hop onto a variety of critters in a desperate effort to clear the perilous gaps that stand between you and each levels goal sounds easy enough right nope check your expectations as there are zero checkpoints so prepare to embrace failure as a stepping stone to progress with each attempt youll collect precious gems that can be spent on upgrades at the hop shop combined with your growing experience these enhancements will assist you in conquering the formidable gauntlet that awaits enhance floomys abilties no effort goes unrewarded each run youll earn gems that can be spent to enhance floomys abilities via the hop shop tired of falling victim to hazardous flora then the thick skin enhancement is for you hop in style or maybe you are all about fashion in that case throw your hardearned gems at hats and skins nothing can stop you from hopping in style features beautifully handcrafted pixel art aesthetic that is equal parts adorable and exciting 27 levels designed to encourage speedrunning as players grow more proficient over time levels are divided into 5 distinct zones with each featuring a different aesthetic various critters that influence player mobility differently a challenging gameplay experience thats easy to learn but difficult to master protips hop on critters to make your way to each goal there arent many stable platforms to stand on so keep moving dont be afraid to speedrun discover tricks and maneuvers to get through each stage faster embrace death mastery is all about good timing so get comfortable with trial and error most critters react to being hopped on differently for instance hopping on a blue birdy will propel floomy upwards while another might suck you up then spit you out dont forget to spend your gems at the hop shop to enhance floomys abilities you got this now hop to it
short_description: floomy is a challenging platformer with roguelite elements the core essence of floomy is obtaining mastery over tricky aerial maneuvers required to get from one platform to the other while there arent any checkpoints each level is very short and permanent upgrades make speedrunning a breeze
genres: action adventure casual indie early access

about_the_game: blimps is an openworld adventure rpg that puts you in the captains chair of your electric airship armed with water fire ice cannons and a couple of hanger robots to help you on your way can you learn to survive in this world of blimps only to escape it with a bit of perseverance you might be the one to survive and escape this world of multiplying blimps so take to the skies and safely deliver cargo or try to pirate cargo from another blimp if you dare this roguelite casual game involves flying around battling collecting delivering exploring sieging smuggling surviving harvesting crafting hacking and racing to be the first to find the moon crystal and the elusive mars rock complete 77 primary and 12 side missions to earn 11 passport stamps and 8 pilot wings game features build a fortune with a blimp cargo delivery corporation explore an open world fly around discovering all the castles mazes minigames missions ports stores and treasures in blimps equip and repair equip your blimp with upgrades and repair it from damage load your blimp with cargo you can load regular precious illegal and stowaway cargo onto your blimp and deliver it to currently trading stork ports earn a profit safely deliver cargo with your blimp to trading stork ports smugglers of illegal and stowaway cargo beware you may get busted going through eagle eye customs choose your own adventure questions encounter events with different outcomes based on your decisions encounter weather events how do you navigate your blimp when encountering random weather dogfight battles battle other blimps in close combat skirmishes for their loot become the king of the seven castle kingdoms siege and defeat seven increasingly difficult castles to become the king of blimps battle corporate cash cows defeat the corporate cash cow bosses pilot a submarine rent a submarine and trawl for helium3 watch out for giant crabs launch a hotair balloon navigate a hotair balloon through a vast labyrinth of obstacles secrets and treasures drill down with an earth drill navigate a mini earth drill through a vast labyrinth full of obstacles secrets and treasures craft items make items from floppy disks for your blimp and other stuff extract elements and crush carbon use your hangar’s lab to separate components from saltwater and minerals mining operations and drilling rigs you can visit mining operations and drilling rigs to inspect and purchase valuable minerals and gases build solar towns to receive a rental income build four solar towns pneumatic tube mail delivery send and receive incoming pneumatic tube mail pay the bills receive rental income get paid collect stamps and recycle junk mail earn captain skill points complete 12x side missions to earn captain skill points which can be used to obtain bonus items educate and train very important people gather your expedition team and prepare them to help you escape race against space y nile x and sir space to find the moon crystal be the first to find the elusive moon crystal and win 1000000list 77 missions 12 side missions 11 passport stamps and 8 pilot wings to earn blimps features 77 main missions 12 side missions 11 passport stamps and 8 pilot wings that players can earn through dedicated gameplay daffodil medal of honor stamp retainers of this passport achievement stamp can complete the game in about 2 hours if they know what they are doing and are awarded a score bonus ed one of the game designers says blimps can be completed in about 13 minutes if you are a good hacker and know what and when to do it but you will not get the daffodil ‘no cheat codes used’ achievement stamp score bonus blimps also features unique sound fx and an instrumental soundtrack performed by the band ashtronaut blimps features full gamepad controller support and can be played on a tabletfingerpencil or keyboardmouse device pay once to get the whole blimps experience there are no ads f2p mechanics inapp purchases or ingame data collection instead it is just an oldschool standalone offline familyfriendly video game rated e for everyone we hope you enjoy the game thanks for playing corinne amp ed cogame designers of blimps
short_description: blimps is a throwback openworld adventure rpg with 77 fun missions and an original soundtrack you are the captain of an electric airship armed with water fire and ice cannons can you learn to survive in this world of blimps only to escape it
genres: adventure casual indie rpg simulation strategy

about_the_game: dear home is a game where you play as a tiny robot with the special mission to explore an unknown planet this game offers you exploration travel with your robot through many of the scenarios grass mountains and snow mining shape the area around you by mining and collecting resources crafting use the resources you collected for your improvements and to build new stuff puzzles many puzzles to solve while you explore the land story a simple story written by some optimistic developers  what story somewhere in the universe at some unknown time a small spaceship lands on a large planet inside some robots are ready to explore this unknown world and fulfill a longreceived mission to seek intelligent life or to help one of the local species to evolve into a peaceful civilization which species would be best suited to receive alien help and what will be the result of this interaction to know the outcome of this incredible story maybe not that incredible  just start this nice little adventure count me in please contact us if you have any problems suggestions or feedback we are very happy to launch dear home and we want you to have as much fun playing our game as we had fun creating it
short_description: dear home is an adventure game with puzzles and exploration on an unknown planet

about_the_game: welcome to the world of path of trials this is an exciting platformer with two captivating modes story and world  in story mode youll embark on thrilling adventures as a cat who aspires to reach the heavens and rescue their faithful friend playing in story mode you will uncover diaries that will reveal an exciting tale of friendship immerse yourself in the world of adventures and help our cat achieve their goal the world mode features an open world with various challenges by completing them youll discover crystals and unlock new skins for your character explore this world achieve your objectives and become a true master of path of trials gameplay  reach the summit but beware of falls your main goal is to reach the summit but remember that even the slightest mistake can send you plummeting down  mastery of jumps for victory you have the ability to control the height of your jumps simply hold the button to jump higher at the bottom of the screen youll see a progress bar that will help you determine how high youre about to jump precise mastery will lead you to victory  plan every jump before making a jump carefully assess your position and the spot you intend to jump to planning and strategy are your keys to success choose your path wisely
short_description: save a friend in an exciting platformer with a cat hero complete challenges and uncover the story of friendship beware of mistakes plan every jump and achieve success in this captivating platformer
supported_languages: english italian german spanish  spain portuguese  portugal russian french

about_the_game: space junk the much loved retrostyled homage to arcade classics has finally arrived on steam this gameplay in this 2d action shooter is fiendishly simple but fiercely addictive steer your player through waves of interstellar junk pulverising it with your blaster and breaking it down until its reduced to space dust fight your way through 25 increasingly intense levels of action aim to score high and not die gameplay features  play with pc compatible game controllers or keyboard  an arsenal of wicked weapon powerups to help smash the trash  make your scores go supermassive with the cluster bonus multiplier system  engage in dogfights with enemy ships to earn pickups like shield magnet bonus lives etc  boneshaking retro sounds and a sizzling 80s soundtrack  vivid vectorstyle graphics the cluster bonus to get the biggest scores bump up your bonus multiplier buy destroying each body of junk and all of its debris before it drifts too far as the levels get harder the junk gets bigger and the debris spreads faster making the cluster bonus more challenging this is just the beginning for space junk coming in future updates  achievments  more levels  progress milestones  bonus minigames  boss levels  tons more weapon types and pickups and coming early next year  different game modes like timed games exploration and puzzle  multiplayer combat  multiplayer coorperative  background story and cutscenes
short_description: intense action retrostyled visuals a sizzling synth soundtrack and tons of cool scifi references all rendered in vibrant neon graphics get your triggerfinger ready turn the lights down the sound up and blast your way through level after level of fast paced junk smashing action

more help your kids strengthen their skills while being entertained  interactive experience children can explore an interactive environment filled with colorful and charming characters each minigame offers a unique experience that will keep young players engaged for hours ‍‍‍ family play educational suite encourages family collaboration and learning join your children as they explore the world of knowledge together  achievements and rewards celebrate your childrens achievements with virtual rewards and medals that will motivate them to keep learning and improving  multiple difficulty levels each minigame adapts to different skill levels ensuring an appropriate challenge for children of all ages together for a better world by purchasing educational suite you not only provide your children who trust educational suite to provide an enriching and fun educational experience download the game today and discover how learning can be an exciting adventure for your children and an opportunity for a better world

short_description: this is my job dying again and again but im used to it thats how i can see the future whats waiting for me good question

about_the_game: supreme ruler the great war remastered includes the previous game content in an updated game engine set in the first world war the central powers and the triple entente prepare to attack with no understanding of the scale of conflict they will unleash over the coming years the armies of these nations would come to understand how air power submarines and artillery were about to transform how war was waged designed within the updated supreme ruler 2030 engine the game content benefits from improved performance running in 64 bit the world map theaters and ai pathing have also been improved for smoother game flow game visuals are also improved with directx 11 support and updates to specific terrain unit and building elements border graphics grid graphics lighting and water visuals have also been improved the updated game engine also includes numerous new features from the development of supreme ruler 2030 and galactic ruler projects managing colonies directly or trade them away when leading your empire you can now take full control of your colonies switch between them as needed to run your empire your way or use a colony as a bargaining chip with other nations updated user interface with larger lists lists of technologies resources or units can include a large number of entries the panels in the game can now be expanded to see more information at once control clicking an shift clicking are now supported for selected exactly what you want battlegroup manager creating a hierarchy of units can be done more easily with the battlegroup manager filter to specific unit types to create battlegroups from those units manage your groups assign leaders or automate groups strategic unit trading surplus units no longer need to sit around collecting dust in a countrys inventory they can now be sold to and purchased from a military marketplace accessible to all regions cheap deals on unwanted equipment can help smaller nations compete globally with other nations all this and more players can choose to jump into the action as any region in the world through sandbox play or follow campaigns of key regions to watch historic events unfold make the correct economic diplomatic domestic and military decisions to assure the survival of your nation key features  world war i campaigns for various major powers from the era  take control of any nation in sandbox mode and impact the outcome of the conflict  start in 1914 or 1917 and progress well into the 21st century for an epic gameplay experience  the butterfly effect influence the timeline and outcome of thousands of historical events  use diplomacy trade espionage and intimidation to influence the policies of other nations  guide your nation through the first war waged on a global scale  modernize your economy to support whatever social and military policies you choose  comprehensive tech tree features over 100 years of technology and equipment advances  sophisticated realtime strategic and tactical control of your military forces  detailed historicallyaccurate armies down to the battalion level  choose your level of control make all decisions or use your cabinet ministers to help  battle the elements fully integrated weather model influences battlefield outcomes  multiplayer through steam matchmaking windows version only other game engine improvements of this remastered edition include ui scaling for large screen resolutions supported regions increased to 1024 allowing for more regions per map ability to trade colonies and battlezones improved ai pathing updated theaterbattlezone design updates to colonypartisansguerrillas system including coups updated ai tactics including naval fleets during targeted sea attacks updated ai for carriers and assigned aicraft supply chain report for feedback on resources a system of map nav points mp chat system rebuilt including map pings mp stability improvements technology project additional feedback of leads to techs automate unit option redesigned tutorial in four chapters improved feedback from on map notifications battlegroup leaders bridges visible on map improved visual of fictional leaders equipment file combat stats revised system refactored and new entries tech projects can have up to 4 effects new tech buff system to tie techs to specific unit types expanded coupsrevolts system counter espionage and assassinate mission system in the early years cyber attack when player reach modern times unit upgrades and unit refits naval engineers rationing by sector for commodity shortages revised population growth model exclude techs from list
short_description: return to wwi in the updated supreme ruler engine engage in global tactical combat manage your countrys economy research and diplomacy includes more than 50 countries set in 1914 or 1917 with no fixed end date enjoy improved game performance and visuals in this remastered title
supported_languages: english french italian german spanish  spain

about_the_game: social distancing is a satirical casual adventure game about the toilet paper run of 2020 this game is not intended to downplay the devastation of the pandemic in any way i made it purely out of good intentions working to make it solely about the run on toilet paper and only referencing the pandemic for context 100 of the developer proceeds will be donated to charities combatting the challenges 2020 has thrown at us features  experience 3 increasingly chaotic levels as you execute your hysteriadriven mission to acquire more toilet paper maintaining a sixfoot radius from everyone at all times  the game is short and takes about 30 minutes to beat  control it with your keyboard mouse or favorite controller prologue the year is 2020 the human population stands as one six feet apart as they wage war with the sinister novel coronavirus their secret weapon trying not to catch it at all by planting themselves on their couches and flattening the viruss exponential advance they have codenamed their heroic strategy social distancing there is but one flaw in their plan toilet paper they have fallen under the deception that social distancing will accelerate their gastrointestinal cycles so severely that they will exhaust an entire pack of 32 megarolls before their plan is complete fearing the day you sit stranded on the can staring at the feeble cardboard core of your last precious roll you make a risky dash to the store hoping to add to your unnecessarily enormous supply
short_description: an epic quest for toilet paper social distancing is a short satirical casual adventure game about the toilet paper run of 2020 execute your hysteriadriven mission to acquire more toilet paper as you maintain a sixfoot radius from everyone

about_the_game: larsmidnatt is back with another unique and quirky experience full of personality dannys debt is eternal is a short humorous adult game with fantastical hscenes and plenty of eye candy by completing goals given to you by the curator you can unlock an image gallery with over 100 images even the save screen is smutty so be prepared danny is indebted to taenya leovyre an elvish princess he is ordered to work as a brothel matchmaker to pay her back a tedious task fortunately job benefits include hooking up with fantastical women and an endless supply of wine pick the best pairings to earn the most credits to buy taenya new outfits and enjoy her updated looks each outfit also unlocks an hscene when equipped cecile shimmerlily taenyas faye servant will help danny learn new skills to make his job more manageable she may look small but shes got big connections that can make dannys life easier be sure to visit her and her friends for the best experience danny is in a bind help him replay the princess and see how well he is rewarded all characters are 18 years or older
short_description: dannys debt is eternal is a short humorous adult game with fantastical hscenes and plenty of eye candy help him replay the princess and see how well he is rewarded

about_the_game: about two for one is a game about 2 brothers who have lost their home planet its your job to help them find their home planet alone or together with someone else puzzle your way through lots of levels to get back home by pushing boxes opening doors and jumping on your friends head to solve all kinds of puzzles gameplay when you load a level you will be spawned somewhere inside of it get to the flag as fast as you can there can be 3 different flags a red flag one of the 2 brothers needs to reach this flag a blue flag only the blue character can finish here a green flag only the green character can finish here the level is complete when all the flags are reached use buttons to open doors for yourself or others by standing on top of them or move boxes on top be sure to not hit the spikes lasers and spikeballs be sure to stay on the map because when you fall off or get hit by one of the obstacles you will explode and the whole level resets when your are done with the levellevels you will see your end time and you can brag about your personal end time to all your friends controls wasd movement of player 1 arrow keys movement of player 2 r reset the level youre in escape pause the game no you can not figure out the level while paused to save time d
short_description: two for one is a game about 2 brothers who have lost their home planet its your job to help them alone or together with someone else find their home planet puzzle your way trough lots of levels to get back home push boxes open doors and jump on your friends head to solve all kinds of puzzles

about_the_game: welcome to the exciting world of the visual novel pulse of love in this gripping story you will meet 18yearold hanbel  whose life is filled with challenges and dreams since childhood hanbel has been raised by her loving grandmother but their family has always suffered from financial difficulties passionate about singing and aspiring to attend a prestigious arts and vocal institute in seoul hanbel faces hardships money barely covers the groceries and the landlord threatens eviction to make matters worse hanbels grandmother ends up in the hospital with severe injuries and a huge sum of money is needed for her surgery however just when everything seems hopeless fate throws an unexpected chance hanbels way she learns about a singing contest and trials with a cash reward organized by the popular kpop group bsb determined and courageous hanbel decides to apply but she encounters an unforeseen condition only boys can participate in the competition now hanbel faces a difficult choice will she settle for the circumstances and let her dreams fade away or will she take a desperate step opening up the opportunity to overcome obstacles and pretend to be a boy pulse of love is a journey through hardships and passionate dreams immerse yourself in this world where music becomes the pulse of love and dare to dream even when the whole world stands against you what will hanbel choose and what adventures and unexpected twists await her ahead the answers to these questions await you in pulse of love
short_description: pulse of love is a captivating visual novel set in the vibrant world of the korean kpop scene drama experience the exhilarating journey of love passion and selfdiscovery as you navigate the highs and lows of fame
supported_languages: english russian french spanish  spain vietnamese korean

the legend of sword and fairy xuanyuan sword the mountain and sea traveler the legend of jin yongs heroes di renjie original as a beginner many contents of the game are still in their infancy and many plots missions maps and props have not yet been added for developers this is a game that takes 3 years to develop and more events to polish  and because of this game i have lost countless hairs and collapsed countless times and i want to give up every day after thinking about it for a long time i think it is possible to release the game in the way of early access just like an online novel write chapter by chapter and update some every week ive finished writing 18 story changes and the detailed script for 4 chapters the game content of 2 chapters has been produced chapter three is in production the music has just started to be made and the painting is also practicing the basic skills i will finish the game as soon as possible after all is done i will gradually update and replace the pictures this process will take about 3 years programindependent systems have been completed and overall integration is still being added attention there are still many pits to be filled and the game is still in the demo state if you accidentally click to buy with trembling hands pay attention to the refund time if the refund time is also missed please dont worry i will update some new content every month and i will add new content every week in the early stage if you encounter bugs or have good suggestions when playing you can contact me by email address i will set up a qq group as soon as possible scolded in real time last i will not give up this game even if there is only one audience i will continue to perform like deyun club until 3 years later the game will be updated in 3 years join our discord
