about_the_game: skyraine is an action packed platformmissile defender game stranded on an alien planet an ancient turret is your only defense against the invasion between waves of enemies rush repair your base and collect supplies and powerups as the game progresses new enemies enter the battlefield each with their own devastating weapons while aim and precision may help you get through the early levels only with the perfect strategy can you hope to conquer the final difficulty play with up to 3 players in local multiplayer and face 4 exponentially challenging difficulties the base walled in between a shield generator your turret lies on the ancient ruins of an extinct civilization a few rusted girders and ladders are all that remain the powerups basic ammo its unlimited i dont know how i dont know why i dont really care its free spray and pray baby shotguns the most plentiful powerup instead of shooting one bullet it shoots like 20 limited range though discblades the most versatile ammunition itll shoot through almost anything vortexes the most dangerous one it destroys anything that gets caught in its void so dont shoot things too close zappys the best way to clear the screen hit an enemy with one of these and it will chain to nearby enemies as well they drop rarely though so use them wisely the supplies supply ships when the music changes you know theyre coming thats your cue to grab all the crates it drops and repair your base ladders and girders the most basic of supplies use these to expand the reach of your base above and below ground batteries load these into a shield generator and it will completely heal the shield and fix the generator mines quite useful devices you can place them on the ground or send them into the air just dont be around it when it goes off autoguns why shoot when you can get something to shoot for you while they have limited ammo theyre nice to have around to take out those pesky spiders zappy mines zappy  mine   the enemies bomber the most basic of bad guys shoot it before it shoots you spiders instead of catching bugs these evil insectoids catch your supplies while they cant go too far above ground they might catch you when they pop up to the surface suckerships possibly the most destructive enemy these breathing blimps suck the life out of you by taking anything that gets caught in its whirlwind mech dogs clanking across the screen these mechanical beasts want to feast on your shield generators breaking through girders and ladders nothing short of a mine will stop this beast from reaching its target suicide ships while the ships themselves dont do too much its the explosion that counts dont let it hit you while youre out of the turret shield ships with a ton of health these lowcruisers like to steal the attention while its buddies blow up your base find the right powerups to take it out fast transports lightarmored ships they dont cause too much of a threat what they drop does corrosive bugs after a nice long trip on the transport these little guys are hungry for just about anything girders ladders your shield its all food to them soldiers these guys come out of a crate like a clown car running at your base they pile on top of each other like zombies until they find a way in after thatits all over scorpions scorpions cant be that scary right wrong very wrong
short_description: skyraine is an action packed platformmissile defender game defend against waves of enemies in your turret and use special powerups to annihilate the stronger hordes leave your turret to strategically expand your base between waves play with up to 3 players in local multiplayer coop will you survive

about_the_game: it was a time of robots reading books sadly all of the printing presses are damaged and they miss single words from each new book as a new recruit to robooks bookstore its your job to make words to complete a book for each customer youll need to serve all of the customers before the day is up or else its game over can you make enough words in time can you solve anagrams in the bonus rounds paper jam puts you inside a bookshop meeting a diverse range of customers in either a career mode  where you get to uncover the story of the robots  or in a quick game mode where you can climb your way up the global leaderboards if you love word games paper jam may be a game youll love to play as much as we loved making it this is one of the first ever vr word games which means its both a physical and a mental game you will need to use two hands to operate the typewriter to make words with so as youre having a great time remember to look after yourself and take breaks if you start to feel tired
short_description: if you love word games and vr youll love playing paper jam can you make enough words before the timer runs out can you solve anagrams to unlock the story of the robots in career mode how about a quick game just for the high score

about_the_game: echoes world is an adventurous maze style puzzle game echoes takes place in the mystical forest selene in order to beat the game you need to find a way out of the mazes in the shortest period of time on your journey you will find yourself into puzzle fields and you will need to solve the given puzzle jigsaw or memory in order to continiue in all the levels you will find colored doors that will require a same color key or a claudia in order to open them the walls in the selene forest are charged with negative energy and drain echoes life points watch out for your life points if the life bar hits  0 you will have to start the level from the beginning once you find your way out you will be one step closer to saving echoes and the selene forest from the dark clouds the story behind echoes world is mystic and adventurous dark clouds are over the selene forest kana the ruler of light in the forest and her child echoes are the only one that can stop the darkness from destroying their home but as the dark clouds are getting stronger kana will lost echoes to the storm the last power of kanas amulet  the claudias are supposed to guide and help echoes trough his way in the selene forest echoes  the source of light has the power to light the dark path for a few seconds using the power of echoes you should be able to navigate trough the dark forest and mazes echoes world has its own build your own level mode in this mode you will be able to make your own level in the way you imagined it and you will be able to challenge other players  online building your own level gives you the opportunity to create a unique design level where you choose where you would like to put a colored door puzzle field and claudias build your own level mode will be unlocked after you complete the campaign levels the first world contains 10 story mode campaign levels and 5 slots for you to save your own levels within the next update echoes world will be exploring the forgoten mystic castle of attis
short_description: adventurous maze style puzzle game find your way out and help echoes world

about_the_game: lets build the routes that connect the platforms this is a firstperson puzzle game where you have to understand the algorithm and select the correct nodes think carefully with a drone as a companion lroom is a puzzle game where you build a route from a starting platform to a platform with the teleporter to get to the next room build the correct route in the unique hologram displayed by the drone nodebased program for building routes shown inside the hologram is a nodebased program consisting of several pages the seed page that sets the initial node list the branch page that defines how node will change the generation page that determines how many times to grow the node list the tree page to browse the built results fix empty or incorrect nodes in the node list on the seed and branch pages you can view the build results on the tree page at always there is no time limit or number of revisions allowed you can repeat trial and error as many times as you like until you build the correct route node types the route is deployed in 3d space 6 types of nodes for going straight x and x y and y z and z in addition there are 24 types of nodes for turning and 10 types for generation page if you can build the correct route once you have built the correct route use the floater to move to the platform with the teleporter you enter the teleporter will transition to the next room please try to escape from all rooms other features ui with only symbols and numbers full controller support steam cloud save
short_description: lets build the routes that connect the platforms this is a firstperson puzzle game where you have to understand the algorithm and select the correct nodesthink carefully with a drone as a companion

about_the_game: zodac and his minions are wreaking havoc and its up to you to stop them lil splody look out below is a casualarcade style game where you dodge and blow up falling enemies in an attempt to rescue your fellow bomblings this is splody a little explosive creature known as a bombling splodys friends have been captured by the evil intergalactic warlord zodac and he needs your help to rescue them avoid being crushed by falling enemies demolish your foes and various obstacles by using your exploding ability and collect shield chips in game currency as you visit different worlds each with its own unique boss battle  all while competing to blast your friends and the worlds highscores away leaving them in your dust  explode onto the leaderboards in single player mode  up to 4 player pvp splitscreen action  rescue and play as 6 different bomblings each with their own unique stats  5 levels to unlock and enjoy  show your style by equipping costumes  controller supported
short_description: zodac and his minions are wreaking havoc its up to you to dodge and blow up falling enemies in an attempt to rescue your fellow bomblings

about_the_game: prepare for the breathtaking challenge of manoeuvring in time and space push your skills to the limit as you spin slow fast near and far to get through fast moving obstacles and traps time your speed and trajectory precisely to pick up various powerups and clear your path traveling in near impossible speed towards the highscore lists super simple mechanic but highly challenging game play with endless levels that will keep you entertained for hours key features  how to play game features gravity based endless spinner pickups powerups more ups super simple controls seriously challenging gameplay gorgeous minimalistic graphics ludicrous leaderboards spiky red evil bits breathtaking challenge in time and space studio messagecreators james hunt peter stråhle mikael groth eeero koivunen elvira björkman joakim svärling mikael degerfält andreas thorsén henrik johansson
short_description: super simple mechanic but highly challenging game play with endless levels that will keep you entertained for hours

about_the_game: in this galaxy there are many who seek to cause chaos from pirates to warlords from thieves to conquerors and that is what the iota coalition exists for when trouble arises on appenna it is up to you to take up the sword of nightmare to carry out swift and lethal justice on the coalitions behalf and eradicate the enemies of peace but when you arrive be ready to uncover more plots and schemes than you bargained for not all secrets were meant to be uncovered features  fast platforming and brutal combat challenges  tons of unique weapons and tools to mix and match  flexible difficulty settings to keep gamers of any experience level engaged  short but engaging story with juuuust the right amount of cynicism  fierce punishing boss battles  bonus endless combat challenges and boss rush mode  made mostly by one guy for fun and love of gaming
short_description: use your fighting skill and superior agility to outmaneuver and dismantle foes in a fastpaced vicious actionplatformer fight your way through fierce battles and frantic platforming challenges earn your place as one of the galaxys legends  if you can survive to the end

about_the_game: evil threatens to overtake the planet when you are betrayed by your friends who want to invoke the manifestation of the dark one our hero scrall is cavalier enough to try and stop them even if underpowered a seemingly unknown ally gives scrall a source of strength and he is able to stop the dark lords coming for now a classic dark divine comedy and epic odyssey recount this gothic rpg sports a visceral modern convolution and a masterful soundtrack a cinematic experience a la film noir will see our hero journey across a custombuilt and detailed landscape in his quest to quell the dark ones minions fighting the full gamut of the children of the night enjoy appropriately haunting yet memorable musical themes composed by a slew of underground greats while undertaking unique puzzles and macabre mysterious quests fullyexpressed emotions across all major and minor character interactions carefully plotted map detail and alternate dialogue depending on who is the party leader will compel you to search for variant outcomes and nuances the diligent explorer will be rewarded as there is a plethora of secret passageways and treasure the variety of hidden and bonus content should keep you playing for 40100 hours once the title leaves beta form you will get wet playing this game possibly soaked in your own blood sweat and tears youve been warned experience the light amp dark fantasy of volvalis tonite daveighsoftskating the edge
short_description: experience a dark epic rpg mystery laden with multifaceted characters and dangerous secrets unfolding with a soundtrack carefully implemented for maximum storytelling and emotional impact the lost land volvalis beckons the intrepid

about_the_game: drop out 0 is an online first person shooter with a twist there are no hitpoints beat your opponents by knocking them out of the map gameplay drop out is played in matches of up to 8 players the goal is to get as many points as possible in a team or alone within the time limit you gain 2 points for every enemy player you knock out of the map and you lose 1 point every time you are knocked out of the park every suicide will result in a withdrawal of 2 points to your own score you clumsy oaf the game offers a variety of weapons that allow for different strategies and playstyles whether you want to rocketjump snipe or fistfight there will be something for you mechanics the game is built for multiplayer you can play online crossplatform easily and quickly there is also an offline mode where you can practice against bots lan mode is clunkily available for windows but can be improved and expanded if there is demand for it playing online will grant you xp which you can spend to get new weapons perks and skills to keep the game balanced you can unlock anything at any time the price per unlock ramps up making sure you can get a full set very quickly but getting every set will take some time the percentage at the bottom of your screen is your susceptibility this number increases as you take damage the higher your susceptibility the more knockback you will experience when taking hits features at the time of writing there are 5 maps 13 weapons 8 perks 2 character models and 2 skins for each i will still be working on adding more content after release which will be gradually added to the game any player can host their own game on provided servers as host you can kickban players and manage the timer and level selection when joining a game the player can choose one of his created character loadouts these can be switched in between deaths the game has been playtested a reasonable amount but there might still be balance issues and bugs i will try to keep up with the steam community to notice and fix such problems as soon as possible system requirements versions are available for windows mac and linux the game is not too heavy performance wise but just in case it has a bare bone setting so you can still run it on your favourite toaster you will of course need internet connection with a reasonable speed to play online in real time about me as you might have guessed there is no professional team behind drop out i am a 21 year old physicist in training from belgium when i’m not discovering the laws of the universe i like to work on my game development in the past few years i have worked on several smaller projects but nothing on the scale of drop out during this time i learned how to work with unity and blender which culminated in drop out 0 no matter what career i might choose in the future i am very passionate about making games so you might see a new title pop up on steam in a few years expect something wildly different though special thanks to doug bryant bulletmagnet for the weapon models and teaching me how to model better marnick39 for helping with coding ideas and balancing unity for their buggy game engine photonengine for their equally buggy networking code thanks to the testing team including cubicwarrior deraldo tafikay woxic patat joey anivia hallway a1 and the funnyjunk community music by louis davita check out his soundcloud additional music by kevin macleod and adrian von ziegler
short_description: drop out 0 is an online first person shooter with a twist there are no hitpoints beat your opponents by knocking them out of the map with various crazy weapons the game features very straightforward crossplatform multiplayer just download set up and play online within 2 minutes

about_the_game: conquer the catch royales everchanging seasonal maps as a hunter and catch them foxes or flip the coin show your inner escape artist and choose to be part of the foxes team the concept is plain and simple the hunters task is to tag them foxes aka catch them as the name indicates however the longer you survive as a fox the higher your reward is various settings various parameters try out party mode in which instead of the standard 100player mode you can battle amongst 250 other fighters for the full experience we added an optional smart ai mode in which you can set the other aihandled foxes and hunters to find the optimal route to simulate the best experience what can i do with my xp the game offers 20 skins you can earn as you go up the staircase of experience points each with a 5000 xp gap future features that are yet to come plain multiplayer mode replay mode create and publish your levels
short_description: remember playing tag we spiced it up a little bit immerse yourself in catch royale a stylized freetoplay battleroyale game with up to 250 players

about_the_game: jump n spin  the new challenge of locomotion do you like dribbling and bouncing balls then check out this new challenge and steer the spinheads to the goal as fast as possible only with the help of gravity amp spin machines have taken control the spinheads are a little bunch of strange creatures who love jumping and spinning around in mysterious caves but life has changed for the worse useful so far their machines became suddenly so powerful that they have taken control now the spinheads are on the way to reconquer their country from the evil metallic force struggle through in best time fight strange machines avoid nasty traps and overcome rotating obstacles on your way to the exit portal as fast as possible move the spinheads through tricky caves and labyrinths in best time and join the speedrun to rank in the global high score unlock more characters steelia rambel ghostel mummel speedia amp co collect newtons on your way to unlock all spinheads with different stats and find out which character suits you best destroy the energy source explore the mysterious caves and gather all the hidden keystones on your way to face the final fight destroy ultimately the mighty energy source to free the country from the metallic force have you got what it takes
short_description: the jump n spin challenge fight strange machines avoid nasty traps and overcome rotating obstacles in this new kind of speedrun game for all those who love to play with balls based on gravity amp spin

about_the_game: the power of time is at your fingertips take control of a powerful chronomancer in this mysterious puzzleplatformer explore the chronical school to discover its secrets and learn new spells will you save all of the professors and reveal the mystery of the time loop features innovative puzzles and mechanics 4 magic spells to master 23 hours of gameplay fascinating mysteries chronical is a singleplayer puzzleplatforming game this is a pc game with gamepad controls only the game contains 23 hours of gameplay with fresh new mechanics and puzzles you haven’t seen before the game was created by the class of 20222023 of campus adn a school of videogame development in montréal québec
short_description: the power is at your fingertips take control of a powerful chronomancer in this mysterious puzzleplatformer explore the chronical school to discover its secrets and learn new spells can you save all of the professors and reveal the mystery of the time loop

about_the_game: this is a fan game based on touhou project in which the protagonist kedama is just a nobody in the inferior of gensokyo proceeding for rescuing their friends kedama doesn’t own any ability of remote attack but their perseverance and magic movement make themself face challenges on the way and explore the world of gensokyo plots there is no ifs and buts that can stop one rescuing their friends no dialog but through the perspective of kedama and the funny minianimation you can easily realize what have happened in the gensokyo world initial controls ↑ ↓ ← → move c key attack x key jump z key dash no invincibility tips 1 press f1 to make the popup bar come up and then click the setting where you can change the controls 2 attack combos need to be discovered characteristics 1 classic 2d pixel avg 2 easy to master 3 two different difficulty levels easy amp hardfor you to challenge 4 five continents separately presenting the various world of gensokyo 5 cute animation style and funny story line which must will make you enjoy

about_the_game: the ultimate holiday puzzle collection  over 150 christmas puzzles for all the family to enjoy  brought to you by casual arts developer of the classic series of christmas wonderland games the ultimate christmas puzzler is a mega collection of over 150 happy holiday christmas themed puzzles celebrate the season playing lots of different puzzle types including jigsaws rotates flipsaws word searches concentration and many more play great puzzles featuring santa claus mrs claus and the elves visit the north pole santa’s workshops see his sleigh flying around the world to the usa and homes in springfield there are puzzles for everyone and players of all ages and all abilities will feel included and love playing them play at your own pace play alone or with family and friends the game’s sensational puzzles come in easy medium hard amp extreme categories casual arts specialise in making games for everyone to enjoy and the ultimate christmas puzzler is yet another of their great games designed to bring you hour upon hour of fabulous gameplay time and time again

about_the_game: get ready for an exciting adventure on an island you could only dream of kick back and enjoy the superb sunsets golden beaches and hours of diving all wrapped together with super fun solitaire layouts  complete all the solitaire deals make your ideal card chain  enjoy explosive holidays in the tropics  exciting levels that are sure to keep you entertained  get rid of cards faster with jokers and increase the combo multiplier to earn more coins  remove cards faster to increase your combo multiplier and get more coins  original themed decks and 12 card back styles

short_description: laser paddles is a pong game where you can destroy your opponents paddle or have your own paddle destroyed lasers fly power ups are activated balls go crazy

about_the_game: unique puzzle game  seemingly easy casual game at first but will still challenge you test you skill and perception and try pulling off tricky shots fun for all ages  you can hit the bubbles that are not crystalized are not inside a hexagon using the wand match 3 or more same color bubbles to make them burst if you leave a crystalized bubble isolated by bursting all bubbles adjacent to it then you can hit and decrystalize it bubbles in the center zone will always be crystalized if a bubble touches a crystalized bubble and there is no color matching it will also become crystalized if crystalized bubbles reach the area where the player character can move its game over
short_description: unique puzzle game  seemingly easy casual game at first but will still challenge you test you skill and perception and try pulling off tricky shots fun for all ages

about_the_game: can you finish this game in 10 minutes bots chaos is an action fps game where you must destroy many robots to beat a score in 10 minutes you will never get bored in this casual hard and fast paced semi procedural game full of annoying robots lasers and chaos you have to destroy the robots using the different weapons that you have and you also have to avoid the attacks of the robots and the harmful elements of the environment using bullet time unlimited bullet time you can slow down time whenever you want but while you cant attack and the countdown to 10 minutes will speed up weapons pistol  high precision and overloaded attack shotgun  with secondary attack multiple targets machine gun  with secondary attack fixed target microgun  high rate of fire movement skills long dash double jump world the environment is composed of sectors selected in a pseudorandom way depending on the current score the difficulty increases and the selected sectors are more difficult in the sectors there are aggressive robots that you must destroy and also there are elements such as turrets mobile lasers saws which will make your job more difficult
short_description: can you finish this game in 10 minutes bots chaos is an action fps game where you must destroy many robots to beat a score in 10 minutes you will never get bored in this casual hard and fast paced semi procedural game full of annoying robots lasers and chaos

about_the_game: use your voice to charm the people around you or focus on the power of magic to destroy your enemies start a servant rebellion or use poison to solve your problems do what your patron deity tells you to or abandon their teachings stay loyal to the pharaoh or betray him and join the forces of darkness to change the face of egypt forever temple of endless night is a thrilling 200000 word interactive fantasy novel by dariel ivalyen where your choices fully control the story its entirely textbasedwithout graphics or sound effectsand fueled by the vast unstoppable power of your imagination when a strange man stops you on the streets of your hometown and sends you to an ancient temple that no one seems to know anything about you grow both curious and worried as the caravan gets closer to the mysterious place you realize that the world around you isn’t exactly what it seems you see things that are not there and you can tell something is deeply wrong something is trying to influence your mind when you find yourself surrounded by nightmares and illusions will you use the light to cast them out or will you help them become reality choose your gender male female nonbinary play as gay straight bisexual and asexual romance one of four unique characters a charming mercenary a sensible and caring servant a calculative high priest or a forgotten pharaoh choose your town class and god work on your relationship with your patron react to situations differently based on your sanity level experience many different endings including bad ones enjoy the beauty of ancient egypt will you serve the light or give in to darkness
short_description: when you discover that the serpent of chaos is trying to destroy egypt will you stand against him or will you help spread his eternal darkness

about_the_game: sky road is a casual game for all ages it doesnt take much effort choose an emotion for yourself and take a ride along the celestial road collecting coins the further you pass the more reward in the game you have to manage the clouds and the chosen smiley in the store will confidently follow the path you have planned for every tenth point the reward will increase управление enterspace  begin or restart ad ←→  rotate sky to the leftright esc  exit
short_description: sky road is a casual game for all ages it does not take much effort in a calm atmosphere choose an emotion for yourself and take a ride along the celestial road collecting coins the further you pass the more reward

about_the_game: creation of a god when the last king gave up the crown the world was reset the glow pierced the darkness the portals to divine ascension will be restored a young warrior suddenly woke up in his tent it was time to challenge a god the game mixes elements of platforming puzzles and combat in a tormented world ruled by a mysterious god only the most daring will be able to move forward and conquer the golden crown the game mixes turnbased strategy elements with realtime game mechanics during your adventure you will have to solve puzzles using the power of the crown with it you can move allies on the board and use the power of the godscards there are 10 types of allies that you can move on the board and you will have to take advantage of their characteristics to progress through the levels the world will be full of enemies to defeat in real time in addition to melee you will be able to learn 12 spells during the journey spells will allow you to have a great advantage during battles at the end of each world a boss will try to stop you from continuing you will have to defeat him to continue there will be many types of traps on the path some traps are specific to the type of world you will be in for example you will find giant skulls in the arcane desert or spore shooters in the cursed forest more than 80 levels approximately 10 hours of gameplay two possible endings original soundtrack 80 min lost dreams echo in deep space they can only be reached during eclipses
short_description: the game mixes elements of platforming puzzles and combat in a tormented world ruled by a mysterious god only the most daring will be able to move forward and conquer the golden crown

about_the_game: get tanked is a fastpaced split screen or online multiplayer arena shooter where tanks break the laws of physics double jumps yes rotating in midair sure why not driving on a wall and even ceiling of course how could it be otherwise challenge your friends to ridiculous but intense combat games are supposed to be fun not realistic  albert einstein he could have said that who knows never seen a tank that can jump now you have occasion to drive one additionally you can double jump because why limit yourself not to mention driving on walls and ceiling use these abilities to outplay the enemies but be aware they can do the same the funny thing is when you give tanks ability to jump be extremely fast and add some ramps to maps they are now fighting in air so yeah there is an aerial combat in this game to completely destroy realism you can rotate your tank in air you know what does it mean 360 no scope while in the air with a tank baby enjoy beating your friends locally in splitscreen multiplayer up to 4 or online up to 8 with an interactive main menu there is no more idle waiting for other players while you wait you can customize your tank choose game mode and map or draw something with the trail of your tank
short_description: get tanked is an adrenalinefilled arena shooter with tanks that can double jump boost and rotate midair use power ups to outplay your enemies in creative ways dive into insane dynamic fights and have a blast playing locally or online

about_the_game: cosmic panic is an arcade style chaotic party game for one to four players choose a unique character in the cosmic panic universe to duke it out or team up with your friends in a variety of arcade style games will your friends survive or thrive in the chaos arcade variety engage in a variety of cosmic panic twisted arcade style game types set high scores as you run from monstrous blobs or race around the arcade to collect the most points in platforming style gameplay survive the pull of the wormhole blast through portals and defend the space station in topdown space adventuring gameplay and dodge asteroids and chase down energy crystals to thrive in 3d space flight style gameplay theres a chaotic mix of gameplay styles to challenge everyone challenging gameplay simple controls all game types are crafted to be arcadefriendly with simple controls and the gameplay is increasingly challenging to really set the highest of scores you will need to survive and thrive long enough to persist through environment changes andor boss encounters each game type offers as the difficulty ramps up teamsize highscore charts high score charts are separated by team sizes 1 2 3 and 4 players play solo or together to top the charts and leave your mark
short_description: arcade style party game for one to four players top the highscore charts in a variety of game types in topdown platforming and 3d third person perspectives play with friends local couchparty style or online with steam remote play

about_the_game: gather resources build a village and protect your people give them jobs to become self sufficient and arm them to survive the attacks of hungry predators become strong enough to face the depths of what lurks beneath the surface in a procedurally generated dungeon and hope you have prepared well enough for when they strike back will you be victorious and secure your peoples future this is your quest your quest 2 is a village building sim with rpg mechanics and dungeon crawling features resource gathering turnbased combat if you build a village they will come dont like chopping trees or mining rocks assign those jobs to your villagers so you dont have to manage rpg stats for you and your villagers that can be adjusted at any time with no penalty craft your own weapons and armor craft overpowered spells of doom explore the depths of a procedural dungeon for loot and the most precious resources

about_the_game: story johnny is the ultimate fighter destined for greatnessat least he thinks so after getting rejected from the gladiators guild tryouts once again he sets off on an adventure to become the gladiator he knows he can be along the way hell team up with a shotguntoting schizoid mouse a dancing kungfu cat and other colorful combatants features 12 total playable characters from maneating ghosts to killer robots to clerics no teammate left behind the party levels up as one and shares the same equipment levels havent used a character in a while no problem friendly mode an alternate script that replaces all the spicy stuff for a friendlier experience modesty settings let you choose between nudity and skimpy outfits or more modest junkcovering designs for enemies and outfits three difficulty settings that affect enemy resistances and the effects of their abilities bonus outfits and weapons for owners of zerans folly and leowald talk to kista in tenforks or kirkeby and shell deliver your gifts 200 abilities to master each character can have 8 abilities equipped at a time and many have 15 to choose from 150 runes equipment modifiers each character can have up to 9 runes equipped at a time save builds and share them with your friends ingame bestiary gives you the scoop on dozens of enemies and bosses
short_description: a twisted storydriven actionrpg with endless ways to build your party of colorful combatants

about_the_game: elephant games brings you a thrilling new adventure in midnight calling wise dragon a letter from your father leads you to your hometown when you arrive you find it in flames your only hope is to decipher your father’s research and find the wise dragon but are they a friend or a foe with the clock ticking it’s up to you to find out do you have what it takes to battle against evil to save your people from destruction find out in this riveting hiddenobject puzzle adventure game  bargain with the sphinx in the bonus chapter  unlock the super puzzle challenge in the secret room  find collectible dragons and assemble a bonus fresco painting  earn achievements and enjoy exclusive music and artwork  never get lost with the strategy guide

about_the_game: prepare for a brand new adventure in pocket universe a game which combines adored mechanics from strategy and rpg genres our vision is an experience which does not solely revolve around the player but also the world itself which is inhabited by artificially intelligent agents pocket universe tells the story of a humancreated planet following events which threatened the survival of the human race full version features while playing rpg game enjoy the strategy game you can access all the strategic items thanks to the help npc while playing the rpg game third person action rpg and strategy elements four factions 16000 km2 mainland  4000 km2 island map minimum 10 hours main mission every npc own personality every npc have friendsenemyhave their own thought etc 100 buildable building buildings you can build in your own districts and outposts 125 different soldier troops number of soldier types trained by yourself and other communities 10 capturable village and outpost coincidental artificial intelligence coincidental ai with our selfdeveloped artificial intelligence in every new game is different game relations between communities are completely random relationships between npcs are randomyou will have different enemies and friends in each new gameevery move you make and artificial intelligence will affect all relationshipsunfortunately main tasks remain static

about_the_game: oculus users note this game will not work for front facing or seated only setups 360 degree rotation and standing room required this game was not made specifically for oculus i do not own an oculus rift i had people with rifts report a minor bug with the wrong parts of the controller highlighting on the right hand solve puzzles and find items to use in those puzzles or just make your own fun trashing a virtual home perplexity suburban home is the first in a series of vr escape room games from trash dragon games that was designed for the htc vive virtual reality system the game has been verified to work with the oculus rift through the steamvr and openvr systems oculus rift users must have steamvr installed and enabled for this game to work as an enthusiast of vr escape rooms and escape rooms in general i have done many different escape room experiences and i tried to find a good balance between being difficult for the sake of being difficult being too easy and being more than just a search quest although you will be searching in this game thats for sure in case you do find it too difficult a hint system has been added that will allow you to receive hints every 5 minutes i recommend saving experiences like this for when friends are around so everybody can watch on a monitor and give suggestions to the person in the game world its a lot of fun to play along you can switch the audio from the vr headset to your speakers too
short_description: perplexity suburban home is a vr game designed for the htc vive solve puzzles and find items to use in those puzzles or just make your own fun trashing a virtual home

about_the_game: wave after wave of terror  your childhood friend calls you to fight the forest monsters that he has awakened experience the thrill of dynamic and fast gameplay with the dash mechanic within beautiful voxel environments  survive the night  unlock an arsenal of weapons and fight up to 7 boss  each with their distinct tactics and strengths to become the ultimate warrior in this relentless actionpacked game as night falls face hordes of enemies in a battle for survival your skills will be put to the ultimate test
short_description: enter the world of nightcrawler nightcrawler is a wavebased fps in a semivoxel style dash through the night where you battle zombies werewolves ghosts and reptilians from outer space

about_the_game: please note this game currently requires 2 players to launch a server and play together a lonely mystic got tired of playing board games alone  what better solution than to bring the figurines to life in vr play as the mystic the game master or one of the dungeon crawling warriors taking on quests using classic rpg elements to battle enemies and discover surprises along the way meet up with friends to go on a roleplaying adventure together to complete quests while battling enemies and overcoming challenges navigate dynamically generated dungeons utilize your character’s unique weapons spells and actions to join forces and beat the omnipresent game master select from either the wizard or sorceress as the game master select from one of the warrior figurines cometolife fighter thief cleric mage dwarf elf tabletop warriors is a 2 player vr game and includes a game master it is designed to share an immersive adventure with trusted friends this game is available in vr only using the oculus rift meta quest and valve index headsets meta quest users use the meta quest link software free to access the game on the headset
short_description: tabletop warriors is an immersive multiplayer vr experience in the tradition of a tabletop dungeon crawling adventure players transform into figurines on the table and must navigate dynamically generated dungeons under the ever watchful eye of the game master 2 players required to play

about_the_game: anime play life unlimited is an adventure and second life simulation game where you are able to do quests with your character created in the character creation in any location find a job and work there buy place and customize your own houses place furniture on your property or into your houses fish on any lake or sea picnic buy ships boats outfits items and much more features character creation  edit the face and body of your character in the character creation get jobs  go to stores or restaurants and apply for a job to work there housingbuild system  buy place and customize your own houses you are also able to buy furniture and place it on your property or into your houses outfits and clothing items  you can buy outfits and accessories to visually customize your character barber shop  buy new haircuts and cosmetics fishing  you are able to go fishing on any lake or sea with an fishing rod interact  you can interact with different characters and objects such as a computer chair bed treasure chests and more ships and boats  you can buy customize and drive boats and ships to explore islands and more and mush more  picnic buy and sell items and more
short_description: anime play life unlimited is an adventure and second life simulation game where you are able to do quests with your character created in the character creation in any location find a job and work there buy place and customize your own houses fish on any lake or sea and much more

about_the_game: game overview where a girl is tragically murdered by a devilish man again and again the game itself is quite easy as it takes only several minutes to get the last scene however if she were not harmed at all throughout the game you will get no ryona animations mash the attack button to perform combination attacks as you go on stages you will see different combination attacks the bar in the upper side of the screen represents the enemys health konomi nakahara heroine does not have a health bar when konomi is damaged a ryona animation is to be displayed since it takes place in her nightmare death doesnt mean the end of ryona there are three stages level brutality escalates with each stage when you beat the enemy you can choose either to go to the next or to end the game ryona animation list  lv1 neck hanging punch kick blood drain beat with bat iron maiden water torture  lv2 transfix cut across abdomen gundown guillotine seitei juujiryou from fst of the north star daruma dismembering  limblessness wooden horse  lv3 saw wheel the world from jjo cutting abdomen beheading ground meat  mince traffic accident note  please confirm system compatibility via the trial version before purchasing  this product contains grotesque expressions please be warned
short_description: where a girl is tragically murdered by a devilish man again and again the game itself is quite easy as it takes only several minutes to get the last scene however if she were not harmed at all throughout the game you will get no ryona animations

about_the_game: nyctophobia fear the dark is a firstperson horror survival game based on scp and foundation lore you play as a foundation detention class member sent to investigate the brutal massacre of the residents of erfurt village a gated community located in the modernday midwest with nothing but a flashlight to protect themselves during the player’s investigation they discover the anomaly hunts its victims using fear how it spreads from one location to another how it came into existence and how it broke containment the player will use their flashlight to navigate the small spaces as the creature toys with the player they will need to solve puzzles and defeat the creature in deadly games of tag and hidenseek in order to survive
short_description: nyctophobia is a thrilling physiological horror game that challenges players to confront a terrifying scp that preys on their deepest fears the game takes place in a neighborhood where players must navigate through the darkness and uncover the mystery behind the strange occurrences

about_the_game: super bit adventure paragons of life is a perma death dungeon crawler where you take on the role of a mysterious hero that survived a battle inside of a magical prison enter the prison and discover what happened on that fateful day and collect the powers of fallen adventurers along the way utilize their powers and slaughter the hordes of monsters that stand between you and the truth a new path update is now live talent system the new talent system will give you greater control over how you play the game mix and match talents and unlock new talent trees with the achievement system will you focus your efforts on melee paragons or put forth all your strength into magic you choose achievements unlock achievements as you play the game these can also grant you new powers new paragons over 25 new paragons can you find them all new items new items to go along with the new treasure system find powerful artifacts that will unleash destruction on your enemies the paragons these are the adventurers that have come before you each with their own strength abilities and agendas find and seek the ones most suitable to your play style swap between them during battle and utilize their abilities to lay waste to your enemies the prison once a prison for monsters that roamed the land it has undergone a change in management battle through static floors and memorize the right path to continue your adventure once you have fallen
short_description: super bit adventure paragons of life is a perma death dungeon crawler where you take on the role of a mysterious hero that survived a battle inside of a magical prison enter the prison and discover what happened on that fateful day and collect the powers of fallen adventurers along the way

about_the_game: plot every ancient game has a story behind its origins scripted from an exciting scifi perspective this is a story of how the ancient snakesampladders board game came to be millions of years ago the galaxy was devastated by a terrifying war between the humans and reptilians it all began on a dark desolate earthlike swampfilled forest world in a distant uncharted corner of the galaxy a galactictrialliance officer faces off with serpentlike reptilians while searching for an artefact that could change the fate of the galaxy episode 1 delves into this first encounter between the two species before the galactic war began snakesnladders origins  episode 1 is a small fun tense and entertaining shooter game it starts with a slow rhythm and ends with a big bang content episode 1 the primary story based game the hunt unlockable mini game episode 1 type scifi story based action shooter camera perspective first person map 1  a single large forest levels 6 first level is the forest floor next 3 levels are each a stage higher up in altitude in the map last 2 levels are different in nature average duration 1 hour the hunt mini game access unlocked mini game after completing episode 1 type mission based hunting strategy camera perspective first person map 1  same single large forest levels 1  the hunting mission average duration unpredictable episode 1 features readlisten to textaudio logs to learn about the story and your objectives collect bodyarmor to increase health capacity use different weapons to destroy your enemies the weapons are not a choice they are a necessity fight different enemies as you go to each level plenty of ammo around auto healthregeneration the indispensable flashlight a save station at each level of the game ingame autosave to continue from a key locationtime in the game the next time you play without having to save at a save station the hunt mini game features try your hunting skills on this unique enemy use binocularmotiontracker mode to track the enemy hide in the bushes or on top of small trees waiting in ambush for or fleeing away from the enemy you have only one weapon at your disposal there are no health dispensers other than your auto healthregenerator and its slow no ingame autosave only one save station map is the same forest as episode 1 but you only hunt on the forest floor not the stages above remember while you are hunting him he is hunting you and he can do the same things that you can plus some more its just you and him fun facts about gameplay concept differences only the most basic gameplay concepts of the snakesampladders board game were integrated into this game board game the player has to keep going up the board to the destination this game the forest represents the board each higher level in this game is represented by a stage of wooden rampways at a higher altitude in the forest board game ladders assist the player to go up the board faster this game there are ramps that the player must walk up to go to the next level board game snakes bring you down this game enemy serpents either force you off the rampways to a lower down level or kill you altogether the existence of the rampways and the serpents is explained in the game more info please visit the official sagnithi website for more information regarding snakesnladders origins  episode 1
short_description: every ancient game has a story behind its origins scripted from an exciting scifi perspective this is a story of how the ancient snakesampladders board game came to be snakesnladders origins  episode 1 is a small fun tense and entertaining shooter game

about_the_game: this is a fantasythemed match 3  jigsaw puzzle mashup players that like match 3 blast games may appreciate a different take on match 3 you are not merely collecting but also attempting to solve for a pretty pattern it has input accessibility and difficulty settings which can make the experience not only accessible but therapeutic the easiest setting this game can be played with keyboard only or gamepad only 2 button mode supported or of course with touch or mouse breaking up the levels is a story about bruce and his lacklustre adventures it also has a builtin traditional match 3 level designer and a nonrandom one
short_description: this is a fantasythemed game that is a mashup between a match 3 game and a jigsaw puzzle

about_the_game: game overview hozui rio who secretly expresses herself differently by dressing in cosplay costumes has been publicly active on the internet please enjoy the visual novel type avg makeover desire all characters are over 18 years old  intro the story of the office lady who likes cosplay activity various happenings and hot episodes about her cosplay appearing on the internet please enjoy the visual novel type avg makeover desire  story the office lady hozui rio is tall and confident in her style but she doesnt have clothes that fit well with her even though she wants to be stylish this her desire is always in the middle of her thoughts as time goes by she gradually prefers simple and neat suits for her office work even her makeup becomes very simple and her hairstyle is now short hair with her appearance her male teammate makes fun of her for the lack of delicateness as a woman and her bosses now consider her to be a manlike woman and often recommend her drinking with them together maybe it finally makes her give up on decorating herself as a beauty  but to her there is a secret hobby she could never tell her work colleagues its rion at the heart of the internet cosplayer community she makes cosplay costumes herself and she starts to have passionate fans who like her this is another hidden look of her but a new cosplayer rival comes out thats kurumin in fact kurumin is the sister of her other cosplayer friend but kurumin quickly gained popularity with her moe position in the cosplay community our rion starts to have sexy matches versus with kurumin at the request of cosplay fans that competition between them started with cheongsam china dress but it will cause various hot events  main game system  adjust message speed bgm se and etc  backlog  window deletion mode  skip function for scenes you have already seen  about this game  videos and screenshots on the store page are part of the content  the story unfolds as you read through the scenario  the story branches by your choices  all characters are over 18 years old  store page translation by nyanco channel
short_description: the story of the office lady who likes cosplay activity various happenings and hot episodes about her cosplay appearing on the internet please enjoy the visual novel type avg makeover desire

about_the_game: part puzzler part farmsim part cyberpunk part serious game an addictive vr experience that requires a constant need for ingame booster tabs in order to gain more knowledge about potentially addictive real world substances setting and gameplay cyber dose puts the player in the place of an ai databot located in the central node of a newly created neural network within the hexr cloud system your role is to analyse and gather data on digital twins of illicit substance samples beamed in by ai health bots positioned on earth you will gain knowledge about each samples molecular structure manufacture and usage effects this data must then be packaged and beamed back within a limited time frame to assist and educate humans about what the makeup of substances are before they consume them continue to collect data and learn in order to expand the neural network and increase the speed of data package delivery be sure to stay boosted while completing tasks or you run the risk of crashing and entering bot rehab and still while human drug related harm around the world continues to increase if too many countries reach extreme harm levels you will be summoned by the bot integrity unit or even worse deregistered and shut down features the only hands on game to discover more about the chemistry manufacture use and health implications of real world illicit substances endless gameplay with randomized drug samples and unlimited construction of ingame neural network digi vibes neon environment and haptics to tingle the senses
short_description: part puzzler part farmsim part cyberpunk part serious game you are an ai databot in a new neural network in the hexr cloud gather data on digital twins of illicit drugs beamed in by ai health bots build your neural network stay boosted while completing tasks or you could end up in bot rehab

about_the_game: an application that lets you lay down roads this is your future nonfictional story these objects will be programmed when you place them on the road placing cardboard that has the name of an image file will display that image placing cardboard and adding a note to it will display the message in the note placing a calculator with a mathematical expression attached to it will evaluate that expression in other words just putting these objects on the road will program them creating an application is this for people who are good at programming and math and stuff we hear you ask or drawing is hard though i cant do it lol or youre a programmer right bring me your pc well you couldnt be more wrong you dont need to have an indepth knowledge of programming all well say is that programming is the magic of the computing world now use whatever magic you like and craft a human story thats unforgettable we encourage you to make lets plays and live streams however doing so will be your own responsiblity contents manual html file sample contains a number of carp and rice files readmeentxt text file readmejptxt text file carp

about_the_game: frag is a roguelike gridless turnbased game of tactical combat kill the enemy grab the loot craft new gear level up your team learn new skills if you lose a single match you are done how long can you survive gridless turnbased tactical combat frag tries to capture the experience of miniature wargaming use distances and templates to measure range and movement units activate one at a time in an order determined by their statistics attacks hit or miss based on a percent roll that is influenced by a unit’s stats weapons and skills intuitive cover system cover is your friend cover keeps you alive if you are in cover enemies cannot shoot you this does not prevent you from shooting them though watch your units pop out of cover attack their target then pop back in specialized skills and gear winning a match requires much more than just shooting defend your position deploying automated turrets shield your teammates with energy barriers buff your units or hack into enemy droids customize your team between each match your team can gain new gear and skills each unit can choose a different class each one with its skill progression find the right combination of classes and skills synergies and combos to multiply your team’s strength and cancel out each individual unit’s weaknesses
short_description: frag is a roguelike gridless turnbased game of tactical combat that takes place in the near future kill the enemy grab the loot craft new gear level up your team learn new skills if you lose a single match you are done how long can you survive

about_the_game: take off on the wings of angels with kenji nakahara his friends and his copilots hundreds of years into the future a mysterious race known as the sierrans has come pouring through the jump point  and humanity is up against the ropes pressed into military service youre off to the alliance space force where youll get to make every single decision for kenji during what will come to be called the battle of epsilon iridani from his choices in the cockpit to how he navigates his relationships with his friends copilots and maybe even his lovers  your decisions matter in this visual novel from erodh c amp c and speaking of relationships  if you thought navigating life as a single guy was hard just wait until you try it in the middle of a war the results can be anywhere from hilarious to sexy as we combine the ecchi genre with epic scifi storytelling from your old friend ayako to your redhot commanding officer your relationships evolve naturally with your choices dont forget the fleet is small and your reputation proceeds you and with 31 unlockable cgs and some very sexy finales to each romance plot the angels on your wing will give you plenty of reason to come back for more as an added bonus youll get additional unlockable cgs in the form of an ending tracker  visual novel explorers will never be left to wonder if theyve seen it all yet wings of angels does not contain nudity or explicit descriptions of sexual activity
short_description: fun romance drama and sexy moments with the beautiful babes of wings of angels a science fiction visual novel featuring some of the hottest copilots youll ever fly with

about_the_game: jumping pirates are fun adventures where you have to get to the finish line alive but there are some problems with that  overcome obstacles collect coins avoid water and sharp objects a real cubic platformer where you will find everything  complex levels nice voxel 3d graphics summer and pirate atmosphere complete all levels and defeat all enemies many challenging levels full of dangerous traps and monsters nice 3d graphics gamepad support
short_description: jumping pirates are fun adventures where you have to get to the finish line alive but there are some problems with that  overcome obstacles collect coins avoid water and sharp objects complete all levels and defeat all enemies

about_the_game: help the frog to find a new home after seeing the forest being destroyed by human progress and its water invaded by dangerous creatures reach the other side avoiding the hazards and dangers move the tiles around find one of the hidden paths that will lead you to your goal and never lose hope hoping forest is a low poly tilebased puzzle game with a relaxing atmosphere where your goal is to find a safe hidden path for the frog enjoy up to 60 levels in 4 different difficulties each one with 2 possible solutions while listening to some relaxing lofi music move and rotate the different tiles to create the perfect path for each map avoid the hazards while you manage the fixed tiles that will force you to take a specific path try to catch files in your way to increase your score but be aware theres a limited amount of steps that the frog can do or search for a straight and quick path to the other side dive into this relaxing world with some lofi beats and take all the time you need to find that perfect solution you are looking for
short_description: help the little frog to safely reach the other side avoiding the hazards and dangers within the forest move the tiles around you to find one of the hidden paths that will lead you to your goal

about_the_game: audiospace brings music playback and visualization to a new level and to new venues from home use to live stages enjoy it on your desktop pc or project it on a wall as a nextlevel party decoration stream your audiovisual art performances or get immersed in vr built from ground up to fully utilize the computing power of modern pcs it provides unparalleled visual fidelity enabled by unreal engine youll be located in a virtual room that orbits a planetstar of your choice on the walls of the room you may choose to display vectorscopes phase wheels spectrum columns spectrograms and waveforms each wall has also a media player supporting a wide range of audio and video formats as well as playlists inside the room and in the surrounding space you have a selection of unique 3d visualization elements that you may combine and configure to your liking sound moves and shapes the elements particles dance to the rhythm chill out watching the auroras fly over rolling wavescapes or engage full speed into a warp tunnel freely configurable scene presets can be instantly selected with keyboard or set to change at random or in order when silence is detected between tracks randomization can also be activated for visualization parameters and color palettes virtual reality is supported through steamvr reference hardware is pimax 5k plus with valve index controllers finger tracking included but any steamvr compatible vr headset should work controller support is readily available for windows mixed reality and oculus touch but can be customized and expanded via steamvr input in vr music and visualization can come together in a wonderful way nowhere else does one have the freedom to see absolutely anything only limit is the imagination audiospace puts this freedom into good use and creates an unprecedented way of experiencing music enjoy
short_description: the best audio visualizer this side of the galaxy experience your favorite music like never before
genres: audio production design  illustration utilities video production

about_the_game: overcome your crippling hangover and work out how to get the narwhal back pointandclick your way around town run errands and uncover the mystery but choose who you help carefully  your decisions may come back to bite you think outside the box and brace yourself for a feverdream adventure find the orange narwhal is an interactive fiction remake of a game originally made in powerpoint yes thats right in 4606 slides frankly the plot makes absolutely no sense and was just an excuse to do a multiverse mashup of game themes and mechanics weve got everything from pirates ninjas police clowns mermaids zombies and more npcs inspired by the flash games of the early 2000s embrace the chaos and get the satisfaction of finishing a challenge you didnt know you needed to begin with
short_description: overcome your crippling hangover and work out how to get the narwhal back pointandclick your way around town run errands and uncover the mystery but choose who you help carefully  your decisions may come back to bite you think outside the box and brace yourself for a feverdream adventure

about_the_game: you return from a journey to find a mysterious castle has appeared in the distance and a dark power radiates out from it affecting everyone you find a box with a deck of cards that grant you magical powers feeling the presence of other card holders you set off towards the castle to put an end to the evil looming overhead run jump and slash your way through 13 stages with retro inspired gameplay freely switch between 8 different weapons to handle different situations defeat bosses to gain their powers and combine them with your weapons to create over 70 kinds of magic stages have multiple exits allowing you to forge a different path every playthrough to discover new stages and magics
short_description: fight your way through 13 retro inspired stages utilize the powers of your enemies to create over 70 magic spells and explore multiple routes on your way to the mysterious castle

about_the_game: what is winfray winfray is an online multiplayer winterthemed snowball fighting game that i developed all by myself choose between a few game modes them being snowball fight  minigames  and hordes  snowball fight fight against other players in this multiplayer ffa arena shooter pressing e in a snowball pile to pick up a snowball or use the other weapons available to you ammo for different weapons can be purchased in the buy menu by pressing q  the game mode is recommended to be played with at least 34 people but 2 players can still work other features include cosmetics double jumping crouching sprinting fast falling minigames choose from a list of minigames where you can earn coal hordes prevent hordes of enemies from reaching the giant chicken in this singleplayer game mode earn tokens and xp by killing enemies while they try to destroy tour chicken your goal is to survive for 2 minutes and youll receive an additional 200 xp and 100 tokens these tokens can be used for upgrades that increase the health of your chicken your snowballs damage and your movement speed choose a difficulty before starting and stop the horde reviews i look nothing like the ingame character model very fun to play with friends 1010  vegandoritos i love the sexy running animation  some random polish dude game of the decade  me
short_description: a very epic and goofy winterthemed snowball fight game combat other players in a fastpaced first person arena shooter play minigames to earn rewards or fight against hordes of enemies and upgrade yourself

about_the_game: you can enjoy tennis with a natural swing with the controller as a racket especially for experienced tennis you can enjoy a very realistic feeling of operation you can set details such as the height of the player the height of the hit point grip etc and you can play with your own style by nurturing computer characters you can nurture strong players since the character learns by artificial intelligence you should become an excellent trainer and grow characters besides network fighting we have a watching mode that allows nearby players to watch the battle situation not only the person wearing vr goggles but also the people around can share fun
short_description: this game is a vr tennis game that offers a realistic tennis experience you can play against other players develop your character enter the tour to get the ranking and more
supported_languages: english japanese french italian russian simplified chinese german spanish  spain traditional chinese korean

about_the_game: throw your stone then it rolls away and you are forced to move to the point where the stone stops the rule is so simple as the same as golf you can practice as many times as you like using red stone press oculus touch b or y button to retry be careful when you throw the normal gray stone if you failed it rolls away and the next time you are in an unexpected place once youve thrown the gray one you can not retry you can switch between the red one and the gray one by pressing oculus touch a or x button regardless of your dominant arm you can throw it by your either hand showing the menu is assigned on oculus touch menu button this game is a fully autosave you cannot save at will and if you quit the game and then resume it you will resume from where you were last youre not always just throwing the stone sometimes you are required to play just to put it at your feet therefore you need to install a tracking sensor so that you can track down to your feet also play in a room with high ceilings as you may be throwing stones high right above you or placing them high up and also this is an obvious one if you dont want to get injured play in a tidy and spacious enough room when playing vr games you will likely experience real heights in this game so if you have height phobia dont play this game throw the stone and get the goal above good luck
short_description: throw your stone and you are forced to move to the point where it stops the rule is as the same as golf

about_the_game: this game is a popcute shooting game the objective of the game is to defeat the stage bosses and win all the stages to defeat the bosses you need bullets and bombs to damage them there are 3 types of bullets you can use normalbullets when you shoot it it will go straight ahead it has the most firepower of all bullets raising the level will not only increase the firepower but also shorten the firing interval trackingbullet when shot at an enemy it will track towards that enemy the firepower is a little low raising the level will not only increase the firepower but also the tracking performance reflectivebullet when they hit a nonenemy target they bounce back the firing interval is long raising the level not only increases the firepower but also the number of times they ricochet you can equip one of three types of bullets the bosses in each stage have different weapons each boss has its own unique moves so use different bullets for different stages and those who have cleared all the stages you can also play endless mode where you just keep on surviving lets aim for the height of poptank
short_description: popcute shooting game‼

about_the_game: tang san spent his life in the tang outer sect dedicated to the creation and mastery of hidden weapons once he stole the secret lore of the inner sect to reach the pinnacle of his art about_the_game: are you afraid of spiders then this game is not for you you will feel like a resident of australia there are more spiders in this country than stars in the universe the spiders here are huge and each of them wants to bite you in the ass in this game you will have to get out of mazes filled with spiders there are 12 mazes in total each of which has its own level of difficulty at the exit of the maze there is a door to open which you need to have 7 keys scattered throughout the maze you must collect them all movement wastes your energy which needs to be replenished so collect fruits and eat them try to avoid collisions with spiders when confronted the spider bites you reduce your health and inflicting a negative effect there are many of these effects each of them reduces your abilities and prevents you from surviving to dispel the negative effect you need to drink the appropriate antidote if you get to the 10th maze you can consider yourself a real australian but only a few will be able to go further

up your gameplay and upgrade your favorite characters you can also add backgrounds stickers and titles from different effects sets  ‘let’s start a vlog’ ‘handy set’ ‘vhs’ and more we’ve prepared a gift for those who will buy movavi video suite  a free effects set ‘pixel age’ dive into nostalgia and try golden age titles and stickers as if you were playing your favorite 8bit game what’s new integration with dlc audio tools and effects transitions with the builtin audios fast track hd for 4k и 8k movies objects tracking drawing on videos while recording sharing audios on google drive timeline upscaling for precise cutting framebyframe preview on the timeline time spinbox for the pinpoint cutting undoredo tools updated interface with a bright theme make video editing your favorite playground use your creativity to make the most engaging vlog ever  you have everything you need to do it manage your footage on a convenient multitrack timeline and don’t worry about large files  thanks to the fast track hd technology your computer won’t freeze while working with full hd and 4k videos try basic editing trim rotate and enhance clips colorgrade videos with lookup tables join files with transitions  especially transitions with the builtin sounds when you’re done with the simple tools try advanced features  chroma key stop motion and object animation  insert stickers logos and titles cut trim and sync audio normalize volume tweak equalizer settings and more you can even create your own intro from anything you can find in the program backgrounds titles stickers callouts and even music then save the clip and use it in every video you create convert files at the speed of light make sure your gameplay videos can be seen on any platform or device  thanks to 180 supported formats and 200 available mobile presets you can use those presets to transform files to any smartphone tablet and laptop even the newest devices are available thanks to the superspeed you can convert files in no time plus use other types of hardware acceleration intel hd graphics amd nvidia nvenc and cuda before the conversion you can perfect your clips scale up the timeline and use framebyframe about_the_game: tale of starship is a classic shoot them up the objective of this game is to survive tale of starship use rng to generate enemys wave moreover as the game progress you can upgrade your starship through different ameliorations each pool of ameliorations is generate randomly tale of starship offers 2 games mode a mode tale where you try to survive at different enemy waves and fight some intermediate boss to upgrade your starship to eliminate the guardian of each zone and a mode survivor where you have to armed your starship at the beginning and survive as long as you can at different ennemy waves with the starship you have make this game have more 100 hours of gameplay 2 games mode 1 survivor mode with 3 difficulties 6 starships playable and unlockable playable with the mouse and the gamepad more 30 different ameliorations an original soundtrack more 150 different enemies 4 different worlds a game in 60 fps a game proposing heavy roguelike elements tale of starship is a game developped in its wholeness by mathieu guerard whether it is the music the graphisms the programmation etc
